content:
Not using it any more need to be taking off.So I can build my credit.I need to have a good credit score if not taking off making my credit score go down..It don't make sense to have a card you not using.Every since 1990
To whom it may concern could you take that card off my list.So that my credit score can increase please..Thank you so much for helping me out in that situation.

Hey I’m Priscilla Thompson. I had a terrible experience when I didn’t have a good credit score which deprived me from getting a credit card and a good apartment but after I contact PINNACLE CREDIT SPECIALIST my credit score was fixed within 6 days and 7 days later I was able to apply for a business credit card and a loan which was granted. I will not want to say much, here's practical evidence of the American Express Business Card. You can contact via their EMAIL: PINNACLECREDITSPECIALIST@GMAIL.COM / +1 (323) 406 1225. THANK me LATER.

I will not want to say much, here's practical evidence of the American Express Business Card. You can contact via their EMAIL: PINNACLECREDITSPECIALIST@GMAIL.COM / +1 (323) 406 1225. THANK me LATER.

Bunch of idiots, no customer service at all. Had the Amex Reserve Card and missed one payment by an hour after 10 years of service spending 200k a year on the card and they would not even waive the interest. Visa would have done it in a heartbeat. Not going to pay 1000 in interest because the payment was an hour late.

Excellent loan with complete transparency on terms and reporting. No hidden fees. By offer only through Amex card. Rate was lower than most rates with interest charges going up this past year every few months - not as low as a home equity, but much lower than other companies without any fees. Great customer service on all Amex accounts. Was able to pay off a credit line/loan from another company that wasn't transparent and harmed my FICO within 48 hours with this at a rate 2% lower.

I was pro AmEx until now. While at sea, with no access to the internet, on my vacation, my limit was decreased after being a customer for 10 years with absolutely NO missed payments. My limit was fine BEFORE I left for vacation, hence me taking the card with me. Called and was read from the script to say we can't help you and your stuck. There were unattainable options provided to say the least. I'm embarrassed, disgusted, and disappointed.

I was so shocked and honored to find a shipped box with a beautifully wrapped Sferra throw and a thank you from American Express for being a customer for 50 years. There is a reason they always have been, and continue to be, #1. Such a classy regard.

American Express has been true to form with me,I like that… just waiting on that credit increase now… thank you… I know it’s coming soon because of my experience so far with them… excellent card and very professional staff…
Outstanding customer service. The Delta Reserve AMEX card makes sense for those who fly Delta regularly and want free Sky Lounge access.

Absolutely horrendously terrible INDIA based customer service! I’ve had this card since October 2022, so under 6 mos. I have 7 other cards and carry a zero balance from month to month. I’ve never experienced such a cluster for customer service as they have here , every time I’ve called in so far. Today I wanted info on the “plan it” program thru Amex that allows big ticket purchases (like a refrigerator -$3000) with no interest & paid off over 12 months. Seemed simple. 34 minutes of frustration later, talking with “Johnny” in India…..and I was ready to scream!! Dude had no clue yet what I was calling for. So I ask for a USA based rep or a supervisor. I get the USA based rep and explain all the previous nonsense to him and he assures me that he will send my call to a specialist in the USA that can help me…….I am not kidding when I say …..he transfers my call back to India!!! After some snarky comments by me, the chick says “”let’s keep it professional please” and there I lost my $&?% and just hung up, then I cut my Amex card up with the scissors. When I spend 30k+ per year on a card (for points) I can have a lot of patience……no more Amex India BS for this guy!
department: Delta SkyMiles® Gold American Express Card

content: I had a reoccurring charge on my credit card that has not been resolved. I asked American Express to please dispute the charge. They said I must contact the merchant. I asked them to please cancel my card and re-issue a card as I am going through this dispute I also believe that my card was compromised. The customer service rep said even if they re-issue me a new card with the last four numbers, being the same any reoccurring charges would still be billed in the future to my card. Very poor customer service. I don’t understand why they even have customer service if they won’t issue a dispute and I have to do all of this myself. Discover has much better customer service. I have for American Express account. All of them will get closed.
Great credit card to have. Don’t ever live without AMEX. It's very powerful credit card to have on you. I have tree AMEX and like them all.

I have been a customer with AMEX since 2011 and can no longer recommend them to anyone. I have been dealing with a nightmare where $12,000 was stolen by a small business 1.5 years ago and AMEX still has not issued me a refund for this. This issue should have been resolved over a year ago and I am very disappointed in AMEX for not putting the customer first. I cannot recommend them to anyone anymore until this issue is resolved!

Horrible card, our business signed up for this card service and it was the worst ever. We were able to use the card that day for about $80 but then when we went back to lowes the next few days we were told the temp card wouldn't work and we did not have an account. 60 days later we were still not issued business credit cards but did receive a bill with a $74 late fee. The balance was immediately paid in full since we did not want to deal with this horrible service ever again. 90 days later I just received a bill with $1.64 interest charge and a new balance of $1.64, when I called it was told that there was 'Trailing intrest" on this account. We still never received cards and are being told by Lowes we do not have an account. The account that doesn't exist was closed today. This is the worst experience we have ever had with a credit card company. As a contractor we would have been a medium sized corporate account with incentives to deal with Lowes. Based on this experience we opened a Home Depot account instead.
A Valuable card. All of my grocery expenses,gas,streaming, and offers go on this and I pay the balance every 2 wks. This is my operating card. Love it.
department: Blue Cash Preferred® Card from American Express

content: this card is awesome, nothing like saving 6 percent on groceries in todays high price world, not to mention the balance transfer for 12 months interest free.
To much upfront charge, it has a payment plan that works or you can split your payments in three easy ways., you can’t use this card at Costco
Thx for all the great support this card has provide an all the ups sides u really enjoy it to the full stend of the word and i hope to use it even more
I’m an American Express Gold card holder ,Very satisfied with American Express excellent line of financial products, and the customer service is first class, I would recommend them to anyone

It's a decent card with a great credit line, but the cashback is lacking in comparison to a couple of my other cards. If they had a merchant offer, great! However, they offer 1.5% cashback with minimum redemption amounts (I don't think you have to redeem exact multiples), but Citi Double Cash eliminated their minimum redemption and SoFi Credit Card never had a minimum redemption. Personally, I'd rather get 2 percent back with no minimum redemption threshold.

Useless Card!
I had the card for one day, that was more than enough to cancel the card. I was not able to enter the Centurion Lounge, they want a Boarding Pass that is less than 3 hours and my airline doesn't assign me a seat until last minute on the boarding process. So there's no way to visit the lounge unless I miss my flight. Also from 10 people trying to enter only around 4 made it because they have so many dumb unexplicable rules. So don't think that because you have the card you will be able to visit the lounge. NO they have 1 million tricks to say NO.
Then I said, let's try the Priority Pass because I can eat in Miami Airport! Guess what??? The Restaurant in Miami Airport don't take Priority Pass from American Express. I was like whattttt???? Anyway I called the line for help and the guy was like yeahhh Priority Pass is not available everywhere, I ask if can I get a credit and they said NO Again! So anyway I just canceled the Amazing AMEX Super Platinum Useless Card. Thanks for nothing AMEX.
PD: Fix the Centurion Lounge Rules and the Priority Pass then call me and I will join again. So far your card is not usable.
Thanks for nothing!
Emmanuel Orona Cruz

I am very annoyed by this card and will cancel it after my first year. I signed up for the targeted offer of 150,000 points. The time comes where I meet the spend and I only see 80k in my account. It takes months and all Eric, the manager, could offer was if I just spend $10k a month till November, I could make up those points. It has been a hassle and I feel bait and switched. I don't use Walmart+ and Equinox is so expensive that it is not even worth it since its cheaper to get a Equinox membership through Perkspot.
Great card to have if you like to eat out a lot also be mindful of that two fifty fee That you will get your first thirty days after opening the account
American Express has always been there for our family, getting some jingle in Kyoto or buying a car on the card. American Express is always ready to help.
Great card and happy to have it. We do not tend to use it a lot however. The card actually is my husbands I am authorized signer.

Credit Cards are like Dancing with the Devil. All Credit Cards, but I had some problems with my card and always made payments. But, used the card a lot over a couple of months and contacted me and demanded I pay 1/4 of the card off. Or they would lower limits and worse. Now, keep in mind I had made payments so it was not past due or anything like that. So I would be very cautious with them and once I pay the total balance I am gone will never use them again. Customer service was very rude as well.

Applied and received Amex platinum card as travelling a lot for business and wanted access to lounges. Had to spend $4000 to get FF miles which proved difficult as everytime I tried to use was denied. Got Email 30 mins later asking if I approved these charges. Am I supposed to stand in line at store until they acknowledge or use a different card. After 4 times of this happening canceled card, enough of the embarresment.
department: The Platinum Card® from American Express

content: Had no problems with the American Express very good company they gave me a very good opportunity gave me a high credit line when I didn't expect it so the company has been very helpful
It takes them too long to update the credit report. Due today neglected on timely filed report, my credit score decreased to 90 points
A member of American Express since 1999, and ever since I have always wanted to have a gold card and now I have it. Thank you American Express.
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: Really helps to track debt and its easy to function app. Also great for offers on credit cards and loans. It helps to slove debt problems.
Great card and service. Recommend it to everyone and use it properly at all times. Unbelievable benefits and security every time.
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: Great card … easy account access online no annual fees and rewards on certain purchases. I am able to follow my spending on a daily basis
It’s been helpful but it’s hard to keep track on it. I don’t know when it’s cutting and when to pay. It’s just hard. I hope it was easy
Just as a nice credit card for everyday use , good cash back on gasoline and supermarket including us supermarkets . Easy ways to pay .
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: Excellent Card Good benefits discounts American express CS is top notch and always speak English and is based here in the US. Best of all $0.00 Annual Fee
Very high interest rate. Use mainly for travel otherwise I have cards with better combined rates and benefits. I have made this a travel expense only card
Amex has really helped with a great point reward 4x for restaurants in groceries. Also had easy easy to pay including paying one bill at a time.
Accepted at all retail establishments... with reasonable rewards... cash back... really enjoy the use of the card... maybe should accept another card...

Good for merchants, not so good for users. I disputed a charge for a yearly subscription for a software that was not working. I was encouraged to ask for the entire amount instead of 9 months as I wanted to do. I spent a lot of time with their customer service representative providing all the details. I asked if I should submit documentation proving the sub par software I subscribed, she told me they’ll reach out if needed. After a month, I received communication that the vendor has provided the contract I subscribed for a year and I have to pay for the entire year. Period. Never a mention about the software nit working, and about my small business having to shoulder $709.60 for a service that doesn’t work. I’m usually a Citi and PayPal user. This time I thought I’d be better protected by American Express. Wow! Have a learned my lesson in an expensive way! Going back to Citi and PayPal!!!
TE aumenta tu credito de linea eso es muy bueno para tener mas opciones de compra. Y no necesitas pedirlo. Excelente tarjeta. La recomiendo mucho
Love the Amex Platinum! It does have a high annual fee but it is definitely offset if you take advantage of the benefits. My love for travel makes this card a no brainer.

Awful experience with Business Platinum Card. This company is riddled with administrative tape that requires more hours you can devote as a small business owner to resolve. Our business was directly affected by Hurricane Ian that forced closure. When we re-opened and began operations, AMEX assured us that we would NOT BE CHARGED INTEREST OR FEES BECAUSE OF the NATURAL DISASTER that forced us to cease operations and be late on payment for the first time ever in 3+ years of never having a missed payment. 5 Months later after countless hours on the phone and we have yet to resolve over $1K worth of interest. AWFUL CUSTOMER SERVICE. I GIVE UP AND YOU WIN. We don't have the manpower to fight anymore. Enjoy ripping off small business owners!

American Express has always been my go-to card until now. I recently charged $3500 in travel to my card. Receiving my statement in the mail, I called to redeem travel points. That was when the Customer NO Service began. After being on the phone for over 50 minutes, I was told that I could only redeem $500 even though I had additional points available to redeem. The front line person could not tell me why I couldn’t redeem additional points. I asked to speak to a supervisor, but they were obviously so busy dealing with other unhappy customers, that after waiting 30 minutes there were still no available supervisors. From my point of view, I use the card as my main card, I earn points, American Express benefits from my usage of their card, and I should be able to redeem the points I’ve earned. In addition, I asked the front line person if I should short pay the current statement or wait for the credit to show up on my next statement. She told me that I could short pay the current statement, however, after further questioning, she told me that short paying the current statement would subject me to fees and interest. That would have been important information that should have been shared without me asking. Not impressed at all.

The customer service is excellent, they anticipate the customer’s needs and address before you’re aware of them yourself. The response to any inquiries or requests is immediate. The rich cashback amounts justify the annual fee. This is now my go to card for everyday purchases. The initial credit limit was respectable, and was increased at my request when the account was 90 days old, without any additional hard pull.
department: Blue Cash Preferred® Card from American Express

content:
Worst Customer service


This company randomly and often adds "security alerts" to the cards, so when one calls to use the very expensive services (platinum cards are $695 a year) they have to call you back and check thru recent purchases. EVERY SINGLE TIME they transfer you to a new department they make you go through the process all over again. Then line drops and you will have to do it AGAIN!

Go to use the card at a store and you will be declined for NO REASON even after you have completed these security checks and it wont be resolved for 24 hours! All of this for my protection after being a perfect customer for 33 years!

Imagine being a grocery story with a cart full of frozen and perishable food and being declined with no resolution bcz the supervisor at Amex REFUSES to get on the line. One hour of wasted time!!!

Terrible what they do to your credit rating. Had a four thousand credit account. They lowered it to 1000 because applied for 2 credit cards with a 712 rating. Their cut would have lowered my rating any way closed the account. May as well take the full blow on my credit rating. Complained to them they should asked for me to give permission to even partially run a credit report.

I was lured into applying for this card during a Delta purchase, responding to an offer promising $300 off of the ticket I was buying. The point was buying the ticket with the new card, applying on the fly. The application was approved, but it wouldn't allow the purchase with the new card. Website didn't work, and I never saw that $300. Amex tells me to call Delta, and you guessed it, Delta tells me to call Amex. The whole thing was very sketchy, and turned out not to be worth it at all. Screenshot any offers before you get taken advantage of like I did.
department: Delta SkyMiles® Gold American Express Card

content:
on point you gotta love it. nothing like knowing you are taken care of.

Having a question about my bill, I called American Express customer service. The person who took my call, Abraham, was the perfect example of what a customer service rep should be. He was professional, knowledgeable, personal and committed to giving the customer a positive result to the impending problem. My problem was involved and he followed it through to the last detail.

I was an extremely happy American Express customer when we ended the call. Thank you to his supervisor for selecting such a dedicated customer service rep
With every Hilton Honors AE purchases at a Hilton you earn points quicker to your free nights stay.I’ve already benefited from free Hilton Stays at Embassy Suites.

Your Serve card is sucks, it’s giving me a headache . I can’t the dang balance through the app or the ATM. The pin on the card doesn’t work either. I would advise you guys to shut down this business fast

I have had this card for a month now, and their customer service has been the worst that I've ever dealt with. I've had them create 2 tickets at this point, and each time after I call back, they can't find any detail, or proof of any action. I've been lied to by managers, and employees. DO NOT get this card if you expect any service whatsoever. Oh yeah, and their flight options are worse than you can get without the card. . . .
department: The Platinum Card® from American Express

content:
0 ZERO Stars!

The worst cards to place in your wallet. For years I have always paid my cards b4 they were due. un beknown to me American Express has tapped every card I have with them for years with a late fee for paying my bill on the day it is generated. i.e. Bills due on said date, I pay way before on the day they send me a bill, so if I do not pay 3 days later I am hit with a late fee because I did not wait to pay! This is the dumbest practice in history! It's a true Racket!!! Don't be like me and just pay, look at your bill and make sure you're not getting hit with late fees even though you have paid above and beyond any minimum payment twice in a month every month forever! ridiculous!

Was late on a payment (slipped my mind as I don’t usually carry a balance) and had a 29.99% rate levied on my account. In the contract, it states they will monitor account payments after a late payment and remove penalty rate after you resume payments. I find out A YEAR LATER they had not removed the rate and I spent an hour with customer service to get it removed! Very sleazy and dishonest credit card company and will take advantage of you quick.

I am disappointed with everything dealing with American Express. I was recently told I needed to utilize my card or it would be closed out. I guess I used it too aggressively because I am being threatened with my account being closed or pay $1110.00 for the first payment. I only have about a $4000.00 balance. I have a card that is $23000 and a card that's $14000. I pay my bills and other than that I don't see why it was necessary to run my credit (hard/soft) hit over a funky $4000.00. We are doing upgrades and preparing for vacation. But thank you Amex, I realized in this whole ordeal my interest rate with you is the highest sooooo, you've made the decision for me. I shredded the card and will be paying it off to never use again. By the time you close out my account in the future my 780 credit score will be restored. I also purchased 3 Acura's in the past 2.5 years totaling approximately $200,000. So there are many factors as to why my score recently dropped and none are because my payment history. Goodbye and good riddance!!!
I enjoy it terribly I must admit! I never aspired to be invited for the card. But, once I received the invitation, I was curious. I love the access and the perks :)

I’ve been a member since 2016. With a $10,000 limit They made a mistake in my credit report. Then in-turn decided to decrease my credit limit by $9000 to $1000 when I called them and asked can they they told me to do to my credit report and usage explained that I pay $95 a year whether I use it or not, I have never miss a payment so do you mean to tell me if I don’t use the card I have to be penalized so basically you guys are trying to hold me hostage to the card she returned with. I don’t know what to tell you I can put an appeal which you will have to go through a whole other credit check that is unbelievable seeing that you pay every year, I said so why not lower the annual fee if I don’t use the card….. unbelievable absolute worst
department: Blue Cash Preferred® Card from American Express

content: I’ve been making payments to AMEX faithfully. Today I decided to reach out regarding a settlement little did I know settling would hurt my credit score so after agreeing to a settlement the man told me I had before 5pm today to call back and cancel if I so choose. Around 2pm I called in to cancel after doing my research. Spoke to the same man who gave me the run around about cancelling telling me I wasn’t able to. Then making threats about wanting to cancel saying I already committed to the agreement and the best he could do was push it out a few days but I’d still have to pay the settlement amount. Customer service is so untrustworthy and crooks. I then asked for email confirmation and he told me he couldn’t provide me with that. Isn’t it illegal to push through a charge when a customer withdraws consent on a recorded line? I will be contacting my bank to reverse the transaction and seek legal action.

One of my favorite cards, from rental car insurance, covers 30 days for one price saving some serious money over paying daily rental car insurance fees. Plus 3% back on most in-store purchases along with other offers make this card a keeper.
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: Great rewards, great benefits, fantastic customer service. As long as your spending habits justify the annual fee, it's hard to go wrong with this

American Express does not truly honor their promotions. When I applied, I spoke to 3 customer service representatives to rush my card so I would receive $100 on my first hotel stay. After checking months later and not seeing the credit, it is claimed I never was approved for the promotion. So do not believe any of their first time sign up promotions.

The only card that tells it to you straight. AmEx is honest, and not out to get you with hidden and unhidden fees. In over your head? They’ll help you get caught up by lowering you APR…and NOT freezing your card. You end up being loyal and not jumping to another card (whether for for a quick fix or to have credit available in case if emergencies). They know well that believing in a person over the long-haul ends up greatly benefiting both parties.
When attempting to pay a penalty of 540 days interest to close a 5 year cd I was told that it takes up to 13 business days to receive the money. Their competitors offer next day funds.

SPAM. Activated a Delta/American Express card and can't use it. Asking them to stop the card and any additional mailings within 1-hour of activity on a late week night. It's been 45 minutes and counting on their Chat line to STOP THE SPAM. They won't agree to not mail out a canceled credit card.

This credit card is the worst night-mare that can happen to any human being, they charge $750.00 for platinum Card, they charge for annual fees. In the service they provide are TERRIBLE. The call center they use are located in Manila, Filipinas, in India. I need to take them to Court. "THESE GANSTERS HAVE A LICENSE TO STEAL."

They are big liars, with a nice tone, the customer representatives are just trained to tell you whatever you want to hear and postpone the issue you call for! They charged me some amount for a credit card, I called 3-4 times, not only of course did not follow up with it as I was told, or give me a clear answer, but every time they would provide a different case number for the investigation that is open!
Customer service is frustrating, however card is useful. Would recommend to to self sufficient individuals the rewards are great..

AX has been understanding in some recent situations. They have allowed me to enter into a payment agreement and still maintain using my card. I have been an AX cardholder since 2009 and I have always receive support in different situations or conflicts in my acount.

As im an existing Amex member, the acquisition of the loan was super easy, funds were disbursed into my bank acct within 24 hrs of the E-signing, great competitive fixed interest rate, and as always Amex customer service is top notch! Like the jingle says, "dont live life without them"

I had an Amex card for my business and I was happy to use it for buying supplies and balancing the amount the following month. This worked well as my clients paid my invoice and in turn I cleared the Amex balance. Then 2 issues happened: 1, I raised a charge back request in October 2022, which was acknowledged in writing and then I had a letter a week later saying it was closed stating I had not responded. I had. 2, In November 2022 I had a client inform me that due to Christmas payment runs differing from the rest of the year, they were delaying my invoice by a week. No problem I thought, just call Amex and arrange a one off exception to pay 1 week later, considering I had never missed a payment or paid late, this should be fine? Wrong. Amex immediately classified my account as a risk, and blocked my card and it never worked again. I called them multiple times to ask why, and they said the card would be unblocked, it wasn't. I cleared the December payment exactly when I promised to, but the account remained blocked. Multiple calls later, they kept promising to unblock the card, but never did. Eventually, I called to make a complaint, which wasn't taken seriously, nobody gave me a reference number or acknowledged anything formally. I called again, about the 6th time, to say "Either acknowledge these issues, fix my card and apologise, or close my account". This was recorded on the Amex system as "customer wants to close the account". That wasn't what I said, but Amex only believe their own records. Do not bother calling and trying to reason with them, they just write whatever they feel like in their system and usually it tries to make you out as the bad guy.


I am now in dispute with them, and they want to close my account and demand full payment of all funds outstanding. They have never acknowledged any error on their part, its all my fault apparently. Be very sure that Amex will not do anything to assist if you run into issues
AX used to have Year End stmts avail on 12/31 & even though charges are tagged they can't give a rept before March after CPA appt!

Having never had this card in the past, I was lured by American Express Hilton Surpass credit card with their promotion for points. 130,000 Hilton points if I spend a certain amount within a few months.

I believe that I was a victim of bait and switch as I responded to a promotional offer, fulfilled my end of the minimum spend, and was never notified that I was ineligible for this offer last year as I continued to keep spending.

I only have one other American Express card (Marriott Bonvoy).

I even encouraged my friend to even sign up for the card. He received his 130,000 Hilton points and I did not. He has many more American Express cards than I do.

I called and asked why I did not receive my points and was only recently notified in January 2023 that I was not eligible. I had this card since fall of 2022. This is very dishonest and shady.

I would like the 130,000 points awarded as promised by American Express.
Legit card if primarily flying delta. The complimentary class upgrades and yearly companion pass are great (although the companion pass shouldn’t be restricted to only the 48 contiguous states).

WARNING!! BEFORE considering business with Amex, you should know how shiesty they operate. They hide from and prey upon their own loyal customers! One department will tell you to do something causing another department to condemn you for it without explanation! Twice now this has happened before I finally realized they are fighting amongst themselves without care of the affect it has on their customers. First time I managed to look over it, second time I froze the account and will close it as soon as it's paid in full. I've been a loyal card holder for over 5 years, I have never been late and have an excellent credit rating, a couple of years ago, I had a balance of $3,000 with a credit limit of $20,000 and I received a threat of having my limit dropped if I didn't give them $950. (Reminder: I have NEVER been late with a payment) But just to keep my limit I went ahead and paid them the $950 and was told I'd not ever have to pay that again. I was LIED to, January 14th 23 I recieved an email demanding another $950 within 3 days or they'd cut my limit (I have still not ever been late with payment and I think my balance is a Lil over $2,000) so I contacted them on the 14th and was told that's not right and for me to ignore it and forward it to an address he gave me, thus I did what he said. Haven't heard a thing till today 1-21-22, I get an email saying future transactions may be declined because of limit drop. Ok enough is enough, I've done EVERYTHING Amex has told me to do and I'm still getting punished! I called and have not yet gotten an understandable explanation as to why this is even a situation or even a remedy, only one department blaming another. They have been so shiesty with all this I fear having any type of dealings with them, cuz with no doubt those kind of ethics they can be doing just about anything with your account and you never knowing . All that I've said is recorded and copied if anyone would like to see that I've stated only the truth
Card is excellent- I think there could be a better cash reward. 1% is a bit low. On the other hand, alerts system is great. I am alerted to charges via email/text
Am Ex is great. I always pay off the total every month. If there's a problem, they fix it and report back to me. I am a happy customer

If you wanna spend months messing around with incorrect billing then get this card. Biggest mistake I ever made on a huge job which then resulted in 8 months of back and forth. Lucky I was an accountant because they had credits billed on the wrong cards for different jobs and refunds I didn't ask for resulting in bills for stuff I had already paid.


I will never do business with American Express again and may even avoid Lowes for large projects because it was that bad, and not a single accommodation made for my troubles and hours and hours of back and forth and letters and proofs of payment, receipts, etc. Its a sh**

show.

I was an authorized user on my father's account for 14 months without ever missing a payment. As soon as he passed away they cancelled his account, leaving me with no credit card in order to run the house he left me. Despite my inheritance, they treated me like a stepchild, so I would never consider them in the future,

6% cash back on groceries at supermarkets. 3% back on fuel. 6% back on streaming services. This card pays itself back with very little effort. Just keep in mind superstores like Walmart or Samsclub don't count as grocery stores
I have been with American Express for years. I have never had any problem or issue with American Express that wasn't solved to my satisfaction. I use this card more than any other card.

It takes forever to get to a person when you call them. I just canceled, never got to talk to a person, just a machine for 4 minutes. I'll be going to a provider with some semblance of customer service. I'm not sure what the high fees pay for.
This one always reports correctly as I would expect but some of them do not so I would have to say this is very accurate, Although I wish it would come through quicker and reflect on my credit

I had a balance of $6,800 and paid $6,400 leaving a balance of $400. Interest charge was a whopping $95 the following month! Beware, they stung me with interest charges on entire balance although I paid $6,400 of the $6,800 due! Incredible that they can get away with that and charge $695 annual fee on top of it.
department: The Platinum Card® from American Express

content: I’m so disgusted with American Express and their lack of customer service. I recently signed up for the Delta SkyMiles reserve card since my corporate card is an Amex and I’m traveling frequently. I’ve always had Visa and Mastercards and I should’ve stuck with that. I signed up for the card online during a promotional period. My colleague and I both read the details of the promotion and it justified the $550 annual fee. I spoke to multiple Amex customer service representatives when I started using the card to get clarification on the promotion requirements. I made sure to meet the requirements by the end of the year to reap the travel benefits for 2023. Lo and behold after fulfilling the requirements American Express didn’t uphold the promotional promise.
I love my American Express Card! I use it responsibly and when needed and pay the balance off as soon as possible. I’d recommend to anyone.

I have been an American Express Delta Gold card member since 2011. In October, I purchased the TSA PreCheck for $85. There were several entries online that stated American Express reimbursed the $85 fee. Unfortunately, you have to read the fine print that one must carry the Platinum card for reimbursement. So... buyer beware that you use the correct card when purchasing TSA PreCheck.
I switched from the Amex Gold card to this after the pandemic started, since I lost my ability to travel and the Gold card was my travel account. Nothing is better than Amex.

I have been with American Express since 2001 holding three cards - Platinum, Gold and Delta Reserve. Last month without notice they took my limit on my Reserve card from $75,000 to $3,100. Took me from unlimited limits on my Platinum to $36,000 and $3,100 on my Gold Card. For about the past 15 years I have paid my rent for my business with my American Express card. They never had an issue until this year when I hit the spending threshold on my Reserve Card to make Diamond with Delta. They are accusing me of owning the office and the rent I pay not being real. It’s public record that I do not own the building, yet a month later this isn’t resolved. In the meantime I’ve canceled my Gold card that I never use. I don’t know how they think I’m supposed to be able to run a business with a $3,100 limit when many advertising charges can be $5k-$12k transactions each. I’ve had to switch over to using my Chase Sapphire Business card for most purchases to keep the card from maxing out daily. I can’t believe they would treat someone who has been with them this long like this!!

I love my Blue Cash Everyday, its been a great everyday card for me for the last few years. And even better, it has helped me forge a relationship with AMEX that has unlocked for me all the company has to offer. No annual fee, decent 3% across the board, easy Plan It* payment option, and credit limit increases are easily obtained on request. Its just a solid addition to your credit card portfolio
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: Great card and great customer service. Card in both me and spouse name. Spouse is authorized user. I don't use card. Thank you for this opportunity.

When I signed up for this card I didn't see anywhere you would have to pay for the $250 upon signup. Terms and conditions don't show that anywhere. Offer shows "$250 annual fee" but they don't disclose to you anywhere you have anywhere you have to pay the fee upfront! Terrible customer service. They will tell you if it's not written on the offer that you will be only be charged on the first year anniversary, then you should read that you have to pay upfront. Shady business out there to get you!
department: Delta SkyMiles® Platinum American Express Card

content: Great card. Easy to use. Great service. Convenient Card easy to use phone applications. Great fraud and travel and customer service supports. Great perks great value.

They always make sure they keep me informed about my limits. Also their APR are fair compared to their counterpart card issuers. I also like the fact that I can use my miles acquired; however, I wish to it was NOT JUST Delta Miles.
Phenomenal card to have . The lounges at the Airports while on international flights is a great perk .The points also add up quite quick depending on the purchasing

The most unprofessional Credit Card Lender/Company I have worked with, most Miserable Customer Service that on a short notice email about 10 days (or less) ago dropping my credit limit from $20k limit on both my platinum cards to $5k, not to mention the inconvenience as well as incompetence speaking with their customer service on the phone, incapable of changing my due date for my auto pay, I for sure will advise everyone I know not to apply wit American Express and tell them the story for their Horrible Customer Service!!! what a big BS Lender

First time using AMEX card and a platinum at best. This card has very good benefits if you take the time to research the benefits which will help offset the yearly membership fee. Their customer service is very responsive.
Great card with great rewards. Very happy with membership rewards and ability to use them to pay on the card. Recommend to everyone.
I use the card. I receive a monthly statement. I pay off the full balance due before the due date. What more can I ask of a credit card?
I have just had my card for a short time, so far so good! No problems as of yet! The trick is to use the card as a helpful tool! Thanks for all the help!
I lost my old card and now trying to retrieve my account. I had a limit of 22,000. I miss having skymiles. And cash back features on gas, food, etc is great

I like the card so far. Gas and groceries are a constant 3%. They offered 0% interest free for 18 months so I was able to put a car repair for my daughter on it which really helped her out. We'll see how much the rewards helped me by the end of the year.
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: No annual fee and still get awesome rewards and their customer service agents friendly and professional. The online support and website easy to navigate.

Great card but the APR after the fact is variable up to 27% The extra annual fee is not that great especially if you are not doing a lot of international travel for the perks that you have available but overall for the purpose I use it for its a great card.
It is helpful when you show how to raise your credit score. I really do appreciate the assistance that is given through this site.

Card is ok, not worth the price tag. In 2023 centurion lounge access is being removed for guests. I am not paying $700 a year for a credit card that doesn’t even allow me to take my wife into the lounge with me… Amex Travel is disappointing. Better prices from my free Expedia account and Amex Travel won’t even price match. Very disappointing for a luxury credit card. Will not be renewing my card.
department: The Platinum Card® from American Express

content: Not accepted everywhere in the world, which is a problem. Also, they reduced my credit without telling me. i never missed a payment, but my score took a hit.

$7,0000.00 initial limit, which was lower than expected. (763 FICO.) But after 18 months I was offered an upgrade, with a $95 annual fee waived for the 1st year, and given a $9,000.00 credit line increase. Great card for booking travel, entertainment, and goods. My go to card for groceries. Nice shopping coupon options too. Excellent customer service.

Great for using for large purchases for extended warranty protection. You do have to pay off the hard at the end of the money or you will get hit with a high interest rate, but thats what you signed up for.
Fantastic card. I use it the most because I am guaranteed help with any questionable charges. Additionally, all of my warranties are extended for another year.
I love American Express it's everything I ever wished for if I can have everyone in the world make an account I totally would - Cody

I have 5 credit cards and American express is absolutely the worst nothing but fees! I got charged a late fee for paying my bill on the last due day after 7pm apparently due date doesn't give you till midnight if you are on the west coast so now I am $40 late fee on a $40 late fee from the month before that was supposed to be under review yet no one bothered to tell me it was declined and even though I knew not to trust them and paid it late Sunday I am still charged a fee on the fee. Not to mention the high interest. Save yourself the trouble and go with discover chase or even citi all of them have better customer service than Amex
Great credit cards and company, customer service is always friendly and helpful and there are loads of benefits to their credit cards like airport lounges and cash back. Just don’t spend too much!

Not a credit card, more like a monthly expense account. If you go with 5% back then the ENTIRE balance must be settled every month. Anything not settled will be subject to ridiculously high fees and a possible hit to your credit like you paid nothing. NO WHERE is this disclosed unless you read the very fine print, which you'll have to dig to find even. I can't even imagine how many people got this thinking it was a real credit card with min payments, only to be screwed to the wall at the end of the month when the whole balance was suddenly due. OR you can pay it off over 90 days and get no rewards. There is literally no reason I can think of to get this card. Let's don't even get into how horrible Amex is as a company or how few places you will find that actually accept it. Such a scam. DON'T DO IT, TRUST ME!!!!!!

Great experience got the money deposited into my account same day. Excellent customer service if you’re already an American Express customer with good credit the only reason you don’t have the money is because you didn’t apply for it.
The process was fast and easy with no hard inquiry on any of my credit reports. Funds arrived in my account the very next day. Thank you!

So far I’m happy with the card. I initially opened it because my daughter needed help with some urgent car repairs and I saw it had interest free for 18 months so it would give her time to pay me back. But I’ve been taking advantage of the gas and groceries as well. All sounds decent card.

Business checking: Seems AMEX is quite naive on what business checking customers need!

1) The account is linked to your personal cc account, therefore your private and business activity is linked! Even your AMEX points are co-mingled!;

2) You can have only ONE person with administrative privileges so the individual who "owns" the card is now the business' finance manager, accountant, tax administrative assistant, etc...Even my business partner is not allowed to do anything but view the activity!;

3) only mobile access is via iphone app;

4) does not connect with QuickBooks;

5) onerous process to set up...you have to know how to work with AMEX website which has never been intuitive! You have to hunt for the phone numbers as they are hidden somewhere in AMEX mismanagement!;

6) No benefit for having the AMEX checking related to acquiring an AMEX business cc!;

7) the only benefit I can see is relatively free with limited charges for business expenses. That hardly compensates for me doing all the admin work for my start-up.

I'm looking for a better option...save time and consider what is important to your start-up!
Nice very good bonus ticket perks miles upgrades companion tickets are the best first class travel bonus miles that give upgrades!
This is a great card. My first Amex after burning them years ago! They do give second chances. High limit and excellent customer service!

Absolutely love this card! Excellent benefits and rewards (all accessible from a nearly perfect AMEX app). In the first year since opening this account, I’ve earned hundreds in cash-back as well as statement credits utilizing many of the AMEX “Offers”. The few times that I’ve contacted AMEX customer service directly I’ve been given excellent assistance. When I add it all up, the benefits easily outweigh the $95 annual fee.
Only 3 stars cause of my credit limit … And they wouldn’t increase it… Maybe I will revisit & update later if & when they increase it

TERRIBLE COMPANY. Got scared on offer from Delta to get 40000 sky miles n 250 credit. Was approved for the Delta gold American Express w a 15000 limit. BUT THEY WILL NOT HONOR THE PROMOTION. WAS LIED TO. SCAMMERS. STAY AWAY FROM BOGUS PROMOTIONS.

Always there to help and support my needs ..

My Amex card is always with me , have been

for a long time now and I wouldn’t have it any

other way…..
I do not like their rewards program and the fact they have a trailing interest rate. The Manger did help with my account being over charged when I used my cash back rewards.
Great credit card, very high point reward system. My wife and I use it like a debit card to score points to travel with. We love it

So I have had an AmEx card since I was 19 years old, today I’m 57. So I just cut the card off as we purchased a lake house last month ( paid cash) paid for all the furniture and a medical procedure so we ran up a 98k balance on the card. We have had autopay setup on the account to pay balance in full as long as I can remember. We have never revolved on any credit card, we pay balance in full on whatever we charge. AmEx cut my card off and demanded I make a payment, which I paid them 50k. When it cleared I called them up and asked them to bump my credit limit from 50k to 75k, they refused!! If I’m not the top 1% of the top 1% of all their customers, they might as well lock the door behind them. Best of luck to them but they won’t be getting my business!

Well after 10 years of great service I can no longer support American Express. They have filled customer service with poorly trained and unprofessional employees. Then for me to file a complaint to a supervisor I had to hold 35 minutes one day then had to leave to do my job. Tried again noon time USA to be on phone for over an hour to only be poorly treated by an incompetent supervisor who never listened to my complaint. Don’t pay for a card that cannot support the service they claim. I recommend Chase Bank cards now
Exceptionally weak credit limit. No increase so far after 10 months. I have another AmEx card .. Blue Cash Preferred (Morgan Stanley) .. with a much higher limit
Only use it for groceries (6% kicker) occasionally when I forget my Costco card I will use it for other expenses. Unfortunately, it is not accepted as frequently as Visa.
Enjoy this card. Gives me the chance to increase my credit and helps me to stay on track. With paying off every month has taught me to budget better

I started a business and began receiving credit card offers from AMEX. I closed my business and continued to receive offers. The letter said I could go to DMAchoice.org to stop receiving offers. I did so, and had to pay a fee to set it up, which was annoying. And now, months later, I am still receiving offers! I had entered my name and the name of my business to stop receiving mail, now they spell the name of my business wrong so it gets past the system. I entered the wrong spelling of my business on DMA to stop it, and now they just use another variation. I am so frustrated and will never be an American Express customer because they are sleezy! Dear AMEX, when you tell me how to stop receiving your junk mail and I do just that, please actually follow through and stop sending me mail, especially because I had to pay a fee to "stop" it in the first place.

Love everything about the card. The benefits are too many to name. The customer service support is top of the line. The airport lounge servicesand free food and drinks pay for itself. The elite status for hotel rewards and car rental is another plus. The entertainment packages from Disney+, Hulu, ESPN+ , Sirius XM Radio. Just so much. The reward points for travel are outstanding.

200 bonus after spending 1.5k of purchases 0 apr for 18 months unlimited cash back 3 percent at us supermarket and gss station and online retailer 2 percent at department stores 1 percent on everything eles win win apply and see
There are some Pro's to using Amex, first one is APR is great for first 15 months. Con is they will not allow you to get another Amex card with the same APR even if it's offered.

Amex has really taken good care of me as a customer. Too many banks and credit card companies try to make things confusing so you'll make a mistake and they can charge interest or fees, not so with Amex. They make your statements easy to understand and their staff is really helpful is solving issues and answering questions.
department: Blue Cash Preferred® Card from American Express

content: Good starter card for people who don’t have a lot of their own credit history and still want some decent cash back (requires Schwab brokerage account)
Very good card and benefits I would recommend American Express to anyone. Great purchase protection, plan along with great customer support
Great card.. it's perfect for daily use. I approve of this card.should get if your your applying for your first credit card. Apply now
Great company.. but keep raising the yearly fee!!! Awful… those that have been in should not pay for the yearly fee just new applicants… this is not a way to go credit!!
department: The Amex EveryDay® Credit Card from American Express

content: Loving this card so far. Cash back on groceries and online retail which is perfect for most of my purchases. There are also discounts on streaming services as well as a bunch of other membership perks. The pay it and split it option is really helpful as well as it allows you to pay off or split individual charges.
They rewarded me the bonus point and then reversed it back. They made the mistake, but made me pay the penalty. Terrible business practice.
department: Blue Cash Preferred® Card from American Express

content: Love the card. That app will allow you to verify if they will approve an amount prior to getting a decline. Only negative is the 700 annual fee
No complaints regarding this card. The app is extremely easy to maneuver. It updates easly. The rewards choices are varied a d change regularly.
I have several other cards to choose from but none reach the lofty heights AmEx reaches with it's #1 outstanding customer service.
department: The Platinum Card® from American Express

content: Just the worst customer service. I received a mailer that I was eligible for an upgrade to a Platinum Card. I had two separate conversations where the customer service person stated that I was approved for the upgrade and the membership rewards points. I waited and waited for the card, but it never came. I called back and was told that an investigation would take 6-8 weeks! I have an 800+ credit score and have had an AMEX Gold for over 10 years. I will never deal with AMEX again. I plan on spending my points and canceling the Gold card.

Not as many special deals for long time customers as Discover but a good rate of 3% off groceries, and 2% off gas. Pretty good with credit limits too. Merchant offers are also decent, and almost never run across a store that don't take AMEX. Update they now give 3% of gas and online shopping as well as groceries, which gives them the 5th star.
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: This is my go to for groceries, travel and restaurants. I also have its bigger brother the AMEX Platinum which compliments the younger brother.

About a month ago, I opened an American Express card which got approved. After I use the card several times the fraud department put a hold on my card because I wanted to verify who I was which was OK. Didn’t even receive a courtesy call. I had to find out myself what was going on . I did their verification process twice, which was awful and didn’t work and so I had to get documents notarized and sent to a secure link they sent me. Now it’s been almost a week and my account is still lock and an operable. My thing is if they’re going to put this hold on my account do it at the initial when I got the card not after two weeks of me using the credit card don’t think I’m keeping this card.
Lots of Points on Groceries & Dining Out, several different perks with Uber, GrubHub and Restaurants make this card worth it. I would recommend it.

Wife got this card but did not put SkyMiles number in app. It says no where do you lose the miles but that’s why happened when she asked them to merge it. Delta and AmEx keep pointing fingers and promised to give her a new card with previous points added which did not happen. They also cancelled my authorized user card without warning and were going to re-add me with my ss number. They did not so had ask them to add again. Will be cancelling this card if they don’t get their act together. I have the blue card which is great and Delta has been good to fly but this card is making me reconsider business with both Delta and AmEx. We would have spent our purchases on cards that actually gave us rewards as usual and avoided this one if we knew.
department: Delta SkyMiles® Gold American Express Card

content: A first-class company that still has human interaction on the phone, with real folks that actually try to help the customers resolve issues. Those humans are very knowledgeable, helpful, and patient.
Is one of the greatest American Express credit card ,always great app and great customer service you can count on !!! ……………………………….

I'm going to have to say that I really appreciate the extra ways that they have gone out and done for me and I will truly recommend this card for everyone to get very good customer service department is on top of there game by the way you should just get it and let me know what you think about it I bet it will be a great review
This account for HH is paid off and has not been updated on this site and remains inaccurate as well. I thought once things are paind in full that they are automatically deleted.

Really poor customer service these days. I was a loyal Customer for 20+ years until recently when they sided with fraud charge from Rng in a dispute so I canceled altogether. Was working up to black card which my father has. No more.Don't expect loyalty or ethics and they charge 150 a year for gold for little benefit. Too many other better options regardless. See ya amex

I recently received my platinum card and was excited to get 5X points for my hotel reservation if I book through AmEx Travel. Easy process. Great price. Done. Here was the result. They use Expedia to book the reservation. I cannot use my Hilton app to check in nor pick my room as they would not honor my Diamond status due to booking through Expedia. The Hilton rep must have mentioned Expedia three times during the check-in process to make feel small. But because she was so nice she "allowed me 2 bottles of water even though I booked through Expedia because of Diamond status." If there was an executive lounge, I would not have been given access. The worst occurred when I checked out. I asked for my receipt as this was a business expense. They told me it would come from Expedia. Not. I called AmEx Travel and initially was told they could not provide a receipt but only a "confirmation." After 20 minutes, I was sent an email with the total but it was not itemized. Finally after 30 minutes a very crude itemized receipt was mailed. I pray my company accepts this. Bottom line: the treatment of being by the hotel for booking through Expedia, the lack of any status perks due to booking through Expedia and finally the hassle of getting an itemized receipt due to using Expedia . . . so not worth it. Will never do this again.
department: The Platinum Card® from American Express

content: They gave my wife a credit card. They identify purchaser. Once, when I needed cash, they lent it to me. Love their foreign offices.
An excellent card for those who desire to rack up delta skymiles while making regular daily purchases. Exceptional customer service and
department: Delta SkyMiles® Gold American Express Card

content: As others have said avoid Amex credit cards. Poor customer service. Their website and app are difficult to use. Payments do not go through leading to interest charges on unbilled charges. Even after your statement balance is paid in full you will receive trailing interest charges. Per their statement, interest will be charged "even if you pay the new balance in full and on time and make no new charges". When you call customer service or use their chat system you are often disconnected or get the run around. Not the service expected especially when paying high membership fees.

American Express raising interest rate to 28% on my credit card with no reason. Called them ask them what the reason the interest is going up . They simple answered because of Prime. Very evil corporation in my opinion.
Great rewards. Great security features. Even greater customer service. The best credit card experience all around. Greatful to be a part of the American Express family.
Great card for accumulating airline miles. I’ve had it for a few years and I enjoy it. It’s really beneficial for when I travel for work.
department: Delta SkyMiles® Gold American Express Card

content: They are sorry ,cleared my bill,paid in full than then they put $15.58 charges on $0 balance and now turn into $29 fee for return. They stole my rewards. All I was trying to do clean and close the account. Don’t like this card company at all. Now they have $15 charge that doesn't belong on my account after going through the troubles I have had,and after been closed and paid in full. This was PAID IN FULL SEPT.2 AND CLOSED ON 15TH SEPT.,THEY ARE CHARGING ME $15 ON $0 BALANCE,THEY SENT ME A CHECK FOR $43.49

I am very disappointed with the American Express Delta Skymiles process. I wanted to book 2 flights using my points I received. For some reason their website wouldn’t give me the option to do so. I then called American Express to get their help booking the flight. The agent I spoke with said he didn’t have the option at the moment to pay with points and he confirmed if I payed with my card right now I could call back later and they could convert the payment to the points I have. I confirmed again with him that I would have no issues doing so and he said it would absolutely be able to be converted. So I booked it and sure enough I call in to try to convert the payment to points and everyone says I am unable to do so. Now I have a very large amount of unused points and had to pay with my credit card. I have been an American Express member for years, but am very disappointed by this and know that Chase Sapphire seemed to have a much better process. Disappointed

If you're thinking about getting a new credit card, do NOT go with AMEX. They apparently have a strict new policy as of 2022 not to forgive late payment fees ($29) even if it's the first time in nearly 10 years as a customer and you pay it in full within 3 days. Not once did I have a late payment and they were completely unforgiving the first time I ever did on my Gold card. And be prepared for them to charge you interest on that too! I've NEVER had this happen with any other credit card company. Terrible company, would not recommend giving them your money.
American express great customer service. Dept.great bank and credit cards full service banking I am proud to be part of American express family. Thank you all so much
great card i love this card so much that i hardly use it because they will no lower the interest rate for the many years i had this card

Really really like the Amex gold card. 4x points at my largest monthly spend category grocery stores, plus 4x at restaurants makes this card a no brainer. The $250 annual fee is a bit high but if you take advantage of all the credits, it effectively comes down to $10! Must have.

I have been working with AE for three months on two fraudulent charges. I have inverted four -five hours on this event. I am still paying interest on the dollars that were spent. AE does not provide quality customer service. I pay $550 annually to have an AE card without customer service.

I applied for this card in June of 2022. I would stay clear and far from American Express. I applied specifically for the Hilton Honors. I used the offer code given to me which was supposed to include 0 percent apr for 12 months. I got my card in, started using it, saw my first statement and noticed they did not honor my 0 percent apr offer! I have excellent 840 range credit score also. They gave me the hilton points and statement credit that was on the offer but not the 0 percent apr which was the main deal for me. I had to go through a two month dispute, even mailing them a hard copy of my promotion as they dont except email or fax and they came up with an excuse that they found they did nothing wrong. When I asked I need an explanation customer service just repeated me some script about subject to change and credit history, etc.. None of that should had applied to me. I gave up fighting and just paid the balance, closed out my card completely. Never applying with American Express again. Never had an issue with other credit card companies.

Never got my 70,000 bonus miles because of American Express's lack of responsiveness and focus on the fine print you won't read. And it halted us from miles to fly our two foster kids to see family in the Midwest. Backstory: Completed the $2,000 minimum spend and AE found a loophole- Venmo spend where I used the credit card as a credit card. Noticed the miles were not deposited into my Delta account in the 3-month timeframe and called....and called...and called....and called. Got 4 different answers and uncertainty why I didn't get the miles. Finally after two months, after the 5th call, I was told by a manager about the Venmo loophole. I asked how I was expected to understand said rule if 4 of their own employees didn't know the same rule? I was then accused by the manager of wanting them to falsify records. I said no, I just want the miles promised and would even complete the $150 spend left after taking out the Venmo debacle and that I just wanted the miles for our foster kids. Nope. No go. No flexibility. So I canceled the card and am warning all of you out there.
department: Delta SkyMiles® Gold American Express Card

content: Applied for Amex Hilton rewards card with a 841 credit score and was denied because of a bankruptcy filed over a decade ago. Was advised by rep from new accounts that I could reapply in 30 days Not sure what’s going to change in 30 days but not going to. Apparently Amex has a black list of people if you made a mistake in past don’t bother applying . To bad for Hilton I’ll apply to Marriott rewards and use Marriott hotels in future for my travel needs

0 STARS.

First of all I am not the type that writes reviews. Just wanted to tell everyone about my experience with AMEX. Have 3 cards including the Blue Cash Preferred for many years now.

So now that you know a little about me I will tell you to stay away from doing business with this people. I do have other cards including APPLE card and Chase with 10 times the limit of AMEX and they are awesome compared to AMEX. Actually this should be a 0 STARS for them.

My other cards have $600 fee yearly but you have to be on the phone for 10 minutes before you can speak to live person.

One time I made a large payment on AMEX, trying to book a vacation.

I could not pay for the trip on the site. It will keep declining. Called AMEX that had the audacity to question having money in the bank to cover that payment. Agent on the phone called my personal bank to verify I had enough funds to cover that purchase before AMEX let me go ahead and book the trip.

I got many other stories about this company but time is most precious thing that I got.

My recommendation stay away from this company as far as possible. If you want to be treated like **** and feel bad later bout your decisions this is the time to make a smart choice. There is plenty of other Credit Companies you can do business with.

Stay away from people that do not appreciate your business and do not know how to make you feel appreciated.

This is coming from someone who has had paid 100% on time credit cards for 15 years or longer. At one point my credit score was 800 and I was making close to 200K.

This is my 2 cents trying to help ppl out there as much as I can so you don't make the mistakes I have made when I chose AMEX.
department: Blue Cash Preferred® Card from American Express

content: It's a great credit card for Hilton stays and over all travel expenses. High member fee, high interest rate but great rewards points.
I grew up watching my parents using AMEX cards & all the prestige that went w/it. I now enjoy the prestige of AMEX cards. I never leave home w/o it.

American Express Representatives have not been able to resolve a basic billing error. To avoid correcting the error phone representatives intentionally create semantic confusion by using terms such as credit adjustments, debits, credits, and deductions anything to avoid lowering the customers balance.

Not that anyone cares but I was hacked on my vacation last year. So, now after I spoke with AMEX as soon as it happened they are still charging me. The messed part is they fixed it & I only owed less than $400, oh then my credit report shows I owe $6000.00. That’s just wrong!! No one will help me anyway. So, if you can help, then fabulous!!
I love AMEX. They’re fantastic. It’s been a decent relationship for multiple years. They are always professional and easy to work with. I love my American Express Card.

Have enjoyed this card. Can sometimes get good discounts and cash back for travel. 3 percent on groceries and gas. Right now is 3 percent back on online shopping too. Nice cashback offers to redeem from various busibesses

Great card! Grocery, gas, and restaurant purchases get cash back rewards! I DO WISH THAT THE CREDIT RATING COMPANY COULD UNDERSTAND THAT I PAY THIS CARD IN FULL EVERY MONTH, INSTEAD OF TRASHING MY CREDIT SCORE!

The 6% on groceries is worth the annual fee. Great customer service. This is a great card. My only small complaint being that AMEX isn't quite as accepted as V/MC. They were very generous with the credit limit as well.
department: Blue Cash Preferred® Card from American Express

content: American Express has been pretty good and the app is pretty easy to use. The customer service is excellent and they are very very kind over the phone.

Nightmare Credit Department.


As a business based in central London it's the norm to make large amount transactions American Express claim to think their business card doesn't have a limit of spend I can assure you their description and service provided do not meet, as the spending limit keeps changing and most of the time it has to be approved though the credit team via a phone call.


And now I closed my account what a shame!!

ONE OF THE BEST CARDS EVER —!!

All the feature’s they have are

Customer service awesome they actually take the time and listen to your issues and really take the time to help and assist you to understand or fix the issue rjeje
Great card to start with Amex. Approval was very efficient based on over 700 score. Starting credit limit based on credit score and annual income.
This is a great card, IF you want miles. It also has the usual platinum benefits some quite nice. Most people won’t use them enough to recoup the annual membership. Imho
department: Delta SkyMiles® Platinum American Express Card

content: I have the Blue cash preferred and it is a great card however it does not offer rewards in the way of gift cards its only statements to use towards you over all balance , and thats just not going to work for me so its been shelved and i use my Capital one card.
Great card excellent customer service 5 stars it’s a card you definitely you would want to have it’s the best card for me since I got my credit on point
I would suggest not doing their bonus offers since they try to deny them all of the time... Certainly dont do the macywine offer, lots of people are having trouble with that one... Just a big scam.
Best Credit card for household expenses and transportation. Best choice if you want a single card from American Express. I use it almost every day.
department: Blue Cash Preferred® Card from American Express

content: A company that began in 1850 and is still in 1850. Ultra conservative and company (not customer) focused. Check out other cc companies' offers and compare for yourself. The days are gone when it was cool to have a "gold card". No thank you.

The Customer Service for this company has gone really bad during the years. For a platinum member that paid $300/year per card and when the card gets lost of stolen it takes over 2 days to be deliver...it is ridiculous. Spoke with a Representative called Tatianna that indicate to me that she has the same authority as a Manager. Really? Manager in a 500 Fortune company has the same authority that a regular employee? Wait for about 30 minutes without a manager taking the courtesy of picking up the phone to explain a policy to me. They are good to charge you the $300/year but when you have a question you are on your own. Even my bank deliver a Debit card within 24 hours and I paid zero fee a year. Again, American Express needs to understand that when a client request help and ask for a supervisor, that the supervisor should take sometime to understand the inquiry that the member have and answer that call, not dismiss the person and be treated like a 2nd class citizen.

My credit card got fraudulently charged for $5000 and they refuse to look into refunding my money, unethical company. They say they have an agreement with the merchant who scammed me (literally threatened to hand over my credit card or be taken to jail by police in another country) and because of the agreement they have they are unable to review the information. Unwilling to listen and they will barely communicate anything with me after numerous requests on my end.

Beware of this card and their claims about access to Delta Sky Clubs. We just got this card and a second card card for my spouse on the accoutn. The terms and conditions that came with the card state "Delta Sky Miles Reserve Basic and Additional Card Members receive complimentary access to the Delta Sky Club when traveling on a same-day Delta-marketed or Delta Operated flight." THIS IS NOT TRUE. When my spouse tried to use the additional card to access a Sky Club, he was denied entry. I called to find out why and NOW they are are telling me that additional card members do NOT get that access despite what the terms and conditions say.
department: Delta SkyMiles® Reserve American Express Card

content: American Express card its easy to use and it is accepted evrywhere with many benefits and increase of credit as you use it and pay in full every time

This is my favorite card for most purchases… it’s easy to access and pay by app… the only down side is that a lot of merchants either do not, or do not want to accept the card.. I was also led to a high yield savings account by American Express.. I moved my savings from my bank.. where it had been sitting doing relatively nothing.. I now have a trouble free auto deposit.. and am getting noticeable returns on my money!

American Express is the best in the business. If your stuck they can help pull you out. I had a situation where I was out of town and my limit would go over, they professionally and sincer helped me within in minutes and I was no longer in an embarrassing situation.
Love all my American Express cards!! They all have a non limit and I buy what I want and pay later or pay off as soon as I buy something
I've been paying the payments on time I told them to have them taking money every month couple of times but I guess they have terrible customer service
you cant cancel any of your reservations online and its a huge process to try and cancel anything. then they hung up on me multiple times when I was just trying to cancel a hotel reservation!

They are predators in the water, be careful they will get their hooks in you and never let you go! I have been saddled with debt for years and with my purchasing power going down everyday due to transitory inflation I’ve been falling behind on my payments. Would not recommend

I have patiently try by the years many times by, gaining credit and economic confidence, to have an American Express credit card, I dont know the exact obtuse reason, but here Iam. This time I applied, this is my second though, because they mentioned it will not harm your credit only to see if youre pre approved, yeah right, another lye, these guys are the worst to think they will care about your interest on them, that you once dream having their card, nahh... they dont care period. Try Capital much better and prestigious card and these guys are very Cool in acceptance.
Amex has a great introductory rate with a loan amount higher than other offers, plus perks like points, and offers for all your shopping needs.
I love my card And I want to see can I get my interest rate lowered because I always pay on time and I always pay the balance off so I would like to get my interest rate lowered if I can’t thank you

As im an existing Amex member, the acquisition of the loan was super easy, funds were disbursed into my bank acct within 24 hrs of the E-signing, great competitive fixed interest rate, and as always Amex customer service is top notch! Like the jingle says, "dont live life without them"
This is my oldest account & has been the best card I've ever had. Very simple, not much in the way of rewards, but a fabulously low APR.
Love the card great perks. Customer service is the best. Always help and resolve issues asap. Never had an issue. Delta sky club is worth it as well
American Express customer service is the best in the financial arena. Easy to contact, agents are fast to respond and easy to deal with.
Enjoy this card and the online convenience. Wish payments would come out of my account and credit to card immediately that is only complaint really.

Stood by me during sad occasions I’ve be in great need, I’ve always kept up with payments whenever possible, auto accident not my fault, took my right leg above knee, worse, lost my loving dictated wife Alice
My third credit card but it’s actually my first card from American Express.After I open it’s popped up with new rewards rate and other benefits.I love this card so much and use it as daily drivers.
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: My third credit card but it’s actually my first card from American Express.After I open it’s popped up with new rewards rate and other benefits.I love this card so much and use it as daily drivers.
I love my American Express, I am hoping to have it for years to come. Going on 3 years and it’s a card I feel everyone needs in their wallet.

Cheap starting limit makes this TRAVEL CARD useless ! I did my research online for a good travel card and this card kept coming up. I applied with a Vantage Credit Score in mid-700s and got the card but with a stingy $1000 limit which barely covers a weekend hotel stay. Half a dozen of my other credit cards started at four times that amount. If my credit score hadn't already taken a hit because of this cheap card, I would've cut it in half and returned it.

The card arrived with another accompanying letter announcing "discontinuation" of several benefits which I haven't had time to read. THIS IS BAIT AND SWITCH and against the law ! If they can write a letter WITH the card to take benefits away, they can update/correct the tall tale of benefits on their own website at the first place.
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: I use this card primarily for traveling and staying at Hilton Hotels. But the points are really good and the annual free night is a good bonus for me.
Awesome card with generous bonus and points. Easy to redeem for trips with Delta and they're a quality airline. I've used it for several free trips already
So far so good with Amex gold. Have not had any issues. The app is super easy to use and making payments is easy. I did have a hard time dealing with a travel issue on the weekend.
Like the American Express card for travel because it is accepted every where. The bonus points you accumulate can be applied to travel or gift cards

This has been a great no fee credit card. I converted my Costco Amex to this when Costco switched to visa a few years ago. It has some cool benefits that you only get from an Amex card and it has a good reward for gas and grocery stores as well.
