Visa and Mastercard both have better card options for travelers.
Best rewards ever I mean ever ever so please apply now best customer service very high credit limits many different cards and u also get points
Always a great and reliable card to use. I would like the website to be a bit more user friendly but for the most part this card is great.
department: Clear from American Express Credit Card

content: I got Denied the Platinum credit card with 750 Credit and $130,000/yr income... and never ever had one late payment ON ANYTHING EVER! Nearly 5 years perfect history don't know what else they want from me
department: The Platinum Card® from American Express

content: Easy online payment and was able to get a credit increase after 6 months. The card is plastic and fits in your wallet which is great.
I've had an American Express credit card for many years and It offers fine terms and many benefits. Helpful insurance coverage cuts bottom line cost of car rentals.

American Express has been an excellent addition to my credit card collection. This company was the first major company to approve me for a card after rebuilding my credit. Additionally, after only a couple of months they were willing to double my credit line, but I did have to ask. And then every 6 months you can ask for an increase.
department: Clear from American Express Credit Card

content: Always on time with high CL. Accessed account for large purchase, within CL and subsequently had CL reduced. Damaged my credit score significantly and no help from Customer Service at all.
department: Clear from American Express Credit Card

content: It’s been a fantastic card! I thought that hardly anyone took Amex. I was totally wrong! I use it everywhere! The Amex app is also extremely user friendly. I highly recommend this card!

This card has been a great addition. They will give you a credit line increase if you apply for it every 6 months as long as you pay your bills on time, and you can have up to four American Express cards (from what I understand), and I have two currently which I've already earned a ton of rewards and one thing that stands out about American Express is their initial bonus is IMMEDIATE... As soon as you pass the dollar amount required the credit is applied. Very good card.

The Amex blue card works very well, has many benefits, and the customer service is fair. There are very few companies is good customer service, so don't expect a lot, but Amex customer support is acceptable.

They have some nice perks, and they are fairly transparent.
Interest rates way too high, they will lowball your credit score on purpose to set high interest rates, and not really accepted at very many places.
American Express is the BEST!!!... It's excellent having their card and their customer service people are truly professionals in every sense of the word.
This card can be used for every day spending with great dining and travel options. You also get a $120 dining credit for your dining.

Don't bother applying for this card.

Low credit limits, high membership fee, terrible rewards/points program.

Predatory card & worse than sub-prime credit cards.

Poor customer service!

Apply for Citi or Chase.
I would use AMEX more often if I didn’t have an annual fee. Chase, Bank of America and others charge less for their bill pay services

I would give them 0 star if I can! I would not recommend using this card! Hilton Honor AMEX is one of the worst cards that I have ever used. I always have issues whenever I travel that the card is always declined even though my credit balance is more than enough the pay for my purchases. I reached out to the customer service and they said there was no transactions ever sent over and they didn’t lock my card for travel notice or anything and claimed that the merchants’ terminals issues. How can this be a terminals issue when I sent to 5 different stores and decline at all of the purchases? After the call, it works again! Also, I was declined for my Bonus Offer. No one can provide me exact reason through chat and phone call! They just said I agree to that I accept there will be no bonus offer. I asked for proof of that when I agreed, but they told me they don’t keep all of that for my security reason! Sure! Sounds like cheating to me!
This is such a user friendly account and customer service is great. The offers for credit and pay back incentives work well with my spending. I enjoy this account a lot

I love my American Express card! Interest rates are reasonable and the cash back rewards are a plus! They match your cash back at the end of the year dating to when you've opened your account. Maintain your account in good standing and you don't need to ask for a credit increase, they'll just give it to you!
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: This card has helped to build my credit over time. It was so very nice to know that I could pay for prescriptions, food and pay bills when I lost my job.
AMEX Platinum Card is simply the best, across the board. Best rewards program, best concierge, best airport lounges...you need one of these!

Created an account with a Platinum card, only to have the card shut down due to "fraud concerns" 12 hours after activation. The offending transaction? Purchase of a cup of coffee, 1 mile from my billing address. As punishment for trying to purchase a cup of coffee, I had to spend over an hour on the phone dealing with people who seemed to think I had stolen my identity, and were very difficult to work with. I will not recommend this card to anyone in the future, and am incredibly unlikely to renew the card for a second year. I expected FAR better service for a card with a comparatively large annual fee. Instead, I got poor service, and treated like I was an identity thief.

Save yourself some trouble and go with a better card.
Thanks for having this card helps me a lot on that day I need it and easy to rent a car, make a payment to Amazon member ship and pay food restaurant.
Best credit card company ever and give a lot back too and I recommend that credit card to anyone who can afford it believe me you won't regret it

10 phone calls so far and currently waiting for an online notary after 10 verified phone calls. Now they want photo ID pictures and face scan. This has been a nightmare trying to get this card fully activated. First use to pay a bill then it was sent to fraud team and we been dealing with them for 2 days, 10 phone calls, and now the online notary. What a way to treat new account holders and we even have free gold status upgrade. This is the worst customer service and worst card to ever be in possession of. Will I recommend this card? ABSOLUTELY NOT! If I could give them zero Stars I would!!! Thanks for the horrible experience and thank God I wasn't on a vacation trying to do all this!
department: Hilton Honors American Express Surpass® Card

content: Great credit card & amazing customer service I recommend this card I never have better experience until get my American Express gold

Great card to have for grocery shopping,

Earn rewards for dollars spent. I love the this card it’s so handy and easy to use highly recommended

It was easy to get and AMEX is flexible with prepayment. The approval took less than a minute and was followed up with documents and contact. They were very thorough and professional. You do have to follow certain guidelines: you can't use it to pay for real estate or education.
I love this card. It has lots of perks! Always sends me emails with information of things I can earn while spending on the card. Great card!

There are much better business credit cards out there with a lot better customer service. This card is way too expensive for what it is. When trying to switch to a lower card they will charge you the annual fee for the card you currently have and for the new card.
Love this card and company! They treat you like a very important person with each encounter. Any issues I’ve had were taken care of immediately and their concierge service is impeccable.
This card is just amazing. Having the opportunity to become part of the Amex community is just an award in itself. Not including all the perks this card comes with

I have had the worst customer service ever with one of your customer representative today 5/26/2021 at 8:52am, his name is Victor and he was so disrespectful.. I asked about a payment that was returned using a bank account that I no longer use (>year) which is very weird as I have been making payments with my current account for the past couple months. Victor raised his voice on me when saying that "THIS IS THE ACCOUNT THAT WAS USED AND YOU ENTER IT YOURSELF..!" That was so rude and disrespectful, I have then asked to talk to his manager and this is when I was put on hold forever. So disappointing after being a loyal Amex customer for over 4years now.

Card was used fraudulently without even the correct billing zip, disputed with Amex, they denied it was fraudulent. I had to refund it myself between the vendor (AVG) who easily identified it as fraud activity. So poor compared to Discover who conducts actual investigations. Not to mention, credit score is 752 + $200K in annual income and was given a lousy $1,000 CL. Spotless credit. Still denied CL increase after 6 months. I couldn’t even take advantage of the 0% intro APR because the limit was too low. American Express used to be for a high quality clientele with excellent customer service- not anymore. Look elsewhere.
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: American Express customer service is always down due to technical issues. This company is nothing but thieves and scam artists period
Great card amazing customer service almost 80% of business accepted Amex card I will recommend it to everyone apply for an Amex card
Good incentive to spend 1k within first 90 days to get 200.00 back in a statement credit. Very good customer service. 0 percent introductory apr.
Terrible service for a card that cost $500 dollars a year. The online website doesn’t work and you cant get anybody on the phone. Over 2 hours wasting my time on hold.

Great card for family outings, travel and shopping. Great way to track business and personal expenses. Great fraud alert and tracking. credit card with great perks. Excellent customer service and fraud alert department. Offers cash advances at minimal cost; balance paid in full every month.

I have the worst experience with American Express ever. Been a card member since 1993 . Tried using my travel miles have 92,000 spent two days 6hours on the phone six different times and could not confirm my flight . Told me I would have to book through another agency like Expedia ... So disgusted with them that I don’t want to use my card anymore. I hope someone in a high position CEO etc etc sees this and contacts me to say I’m sorry.....
Never call customer cares, they won't answer for hours. Finally they will act as answering call, but it is prerecorded tape playing just to hang up on you.
Love everything my rose gold card has to offer. No limit and the card is beautiful. Use for restaurant and get Uber reimbursement. Great card overall

I have both the gold and platinum American Express cards. When I was approved, my wallethub score was only at 665. I don’t know how and why I was approved. One thing I am very diligent in doing is pay off all my balances every month. I never carry balances to the next billing cycle. Yes, I have one collection account. What I love about the platinum card is the generosity of the rewards.
department: The Platinum Card® from American Express

content: I've enjoyed using the card for the perks and benefits, I also enjoy the fact there's no annual fee associated with the card. Hooray for Amex

I am a veteran and recently applied for a credit card but was denied as my only credit history is 4000 dollars in student loans that have never had a delinquent payment and were incurred in the last semester of my bachelor's in Aerospace Engineering so essentially by not incurring and paying debt while serving in the military and educating myself makes me ineligible for their business services and that's very sad my grandfather started his business with their help and I'd hoped to do the same.

So far it’s a great card. The delta skymiles were added to my account quickly after spending $3000. The free monthly Grubhub credits are nice if you use that service. There are a lot of other benefits that I have yet to explore. Will update review after some time.
Great card great rewards if your credit score is above 700 see if you can get pre approved. It has a lot of rewards & perks...........
The Mecca of credit cards, no set spending limit!!! Unlimited spending potential and you can rack up some serious points too!! Best card in the game
No annual fee+points earning =less money being spent on travel. It has been a good card for us, especially with no blackout dates.

Great company to work with. The best customer service, able to make multiple payments monthly, great rewards benefits. Supreme to any other cards. In six months, Amex gave me 4 cards. Flawless. Be loyal to Amex, and they will definitely be loyal to you. Love love love Amex!
Love my American Express card! Love the rewards available that I can use to apply towards my account balance. It also offers monthly specials on various venues. I don’t leave home without it!
Very pleased with Amex Blue card. Good rewards, great customer service. Only drawback is that not all merchants accept AMEX and foreign transaction fees are passed through.
Great Travel and hotel card ..Benefits are very generous but membership is a bit high but the returns are double. I'm a current member for 10 years.
department: The Platinum Card® from American Express

content: American Express has been with me for a very long time. And after a few issues financially when my dad passed, they never left me. I’ll be forever grateful and loyal.
department: The Platinum Card® from American Express

content: Very good credit card, pay off balance each month and this card will help your card. Love my amex and the benefits they give, definitely a good card to have.
Best amex ever thank you so much for helping me through hard times and good luck with your new job and I have a few things to do in the
American Express has a lot of great reward incentives and benefits that can be used not just for yourself but for your family members as well.
One of my favorite cards. Free baggage check has paid for the $95 annual fee many times over. The customer service has been great too.

I can survive without this card and can definitely do without the frustration.


I received a new card, tried to follow the activation instructions and was still having issues 2 hours later.


The website process asks for your card number and security number, then wants you to log in or create an account. My existing account login failed. I know my ID and password are correct but I try to reset the password anyway to just move ahead. The website tells me the system is down and can't reset my password. Which one is it? Bad credentials or a crashed service? I call into the CS number on the back of the card and ask that question. I get someone who wants to verify my card but doesn't know where the various numbers are on the card (card number is NOT on the front of the card), argues with me, and wants to reset my password. "There's nothing wrong, these things just happen, I can't explain it, you just need to reset your password." I explain that resetting my password will only be an exercise in frustration if the system is down and ask again to check if there are system issues. I get more arguing and more insistence on resetting my password. I ask for a supervisor. 15 minutes later I'm told there are no supervisors and they'll call me back within 24 hours. I assure the CSR that I can wait on the phone. Another 15 minutes later I get a supervisor who also wants to argue and reset my password. I eventually get her to actually listen and she realizes they have a technical issue, asks for a screenshot, and opens a ticket for the problem.


It shouldn't have taken over an hour to convince someone to look to see if there was an issue, I shouldn't have needed to escalate to a supervisor, and resetting my password without resolving the issue would have added to the frustration.


For a financial organization that likes to promote itself as a premium brand, this was a dismal performance for a function that happens thousands of times a week.

I have been with American Express for five years, recently invited to upgrade my card for a $95 annual fee. The good thing was I was offered 40,000 bonus points however my credit limit was not increased. And that was a disappointment.
I like it so far it’s pretty cool, I pay as agreed and I don’t get any fuss in return. I have this Amex card and my corporate card that is an Amex Green and both are pretty good
American Express Serve is awful they are giving me the runaround about refunding my money. It should not take 45 days for them to give me back my money

Unlike capital one American Express worked with me through the pandemic reducing my interest rates to 5.9% making the debt more than manageable. They have earned a lifelong customer as a result. Capital one will never see my business again continuing to charge usurious interest rates
I enjoy working with you guys at American Express and look forward to improving credit and getting higher cards. I would like to increase my spending

Very favorable company excellent customer service. Started my account off with a very respectable account limit which made it very easy to purchase larger items. I will refer this card to anyone who may be looking to open an account
Applied for Card as a secondary holder but never got the card???? I have no idea of how they came up with a balance of $2895 I will now have to call and find out what happened
The worst card company ever, and I will not recommend this company to my family members. They will not report the correct actions on you.
Excellent major credit card to have...Can't get much more major than American Express..Their Customer Service is also excellent
Great perks! Well worth the yearly fee. Works well with Hilton and Marriott, my two faves. Car rental status perks are another advantage of carrying this card.

I spent a couple of years staring at this card and questioning the annual fee versus my ability to enjoy the benefits. This year, I finally took the risk and I’m so happy I did it.


I started small, just enjoying a weekend on the beach at a nice Hilton property with my wife. The Hilton Honors Gold status made a lot of difference. I was off for a good start.


A couple of months later, I planned a three day weekend to Las Vegas. I was aiming for the Fine Hotels and Resorts benefit. Oh, boy, we enjoyed amazing experiences, thanks to my Amex Platinum. The VIP lounges at the airports, the great rates at 5 star hotels (planned in advance), the early check in and late check out, the complimentary meals at great restaurants, all together added great, unimaginable value to our trip. It really felt like a luxury trip.


I believe the biggest misconception about this card is that “you have to travel a lot to make it worth it”, which a totally disagree. First, you can easily recover the annual fee just by taking advantage of the offers and benefits in form of credits: but yes, you have to enjoy collecting small prizes here and there. Second, if you just go into a couple of weekend getaways and maybe a bigger trip each year, you’ll get tremendous value out of this card.
department: The Platinum Card® from American Express

content: I would have thought a Platinum Cardholder would get better service. I called to make a change to a hotel reservation, and did not think the whole process would be so complicated. The first person I talked to was nice, but hard to understand. They were able to competently make the change I wanted, but they told me that I could not use points with the update. They told me I would have to go to their redemption service center to get the points retroactively applied to the account. I thought this was strange, however I just went with it. Before transferring me they gave me a number to call in case I was disconnected, which I appreciated, but more to come on that later. Once transferred, the person could not help me. They ended up talking to me at length about what they could do, but then eventually said they were going to transfer me to someone else. After coming off another long hold, they told me that they explained the situation in detail to this next person and that now I would be transferred. However, instead of being connected with someone, it simply ended the call... This was after an hour total of talking with people and being on and off hold. I just wanted to make a simple hotel booking change. I called the number they left me with to call back if disconnected, and it took me to some scammy-sounding number that wanted to offer me a $100 statement credit, but could not even confirm that they were with AmEx. When I asked them to provide some sort of confirmation, they just said have a good day and hung up. Definitely very unsatisfied with how things went down. This means I will have to call back again in a few days when I find the time just to fight to use my points for a simple transaction. Either that or cancel this trip altogether out of frustration.

I have used Apple Pay since it started. Recently upgraded from AE Blue to AE Gold. My new card would no longer work on Apple Pay. Spent 3 weeks with AE technical support and they could not fix problems. Apple support confirmed it was on AE's side. Each call to AE Technical Support was like starting over; with always a statement that it would be fixed in 5 to 7 days. Still not fixed. AE Technical Support lacks feedback, coordination, and expertise.
Spending limit was initially 4k when I opened the account, less than 3 weeks later after adding an authorized user it dropped to 2k. Customer service claims that's not the reason it dropped. BS

Offers decent credit line unlike many cards which offer a card with $300 credit line which means you can hardly use the card, otherwise it affects your credit score. Good rewards and offers are available on AmEx card. Other benefits include 24x7 customer support.
Love my American Express Green Card, Best of the Best credit cards, never disappoints, very user-friendly, great customer service. Now that's a Credit Card.
Great rewards, great benefits, fantastic customer service. As long as your spending habits justify the annual fee, it's hard to go wrong with this
Great card. 0 percent intro rate. No issues currently. High starting credit limit. All in all in enjoying it very much. No complaints
Great card for Delta loyalists. AMEX can’t really be topped for customer service. I can’t see myself letting this one go any time soon.
department: Delta SkyMiles® Reserve American Express Card

content: All good with account but someone at credit repair program removed info. It had +8000 available balance when I was paying on card.

The sole reason I took out this loan was because I had no recent installment loan history on my credit reports. I own my house outright, and haven't had a car loan, mortgage, or anything else for years. I monitor my credit very closely, here and on other sites, and noticed that not having any installment loan history was pulling my score down (very slightly).


This loan did not involve a hard pull or anything (it was pre-approved, as I already have credit cards with Amex), and its interest rate (low single digits) was lower than the cards I paid off with it.


Although I took it out as a 36-month loan, I knew from the get-go that I'd pay it off in about a year, so the fees associated were really reasonable. I set up auto-pay through my checking account, and watched the balance dwindle.


I have nothing but good things to say about this! It was painless, there were no hidden fees or anything shady, no penalty for paying it off early, etc. I highly recommend it.
Great Company with many benefits but it has very high interest rates I need to get this card paid in full. I would not be smart to use this card unless you can pay it in full monthly.
department: Delta SkyMiles® Platinum American Express Card

content: This is a great company but interest is very high. I need to settle with this company on a lower rate. Right now it will take 30 months to pay this off. I normally used this card for travel but, with covid 19 have not done any travel.

American Express by far provides the best customer service of any credit card. They are also the best travel card in existence. For example, they were able to replace my card - the next morning - when traveling overseas.
American Express has always been a great card for me. They have absolutely the very best customer service of any card I have owned.
Great card!! Cash back on purchases! The app is very user friendly! Love WalletHub! My credit card has improved over 60 points since joining WalletHub!
It’s an average card, nothing really special, good for buying groceries or helping a friend or family member establish credit. The card is clear which is neat.
So far I enjoy using this card. It’s easy to pay on at any time. It gives you the option to pay each transaction off as you spend.
It’s a great card and I like the metal of it. Love the bonus points at groceries and no preset spending limit. Only missing a gas perk

I've been using my AX serve for over 4 years. They make it known that it is a prepaid debit card. But when it comes to a hotel hold, it's 30 days and is only considered a cc at that time. The hotel released the funds in 24 hours. But I have to call them to send email or wait 30 days. You can not get cashback. Some merchants don't even take it. I would go with a prepaid PayPal debit MasterCard. You will get your paycheck early on most prepaid debit cards.
Refused to give the welcome bonus points of 75000. So much disappointment for this card for such a hefty fee. Such a Useless card.

39 years as cardmember. I purchased a TV online and when it was delivered it was not what I had ordered so I refused to accept.AMEX Made me pay the return freight. I refuse to pay And proved he was a ConMan. Did not matter this dropped my credit score over 120 points all due to a ConMan and ego at American Express Don’t Ever make major purchases with this card they will not have your back against ConMen. By the way – I sent American Express 83 online reviews stating this was a ConMan and dishonest company, completely ignored by American Express. 39 years as a member and never asked them for anything and they would not cover me like they said they would when I signed for my card
Excellent outstanding love it ever time I use it great rewards excellent outstanding love it ever time I use it great rewards thank you.

It’s a good card, not great. The interest rate seems a little high to me. They do have very good customer service, even if it is not based stateside and they do try to sell you on upgrading to one of their fancier cards with an annual fee every time you call. But, they definitely do take care of you and that is what counts!
Love the plan it program. Very cost-effective with large purchases. Never have an issue and great customer service. I've had this card for many years and never had an issue with it

Aspire card is nice, point earning is great too many benefits to name. Annual fee is high, however, if used correctly, overall benefits outweigh annual fee costs. The reason for 3 stars is due to no credit limit increase even though I use the card regularly and pay off balance monthly or every two weeks.

This card is good for ordinary expenses. The annual fee stated that it would be waived the first year but that did not happen. The annual fee, as was stated on various websites would be waived for the first year, apparently is subject to the direction of the wind. Apparently, AMEX IS REALLY GOOD AT CREATING CONFUSION! Most people would be better off with a Mastercard. It is not worth the fee.
Been customer since 06 and upgraded my card and the dropped my limit never missed payment and nothing changed and they won’t give me good explanation get spark card it pays 2 percent back
It takes a while to get used to how to use it because it's a cash card and there are a lot of rewards with it and there are a lot of awesome features.

I love this card I use it for my everyday shopping I get double miles at restaurants and 1% at other purchases . I received 35,000 bonus miles just for applying good enough for a reward ticket to the Caribbean
It is easy to use app and follows my history and transactions, difficult to understand the use of sky miles, customer service is reasonably responsive. Interest rate is high.
This Cash Back is perfect for grocery and gas. But the credit line will not increase at all. Since you wanna use it for groceries only. AF is $95.

Incredible service, with unmatched benefits. The only card you will ever need! From planes, trains or automobiles, you can absolutely count on AmEx. When traveling, the American Express card gives you a sense of security and comfort.

Amex is the best around, obviously. Hard to steal and great rewards and perks for having an amex. Delta does random special amex offers for points & you can get round trip flights to other countries for like 12-40,000. Just depends on when and where!

Former American Express business credit cardholder. Really really bad... that's all I can say. I tried to leave a lengthy and detailed review, with lots of facts, for you all, but the site refuses to submit it. Key points: 1) AMEX does not back you when a shady vendor mischarges you and you can prove it (In writing). 2) your credit limits will be reduced to unpractical levels, hampering your business, if your balances get too high for their liking, then require you to produce financials until they will even consider reviewing your account to place the limits back to their original dollar amount. This happens even if you pay off all the balances. 3) AMEX will call you on Christmas Eve to give you all the bad news and nothing good. 4) Reward benefits are shrinking quickly and constantly screwed up 5) Interest rates are through the roof 6) Grace periods between charges and payments due is only about three weeks (Many companies are 45 days to as much as 90) 7) Customer service, or should I say lack thereof, I'd rate a 2 out of 10. I dealt with, at least, five different reps to handle three different issues, in less than 9 months of time, the most issues I've had on credit cards in 20 years (I have 12 currently and own three businesses).


These people are Time Thieves, if you can weather the hour-long phone loops of automated BS, you're sure to get an overworked, overwhelmed, underwhelming individual to "help" you. Do yourself a favor, go get a credit card from a credit union!

Their customer support is awful. I signed up for a new credit card that was supposed to have the hefty annual fee waived for the first year. They didn't honor the original promotion and said there is nothing they can do to help me. Everyone is overseas and very hard to understand. Beware before you bank/do business with this company. NO MORALS AND BAD BUSINESS PRACTICES!!!
Amex is simply the best credit card company in the world. Best customer service, excellent products and financial tools for individuals and businesses.
Excellent card and excellent store. Furnished my entire home on this card. would recommend it to new home purchasers. you outfit your entire house as it did.

I have American Express Gold Card for almost 10yrs, I used to pay $95 for membership fee which is crazy and I never benefit from the membership, the card is paid off haven't used for over 3yrs and still billing for fee, I call customers service and they refuse to waive the fee the one time I ever asked, they do not value their customers like me so I just cancel them. AE is not a card company that reaches out to customers they suppress customers. No good stay away. Capital one is extremely better than AE in every way possible number in customer service satisfaction.

We love our AE Blue Cash Preferred credit card. We have been a Blue Cash member now for over five (5) years. We always max out on our cash rewards on everyday purchases and easily come out ahead, in spite of the rather hefty $95 per year membership fee. We're retired here in San Francisco, enjoy a very healthy six-figure plus retirement income. We also sport a perfect FICO (Score 9) credit score of 850. Our credit limit on the Blue Preferred is a more than decent $25K. Not bad for life's everyday purchases! Thank you, American Express. Membership has its privileges indeed! We never leave our home without it! Good luck all and best regards.
department: Blue Cash Preferred® Card from American Express

content: Love this card, accepted everywhere I need it. Love the cash back, paid for my vacation. All recurring charges on this card. Pay it off every month.
I just love this card and all the perks that come with having it. I love the free check-in bag and I love getting 2x miles on things I will have to purchase regardless.
Would've been nice if they paused the annual fee for the year considering no one could travel due to the pandemic, but otherwise great c service and usability.
Excellent benefits and the 4x points for groceries and restaurants is very nice! The sign-up bonus I received, 75,000 points, is an incredible offer for a great card!

Amex does not help the customer. I have had 1 dispute open for more than a year. Calling customer service has not helped, and the dispute process appears to be endless. It needs to be resolved. I have 2 charges from Jan 2020 for tickets through Vivid Seats for what was supposed to be the Country Music Festival in June 2020. We bought $thousands worth of tickets for a family celebration. CMA “postponed / cancelled” the 2020 Fest, but Vivid would not give refunds. June 2020 passed, but no refund, no resolution to the dispute we filed with Amex for the charges. Vivid Seats is fraudulent. One year later; 2021 CMA concert is also “cancelled / postponed”. We still have no tickets or concert for the $thousands we spent. Amex has horrible customer service, and they are unresponsive, unreachable, with no message capability, and do not care for the customer even though we’ve been longtime customers.
AMEX Platinum is my 'go to' card for large purchases, for sure. I enjoy the extended warranty and membership miles! I'm a long-time cardholder and wouldn't be without it for travel.

This is an awesome card! I was approved with just over 6 months of credit history and a 719 credit score. It's a great card for a city person, someone that uses public transportation, takes Uber, eats out....The annual fee is worth every penny!
Use this for the 6% grocery benefit and, now, for virtually all of my daily and non-recurring expenses to consolidate data for budgeting.
Awesome rewards very beneficial with my new business venture and start up. I'm looking to grow my small business this makes it easier.
The American Express Gold Card is a wonderful flexible spending card. We use it for extensive travel and pay it off every month. It does have some rewards.

I do not recommend American Express. After being a customer for over 13 years, out-of-the-blue, without any warning, they lowered my credit limit. I was still a few thousand away from my limit and have never once missed a payment. Also, I had over 20,000 reward points on my card. When I called to connect my card to Apple Pay the customer service rep convinced me to transfer to a cashback card. He said it would transfer over in 24 hours. He did not mention that I would lose all my points I had acquired with the previous card. Such a dirty trick. I called customer service again and he said he would get back to me, but said if it was in writing I would lose any previous rewards, then there was probably nothing he could do. He told me he would get back to me either way in a few days. He never called back.
Very good card for me and my wife. Good travel card. No problems at this point. Great benefits like travel assistance and Uber. No foreign transaction fees.
Thanks, great experience. If I had to do it all over again I would. Excellent credit card for beginners. Easy application process.

Poor company and worse customer service.

$22000 credit limit for ten plus years. Never a single late payment and my credit score has been in the excellent range for as long as I can remember. Never carried a balance over $2000 for more than a month or so.

Tried to make a $4400 purchase with a balance of $1400 on vacation and was declined. Called and was told by a barely intelligible customer service representative that my account was magically "just placed under review". Reduced my credit limit to $1900!!!! They stated that my payment to balance ratio was the reason for the 90+ percent reduction. BULL!!!!

VERY RUDE and unhelpful call center employees who only read prompts and are terrible at communicating. Was told that I could submit my income tax forms for a review and appeal...nope...cancelled my personal Blue card and my business Amazon Prime Amex and will NEVER do business with them again. Stay Away
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content:
This is a very solid card to get your life on track, it introduces you to the AMEX family, and with a few on time payments, it is a stepping stone card to get you a regular AMEX.

AMEX has a very generous limit when you are just starting out. If you need a traveling card, it is better than it's competitor, the Chase Marriott Bonvoy Bold. If you can get this card, consider yourself a "Boss." It is a full fledged, AMEX card for those looking to rebuild their credit, nothing to feel ashamed over when you peel open your wallet, and drop it down at a restaurant in front of your friends! After all, anyone can whip out a Mastercard or Visa, Bosses whip out AMEX!
I love AMEX but unfortunately the overseas customer services is so bad. Also I don't recommend it for eCommerce business, you have to call them everyday to verify the payment.
American Express turn me down for Charles Schwab cash back linked to my broker and retirement account, so I closed the cash everyday card, have 36 cards don't need them anyway.

This is a new card with no annual fee + $150 bonus if spend $1000 in first 6 months, 1-3% cash back reward depending on category with highest % on grocery, 0% APR into 12 or 15 mo, & $200 bonus if spend $3000 at Amazon first 6 mo. Also has plan it/pay it option. So far so good

Got an offer to apply in the mail. I applied online, was instantly approved, but was given a $1,000 credit limit. I applied b/c there's 0% APR for the first 12 months of purchases, a decent sign-up bonus, and b/c we have to do some work on our house, which means making purchases that exceed $1,000 each. The normal benefits are not good enough on their own (e.g., 7x points for dining, but points are worth far less than one cents each, meaning my card that gives me 3% cash back on dining is superior).




My credit score is always at minimum in the high 700s, often exceeding 800. I make well over $100k. I generally get automatically approved for credit lines of at least $10,000. I tried requesting an increase here and Amex turned me down, saying I'd have to wait 90 days. I said I was canceling the card then, but they didn't care; they weren't interested in my business. I canceled the card, and it's their loss.

This is my second most used card in my wallet. The intro offer was 60000 points after spending $4k in 90 days. I admit that is a bit steep, along with the $150 annual fee but their member benefits make up for it.
Great Card with tons of benefits, customer service is top-notch and travel benefits are the best ever. I have ten years with this card.

Have had this card a little over 2 months, am impressed with the benefits and rewards program, customer service has been excellent! Would recommend to anyone who wants a good solid card in their pocket! Had now had card over a year with no bad experiences like this card very much would recommend to anyone!
Great service very convenient use accepted everywhere great card never go wrong around the world by hotel cars rental and restaurants keep up the good work thanks

I have been a Gold, blue, and platinum cardholder for over 33 years and today during the pandemic AMEX revoked all four of my credit cards due to a returned check that I immediately paid in full. SHAME ON YOU AMEX AND THEIR PRESIDENT DOING THIS TO A LOYAL 33LONG YEAR CUSTOMER. AMEX IS THE ONLY CREDIT CARD THAT DOES THIS!!! MY VISA AND MASTERCARD ARE ALL INTACT. I CAN SEE WHY MERCHANTS ARE NOT WILLING TO TAKE AMEX. IF YOU HAVE AN AMEX CARD I SUGGEST YOU CANCEL BECAUSE THIS COMPANY WILL NOT EVER EVER STAND BY YOU ESPECIALLY IF YOU ARE A LOYAL CUSTOMER FOR 33 YEARS. OH THEY ALSO TOOK MY 20,000 MEMBERSHIP MILES AS WELL NO COMPENSATION AT ALL!!!!! I WILL NEVER EVE RECOMMEND THIS CARD!!!! I ALWAYS PAID MY BILLS BEFORE I DID ANYTHING ELSE A LOYAL TEACHER IN TEXAS
Good card I would like a higher credit limit I pay on time and in full before the due date I would like a lower Apr rate and more rewards
department: Clear from American Express Credit Card

content: Excellent customer customer, quick response to false charges. I’m very glad to have this card and hope to keep it open for a very long time. Perfect for rebuilding credit and for unexpected emergencies.
Good card but low starting credit limit compared to my other cards, however the special 500 opening bonus is most definitely worth it plus they are easy with CLI
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: Horrible and Rude customer service representatives. No clear straight answer to my question, impossible to understand representatives because of thick accents. Always reading quickly from a script. I have been a cardmember for 24 years and will be cancelling my account. And yes, I can read, and clearly understand this card is not a debit card, has no preset spending limit, etc.

Grate card gives me 3% cash back at a grocery store, They have the best customer service they're always able to help whenever I have a problem thank you American Express my credit score was 700 when I got the card now at 770.
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: Fantastic customer service, always the easiest to contact and most responsive. I have 3 cards with American Express and have been pleased with all interactions.
American Express has a lot of rewards for its customers. I'm happy to be a new member and I intend to carry this account for a very long time.
American Express is an amazing card with lots of flexibility. I am extremely pleased with the payment over time and use of points to pay charges.
They like to manipulate your credit limit, two different times they lowered my limit because I made a large purchase using my card

long wait time, too much identity verification, and most important the compony is closed on weekends so bear that in mind and i found that very annoying, if you have an emergency to call amex and they are closed how are you going to do.
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: Cash back on really specific things that won’t save me money. Most stores we get cash back on aren’t even in my area or very inconvenient.
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: Great travel card for beginners, offers 60,000 bonus points and a good selection of rewards in travel and shopping. Annual fee though is too high.

One of the great things that I love about this American Express card is that I can charge in pay on my bill as frequently as I choose for instants every day compared to one of my other credit cards I may have a pending charge versus I may charge with my American Express and still come home and say OK let me pay this and once the charge is put onto the card I have possibility to pay that and some of the interest.

Amex takes a long time (7-10 business days) to credit back refunds despite the merchants releasing and returning them immediately. Ironically, when Amex do post them, they postdate them back to the merchant's actual date of at least a week prior yet Amex did not make the funds available at that time. They do not list the refunds - they don't even show pending. The refunds just appear. Not only are these major inconveniences because you think the merchants have not sent the refunds, but the delayed postings make monitoring your account even more difficult.


Also, I have not received a credit limit increase ever in the 10+ years that I have had the account despite perfect payment history, regular usage and zero monthly balance with monthly payoff. Twice a year, I let a balance post so they earn some interest off of me.
department: Delta SkyMiles® Gold American Express Card

content: Great rewards and discounts. There are plenty of ways to use the card. The user interface is absolutely an ease to use and navigate.
This is one of the major credit card brands. It's part of my diversified plan to use more different cards in US since I moved to US in 2019 from Canada where I hold for AE card for decades.

Horrible customer service, zero compassion during challenging for everyone, (except the banks?!) times! Lines are always busy, once you will get connected you can hear other associates laughing in the background while you are trying to have a serious conversation with the telephone worker.

I love this American Express card. It’s so easy to use I’ve never had an issue using it anywhere and paying it off is even easier I can pay online or over the phone with no fees in my available balance is available immediately! This is an overall great card
department: Marriott Bonvoy Brilliant® American Express® Card

content:
Best card Ever! This card is so easy to use and so easy to pay off, I have never had an issue using my American Express or paying it off over the phone or online and have an available credit immediately after paying the balance not to mention the rewards of staying at great resorts for points Accumulated just by using this card!

Overall this is a great card
Rewards are not as competitive as other cards. Also you have to wait until $25 to cash out rewards, could be better. Otherwise good starter card if you are looking for an Amex account,
Lots of opportunities for cash back via special offers and grocery purchases! Numerous additional travel, financial and credit management benefits.

Amex wrongly charged my account with past due balance of $436 instead of $400. Hence putting my account into a deep nosedive. After prompting them of their mistake, they sent me email correcting their mistake.
Excellent card. Love the rewards. I had some issues with the card type. American Express fixed quickly. Loved the customer service.
I have a few credit cards, American Express is the only one that charges me a membership fee I am thinking of canceling the card saving 95.00!

Was nervous about applying for AE card since I had a BK about 7 years ago. I read AE wont approve anyone with a BK. I wanted a card that gave me miles. My Transunion and Equifax credit score was 689, my Fico was 701. AE Approved me for $2000 a year ago. Now they increased it to $4000 only using it a few times since Covid hit. Great offers and customer service. I applied on Credit Karma.
department: Delta SkyMiles® Blue American Express Card

content: Amex has really good customer service. I've done everything I need to do through the app and more importantly able to chat with Amex. Really happy with them so far.
Love the rewards specially if you fly delta, the benefits alone are well worth it, and at the end of each year you get to treat yourself and your loved ones with treat from the members benefit center
department: Delta SkyMiles® Platinum American Express Card

content: Very happy to finally be a member of the AMEX family! Good card, healthy CL with a 715 Experian score, but I’m not too enthused with the 6% supermarket rewards.. I usually go to Harris Teeter for my smaller shopping needs at 30 to $40 every other week.. It doesn’t seem like they accept HT supermarkets at the 6% rate.. Otherwise, it’s a good card and I look forward to my next Amex card, hopefully the new Rose gold card !!
No grace period when paying the card. One day passed the due date and you are hit with penalty APR for 6 months and a late fee. Don't get this card.
It’s Amex. What can you say? They have been a fresh company to work with. I have a line of credit with them that is a great add to my credit mix.

Card was hacked through an order from Amazon and a guy named Mike Bennett used it to get a 910.51 I phone and somehow opened another American Express card in my name. I canceled this card and the other one I had but it still doesn't show canceled. It shows that I opened the account. I did not.
Very good reward program with 6x's points for groceries and 3x's points for gasoline. Online support is excellent as well. Recommend.

Outstanding customer service!

Disputed charges handled quickly.

They monitor account for questionable charges.

Spending data is easily accessible on the website.
Most best credit card in the world. I wish their interest rates were lower. Free credit score, Free credit report and No annual fees.

They closed my account because I didn’t use them as frequently as they wanted me to. If they want to keep their customers, they should communicate via email or letter in the mail stating they want to continue doing business with you as their customer. If you plan on using them on the daily, this would be a good choice.

Very good card with excellent rewards, however American Express didn't give me the highest credit line, I suppose because I have other limits already with cards that have extremely high limits, hopefully though in the near future they'll raise it!
It's my new card for emergencies and I make a few points on gas or groceries and I make sure to pay right away, just to make sure balance stays in 0.00
Been a proud member since 1987 and love my lifetime of experiences that AMEX has offed me through the years. AMEX was how I originally established my excellent credit, while I was still in HS.
Soon to be the only card out of 25 that I will keep and use . I’m a satisfied customer since 1981 and when compared against any other cards American Express is number one
This card gave me my highest unsecured credit line! It also has a credit information system, useful for keeping up with credit changes and score building. Also, good customer service.
Horrible. Member since '78 and cancelled due to inactivity. Not enough usage was explanation. No notification! Very embarrassing.
It’s worth it. The card is amazing. The benefits are tremendous. Even though you have to be purposefully strategic in using the card, it helps you learn the card game.
Continually ask for my physical address which I have given them 3 times; $150 yearly fee... not worth it. Many cards are preferable !

I am a member since 2005. Traveling is needed so I always carry my American Express card. Their bonus and rewards are impeccable. That makes me a satisfied user. Gladly recommend the convenience of usage to my clients.
Love this card ..u are able to make payment and pay balance immediately after a purchase. great cash back rewards 1 and a half percent cash back and lots of perks a+
American Express has very good customer, pleasant and easy to understand service responses. It is a great card to have. I never leave home without it!!

American express wrongly deposited 2 of my direct deposits in to someone else account. They successfully retrieved the money however now they refuse to redirect it into my correct account. They have been holding my money hostage since June 2020. I am about to get a lawyer and proceed with legal action which is the last thing I want to do. I have called and called, and spent countless hours on the phone trying to get it fixed and they have sent me in circles and refuse to help me.

I requested to have my due date moved and it wasn't done. After a few months, apparently it was done and no one informed me that it was finally processed. So I have inadvertently been paying my invoice late every month, getting charged late fees, and losing all my reward points. I don't like working with companies that don't have the best interest of the customer at heart. I use this card a lot. I was expecting to have thousands of reward points at my disposal and instead, I have none.

I've decided to stop using this credit card for purchases since it's obvious that your customers are treated poorly and your representatives show little to no concern for the satisfaction of your card members. I complained about all of this to him and he just said, "sorry, there's nothing we can do". No attempt to make it better. No attempt to work with me to keep me happy. No attempt to compromise.

I know that my business will not be missed but I can only hope that others will notice the callousness of the Amex reps and will opt out of working with your company as well.
Great card that actually earns rewards. The Delta SkyMiles will definitely be redeemed. So, it is good to accumulate rewards that are useful.
American Express is the best of all credit cards - adjusts any errors & refunds very fast & efficient AND always courteous personal help if needed via phone

This card was quick to report $46 over the limit but has not reflected a complete payoff as of the 1st of the month. It is now the 6th and should have reported for the month. The over was reported almost as soon as it went over, so... The rate is on the high-side but AE has always seemed to work with me when needed.

I submitted a dispute regarding a payment of over $2,200. The complaint department was useless and obtuse, only sending me back the documentation I provided them, stating the dispute was closed. Contacted them again and again, the dispute was open and closed two more times with the same outcome. Contacted management, with zero response! Hands down the worst customers service experience in my life. Will never recommend this company or use their card again!!!

5 star review! Currently, my FICO score is linked to your website. I opened Blue Cash on March, 2020 or 2019 but then I closed it on April, 2020 or 2019. Because it was lowering my fico points in Established credit cards. Thank you !

This card is not accepted everywhere. Otherwise it works great. Okay, I need to add more details, well most major retailers would be fine. But some online shops of the smaller scale might give you trouble.
department: The Amex EveryDay® Credit Card from American Express

content: Great card, easy to earn cash back! Don't have to pick and choose specific categories to use my card, in order to earn cash back rewards. For me, that's a great thing. It's my money, let me decide where to spend it.

Made a large payment. AMEX froze my card because I paid too much of my bill at once that month Wouldn't accept my payment for 5 days. But now it provides rewards on Amazon which creates major savings for me.

When I do have to call, I always get to talk to a real person. That’s very important to me. They are always polite and they listen, and always ask if they can be of further assistance. And they address you by your name during your interaction with them. Thank you kindly.
Blue cash preferred card promo of 250 was denied. 3 months of waiting after 1000 purchases and 8 weeks of investigation. I was scammed.

Locked out of my account when my Face ID wasn’t working properly. I don’t have the card handy since I don’t use it daily and we are moving. I can’t reset my password unless I have the card or I have to cancel it. That is insane. I will never use another Amex card once I’m able to close this card. It’s not recommended at all. So far Discover and Visa have been the best!
department: The Amex EveryDay® Credit Card from American Express

content: best part is the centurion club. too restrictive on use of travel credit. they need to look at the sapphire card to see how to do it right.
I normally use my American express card and pay some of my everyday expenses,it keeps me from having to carry cash and helps in case of unforseen emergency

It’s a good credit card but some of the loan offers are not available And I have really good credit,I have called them and nobody really gets back to me I think they should really do a better job offering small personal loans like they used to do especially what’s going on right now with Covid I just don’t understand why they would do this
Very Inexpensive and good card to have! Good rewards although I would like to have better interest rates. American Express is obviously a good name in credit cards.
I love this card it gives me plenty of free points and rewards . Everyone should definitely put the card in their collection of important cards to utilize .

Love Amex and the Offers that it comes with I am a huge Delta loyalist and this card gives me freedom that I want! Always wanting to be apart of the Amex Club, and knew a Delta card was the way for me. New goal is to get a green or gold Amex with a higher credit limit!
Great card. AMEX has best customer service. A hair above USAA and PENFED. Usually my go to card in and circumstance. Been a member since ‘74.

I like flying Delta so this card makes sense. The annual fee is a little high but the first year I got a TSA credit (it is so nice not to have to wait in line!) and a lot of baggage checked for free so it MORE than made up for the $250. I also like the access to the Delta airport lounges.
In two more months I will receive a companion certificate from Amex. So after I used my Bank of America Royal Caribbean Visa Signature card to purchase a cruise, I will use this card for the airfare. I will buy one roundtrip ticket for me and my husband gets a FREE roundtrip. When I use my BofA cruise reward credits on this cruise for onboard purchases like alcohol and shore excursions, this trip will be super cheap! I am getting very good at working the rewards card system. LOL.
I got this card with a credit rating of around 680ish. AmEx does a hard inquiry via Experian. I would recommend seeing if you can prequalify on AMEX website. They do a soft inquiry only. If they offer you the card, and you agree to TOS, they then will do a hard pull. FWIW, Wallethub said I had a "fair" chance of acceptance.
Credit line was initially very low at $1750 but it has tripled over the year due to my CS in the very good range now. The customer service, like Discover, is personal and outstanding.

Amex is the worst. I have a +800 credit score and great income. After a month of using the card Amex suspended my card and wanted me to send them my tax returns. MY TAX RETURN! When I refused they cancelled both this card AND my Amex Business card. I highly recommend anyone reading this to get a Chase Sapphire (Reserve) card instead.
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: Current Platinum Card holder and AMEX customer for over 10 years. Company does not care for its cardmembers. They've regularly and yet arbitrarily played trombone with my "preset spending limit". It's exhausting for me to keep track of and frankly it's embarrassing for them.

Don't use this card, they will rip you off with interest and late payment fees.. On top of it, they won't allow you to use the card ... It's better to have Capital One with low card limit than paying $200 in card fees and many other charges to it.. Very disappointed after having gold card for 10 years. Would never recommend my friends and family for this card.
Platinum Amex Card As an above card holder, I am very disappointed with this card as every time I ask for credit I am denied. REPLY
Great card very clear on rewards offered and welcome bonus card arrived on day they said it would Amex answers all your questions and always helps you

Amex is a solid card - with a really terrific web/mobile interface. Great alert and notifications, and a customer service department which is the best-in-class. The only other credit card which has excellent service has been Discover card.
We have had this card for over 20 years and if offers a lot of pluses Airline pluses. Their service is great if you have to call them.
Excellent Perks and Sign Up Bonus. Well worth the annual fee if you travel or are a big spender. If you pay in full every month a charge card helps avoid high utilization.

Great card for groceries and gas. Groceries are 6 percent and gas is 3 percent. Tolls and parking are lumped into the 3 percent which works great for me. Easily covers the $95 annual fee. Recommend card. Only wish it had a higher % for dining

I love my Card. I set up the alerts and it lets me know my spending.

I use this card for lots of different purchases and have never encountered any problems while using this card. Keep up the amazing work!!!

Unfortunate that UnAmerican Express has decided to participate in the Cancel Culture. When I joined up with Amex in the 80s both personal and business, I had no idea that I was joining a political PAC. Please go back to being a services company and leave the politics and protests to others.
I appreciate the care and fore thought of keeping my credit card in good standing when I have questions and I call to assure all is in good order. Thank you.

They never raise credit limit in spite of great payment history. When I have called about it, they say I don’t use card enough. I typically pay off to keep utilization score lower. Least useful card in my wallet.

This card is great. Customer service also excellent. I opened this card with just under 690 fico. Opening line of credit was $2000 and was doubled after 60 days. I've had the card now for just under 3 years with a current credit line of more than $18,000. I've paid in full about half the time I've had the card. Otherwise, I've made sure to pay about 50% or more of my balance. The cash back rewards add up and are very simple to redeem for statement credit. Very happy to have this bad boy in my wallet!

Amex has always been my go to card,

It’s nice knowing that I have it if I ever needed it.

Whenever I contact them they are very helpful
Easy to keep track of expenses. Watches out for fraud. Well recognized when traveling abroad. It is the only card you need in your wallet.
Great card, awesome rewards categories. Will keep this card indefinitely. All Amex products are great, with great rewards categories.
Great Card, with consistent usage some really good travel perks! Good card for frequent flyers, and folk who enjoy staying in hotels.
Wonderful card! Always very helpful if needing to call for assistance but that doesn't happen very often so that’s nice as well. Thank you guys!

Horrible Customer Service - I have been on the phone or chat for over 1.5 hours trying to cancel my card. Tried calling and chat. They make it impossible to cancel. It is time I changed it up, never going to use this card again.
Very reliable card; easy to pay bill in full each month via computer, with my choice of which of several bank accounts. Good security features.
I like the options to earn points from various retailers. I like that there is no annual fee. The Interest is okay but would like it to be lower.

They actually called when a shady transaction appeared from a company that I had done business with, but not with this card. Still don't know how they got my card info and was able to charge me. Anyway, they canceled payment and sent me a new card overnight.
It works almost everywhere. Always able to speak to a live person. Helps with building your credit and credit score. Rates can be high
satisfied with this credit card that i’ve been utilizing.
Es tremenda tarjeta muy prestigiosa , excelente servicio , en mi cuenta , la cambiaron porque Costco está con otra compañía y se cambio automáticamente NO porque quise .
I love this card, I hardly ever use it, except for travel.
Amazing card, and great to use! Amazing rewards to use for users with the card! Support team is amazing always helps me and always gives great responses!

After six years, I'm done. They can't figure out how to block merchant charges, and their dispute process seems to be largely explanations of why it's your fault. Never had a problem with Visa. Amex is a tired bread, past its prime.
They monitor charges that look suspicious and notify me. The card is accepted by most retailers and with little difficulty. I highly recommend the American Express card.
We got this card for a balance transfer. It's been fantastic for that. It has a lot of other bells and whistles that seem really great. The customer service is wonderful.
Good discounts on baggage and in-flight purchases. Online balance management gives you twenty four hour access to your account. Able to make payments online
Great rewards cards. Set up automatics and never be late on a payment. Great customer services. No annual fees. Will increase your credit score quickly
Great card and customer service in the phone with the agent. I like their card benefits. I highly recommend getting this card or another American Express card.

Great card for travel, Miles accumulate quickly, nice sleek metal design. Great, quick, knowledgeable customer service along with Great card benefits and travel insurance. Payments credited instantly, so no waiting around for access to your credit line when making purchases.

Just rec'd it a couple days ago. Made 1 charge so far. Likes: App is really easy to use. Customer service is okay too. Dislikes: The card looks and feel is weak. The card feels cheap and whimsy. I was a bit disappointed in that aspect. I'll get over I'm sure (LOL!)
department: The Amex EveryDay® Credit Card from American Express

content: I really enjoy this card. I use it for groceries and eating out. The sign up bonus of 50k points is really nice. I normally fly Delta, and 1 round trip for me and my wife would cost $120 for checked bags (2 bags going, 2 bags back), with this card it is free. Since we fly 2-3 times per year, it's a no brainer.
Great overall experience with this card but automatic limit increases are slow. Customer service is great but promo points for added members have not been awarded after almost a year of waiting.
It’s a good card for groceries and streaming but unless you spend a lot on groceries you can find a better value with the no annual fee one
My Delta SkyMiles AMEX is the card I use for my travels. Earning travel credits is fast, direct, and easy. It is a great card to have.
Connor ID # 8912081 was awesome very good customer service and very polite and generous. Never had a better experience, this is why I choose American Express
Great card with a generous credit line easy website to navigate along with a user friendly phone app I would highly recommend this card
Cash back rewards, split payment options, a variety of payment plans with 0 interest and fixed monthly payments to pay down large purchases
i’ve had this card for a few years now, it’s the best cashback card for me. I spend on the things I normally do and get great rewards.
I had a renovation in my house , I used my card to buy supplies for the renovation now I’m paying back. I pay back in full anyway . Thank goodness
American express has helped me regain my standing with credit decisions and a clear picture going forward and I have leaned on them through troubled times.

So far so good with this card. Love the travel rewards although I don’t use them very much. I have had no problems as of right now. They have made everything easy to check with their app and also now I can make payments in advance.

Not a bad card. The big issue I have with this card is I usually get a few cards from each company. They have this rule that you can't get a sign on bonus if you already have one of their cards. A big mistake in my opinion and it makes them look cheap
I have been with American Express for many yrs now, I have made all my payments on time never late once but when I requested for a limit increase I was declined.
That’s the most amazing credit card I have ever known. Flexible and gives more ways to pay it off, not hurting your credit and a lot more. I’m sure anyone will like it.

I had a $12,000 limit. When I relocated, I took advantage of the "Plan It" feature of the card to buy a few things. Despite never exceeding 30% of the limit, and despite making on-time payments for far more than the minimum payment, they cut my credit limit to $4500 due to "high usage," which made my utilization skyrocket and my credit rating tank. What's the point of offering that feature if they're not actually going to allow a person to actually pay over time? This is not a charge card! It's a revolving card!

American Express was the first card I had when ...I was young...and I recently applied, and was approved...I love Amex. . had to get this card again...Great customer service one the best credit card to have...Loyal customer !!.... Thank you Amex for always being there !

Everywhere on the web you read that American Express is so convenient because it offers you an instant card number as soon as you are approved online. That's a big fat lie. If they choose to not give you one for whatever reason, there's no explanation, there's nothing customer service can do online, you just don't get it. That purchase you planned to make right away? Forget it. Will they expedite your card to you? Forget it! You have to wait more than a week to get it in the mail. is it for your identity protection? That's complete BS because I'm willing to give them any other information they need. They just don't want to spend the money to expedite it and they don't want to give me a reason why. One might even suspect that they are hoping not to have to pay the initial sign on bonus if I'm not able to make the minimum number of purchases in 6 months.
department: Blue Cash Preferred® Card from American Express

content: I’ve not had a problem since I’ve been a member with them. I love how I have options to pay in full or I can plan out how to pay for my charges

Missed cash back and the worst experience of their customer service. I use AE because their AE offer is attractive. I added one offer of 24S SPEND $500 GET $100 BACK to my card. And I made purchase on Nov 27. The offer expired at around Nov 30. I did not receive the cash back and connect to representative on Dec 07. They checked the purchase date and amount. They asked me whether i could see the offer in my account. I said i could see it until Dec 02 and it has disappeared because it is expired. After that, they told me that they could check the expired offer at their end and can't see it. They said I never added the offer to my card. That's impossible because i checked it everyday from the day before i purchase to Dec 07. I checked it everyday, and talk to my boyfriend. He also saw it is in my account. That's the fact! I could not accept this reason that i never added it to my account. They distorted the fact! How about i have the screenshot of the offer in my account? Will they insist that i never added it? That means i should take a screenshot after every purchase to verify my purchase? The worst experience and maybe i will cancel my card with it.

You may not be able to influence the weather or control your competitors, but the level of service you provide is completely within your control. That’s why you should always be cooking up ways to wow your customers.

Switched to Sapphire Preferred because they gave me an excellent credit line and Amex wouldn’t with excellent credit. My score is 799 for reference. I have been with Amex for at least 6 years and now closing both my worthless cards.

Over 20 years ago took my two children on a sparsely populated island in the West Indies. One of the children aged 10 became very ill and dehydrated. I called American Express for help since there was not a hospital on the island. The American American Express office was amazing. They told me to get to the airport and if there were no flights in the next few minutes they would send medical team by jet. By chance there was a small plane leaving within a few minutes. We literally jumped on the floor. Meanwhile, my child was in very bad shape and could not speak. Upon arrival in Miami, an ambulance appeared and customs agents to keep moving and get to the hospital. American Express talked me through everything and were nice beyond description. When we arrived at the hospital , the doors open and it was amazing. There were more than two drs and nurses. My daughter lived which was wonderful. Our dr said my daughter would have passed within half and hour without medical attention. American Express was incredibly amazing saving my daughter’s life
department: The Platinum Card® from American Express

content: HORRIBLE AT HANDLING CASE .... I had identity theft this company made me wait 4 months after locking my account to get into I had sent over 48 faxes notarized and thump print this was the worst ever.
I like American Express and recommend my friends I definitely will keep using the service. I'm using their services for 3 years they are good
Great benefit is that when a payment is made online the credit is available immediately. Hotel perks are nice too!!
Paying on time is a necessary evil, don't expend more that you can't afford...!!! Good credit is an important factor of one daily living. Keep up !!!!
A credit card that I use all times.
