content: I absolutely love it and see a long road up ahead. It's nice to know I have security when I need it, thanks American Express, I choose you!

I started with the blue prefer cash and I want to say I am very satisfied with the card along with all the benefits that comes with it, not to mention the great customer service in a few times I had to call AMEX. So overall, highly recommend it
I use this card to purchase supplies for a small Etsy shop. I had 2 companies charge my card and issue a credit, neither charge or credit shows up on my statement. This POOR record keeping!
Great experience and good service. This is so useful because it is accepted everywhere. Also, they offer insurance on items if damaged or stolen depending on situation
It is very difficult to understand their interest rate, when annual fee is due because not all is available on home page. You have to go through every page to figure out why your 0 balance is $99.
I paid amex in full and they never gave us anything. No rewards, nothing! I would get rid of this card, But I cut it up instead. Not impressed at all!!

Solid 1.5% cashback card with $25 minimum redemption. Rewards also trail a month (31-62 days after purchase), which isn't ideal. Customer service is great and available via phone or chat. They offer soft pull CLI (frequently 3x), so long term limits can be pretty high.

Good card to travel with; particularly abroad.

Traveling on points/miles has a good amount of options. The affiliation with airlines is broad.
Always pay in full never offered anything no rewards nothing. However some features are fine the cash back system isn’t as high as others, and never missed payments reflects an outdated fico

Awful arrogant East Indian customer service people.


Puts through scheduled credit cards a day or 2 early.


Turns past due accounts over to Zwicker and Associates.
Why in the Hell would my credit score drop six points on the balance of credit card that is paid in full every month for the last twenty years????
Great Service Have had card for years and use it regularly. Will continue to get rewards for using and applying then to my account.
This card is excellent. This card help me a lot because can I buy, make payments my bills at the time and can I enjoy and realize my dreams.

American express is the worst. I have a very high credit score and when I apply for the card they did not say anything that I am not eligible for the welcome bounce and now after 4 month they said I was not eligible without giving me any explanation. This is absolute fraud.
My AMEX Platinum card is outstanding. Great service, great benefits like travel bonus, TSA free enrollment, access to executive Delta lounges and more!!
Quick credit approval and good starting limit. Used this card for 0% interest for 12 months on airline ticket purchase. Transferred balance after introductory offer expired. Served me well.

Company Profits first - Customer Service last. They chose to use COVID as a way to improve profits at the card holder's expense. I pay a $450 annual fee for the Marriott Bonvoy AMEX card. I get 100% of this back from hotel stay credits. But, during no-travel COVID, I had to continuously cancel trips and couldn't use the hotel credits. I called them up for help, and they said there is nothing they can do.
I use this card for cash back on fuel and supermarket. 1500 per year in cash back, I’ll gladly pay the $95 annual fee. Started with 4K and now have 22k in limit in 2 years.

i appreciated it allot when they understood i just forgot to make my payment and took my late payment fee away when i missed the payment by a day those fees really hurt so i was very pleased with their kindness

If I could give them a negative star I would! I have been carrying multiple Amex cards since 2002. In the last few years I have had issues with bills that were double charged and eventually had them fixed. I even had to get legal representation involved a few times. This year I have paid a late fee almost every month. I have set up my account to notify me in advance of the bill being due because I went paperless and yet I do not get notified. I have been charged $400 over the last 11 months in late fees. These are the first late fees I've paid to a credit card company in my 50 years. Every payment was made on the day it was due or 2 days later and yet I was told that they could not take it off. I'm done doing business with them. They are unethical and have their service agents lying to customers. Welcome to the next evolution of American Express!
Surprised that I got this card considering my previous experience with AMEX back in the day. However, it was nice to get one with a pretty decent credit limit too!

It has been a good card with lots of perks. The miles are good, you get a companion ticket per year, and you get free access to Priority lounges in airports around the world. You can also get Global Traveler or TSA PreCheck paid for by the card.
Great card, I’m glad to be with Amex, love the cash back offers and all the other extra ways to save money and benefits the card has.

I have had this card for some time. I intend to use it but the parameters are a little hard to understand. I'm also a little fuzzy on how to access the account online. I would like to use it, but am unsure of terms. I don't hear from them much.

Amex is such a poor company now. No follow-thru and I go through #$#$ every time I have an issue -- the reps are nice enough, but nobody at their customer service level is empowered to do anything. Everything is handled through 'cases' and they never follow up. The aggravation is not worth it. There are several banks that do a better job and will pay credits the month of INSTEAD of the month late that amex does. I also never received my sign up bonus despite several calls.

I really love amarican express, but they definitely lack in the knowledge department! I understand they have so much cards to memorize and so many offers and things to remember but if you’re not ready to give accurate knowledge then you should say excuse me for a min let me confirm that. But no you go on and give false information and then when they fuck up they say we are sorry. Well yeah damn right you are but at least make it right!!! Fix what you did! But no, they are too big now to care at all about fixing a mistake they did!

Was late 3 days to pay off my card. Only used it twice both when traveling. Anyway I was. Charged $30 that I don’t have. Customer service from what I could understand could care less. Horrible customer service. Can’t afford it not going to worry about it
Excelente buen servicio al cliente great card excellent customer service I recommend card for pleasure or business .
No fees, highest credit limit offered thus far (me). Great deals, and great rewards program. Extremely happy a month in, and plan to continue with American Express.

I used to really like this card until you cut my limit back by thousands! I feel disrespected and not worthy when I discovered what you did! I’ve never missed a payment or been late on a payment and without warning you cut back my limit! So I’ve paid my balance to 0 and promise to never use this card again! In a business such as yours with all the competition you disrespected a outstanding customer! SMH! If your dumb asses would of just reached out to me you would of realized what was going on in my life!
My First credit card. Working Fine. I recommend it. ? my credit score is rebuilding. I hope than be better in near future. I love it!
Thank you very much.

Tricksters. They offered hotel benefits when I signed up for platinum. I plan a whole trip and book through AMEX. Since I booked flights and hotel together I forfeit my hotel benefits?! ARE YOU F#$%ING SERIOUS?!
Told me to write something down on the right because I hate you people and this is stupid that you make me do this but that’s what you wanna do is if this is many characters as you want to read
Amex is a great card to have for emergencies and all other shopping experience. I would recommend this card for those people that are interested

Terrible service, they closed my account because they made my credit go down too far because they put 2 incorrect late payments. Now that I’ve made payment plan to pay off the balance they’ve decided to change it without my permission and give me 2 more late payments for no reason.
American Express has been right there for me and has helped us greatly and still are, great card excellent company ? it has a good rate!
I really didn't expect to be approved, but I was...and with an initial $1,000 limit. It may not seem like a lot, but I sure appreciate it. Within the first year, AMEX tripled my credit limit.

El peor servicio al cliente que puede haber. Nunca recibi un producto que pague con una tarjeta de American Express. Realice la reclamacion y le dieron la razon a la tienda donde realice la compra sin investigar abolutamente nada porque segun ellos es mi responsabilidad que no lo recibi. O sea parece que yo trabajo para USPS y debi entregarme yo misma el paquete. De lo contrario no veo como seria mi responsabilidad cuando pague $10 de envio mas $20 por el producto y no recibi nada. Una clienta menos la cual nunca se retrazo en sus pagos.
Good option, better rates available elsewhere. The process is made easy and fairly quick from approval to distribution. Would recommend.

They lowered my credit limit on their based on my credit score change.

This has not and NEVER has been a factor in me paying my AmEx. I worked SO HARD to get my credit up and for this card.

VERY disappointed in this practice and at a whim.
I use the card too often, but very convenient, great rewards and deals. Just maxed the Mofo out, then paid it off, cha-Ching! Guess we’re gonna go to Vegas again and spend spend spend! Bahahah

Had an issue with a news subscription service debiting my Amex card without notifying me in advance of renewal and cost for the upcoming year. I became aware of the charge to the card several days after it happened. The news organization said "Ha ha, you can't do anything about it." Essentially I'm stuck with this news subscription for another year despite wanting to cancel it.


I complained to Amex, told them to rescind the charge, but they did nothing to protect me. They used the "fine print" to justify this merchant's unethical practice.


I have many news-related subscriptions because of my position. Not one has ever pulled this stunt. Amex does not support its cardholders who challenge bad practices by unscrupulous and unethical companies. So I'm ripping up the card and never using Amex again.


I would caution everyone to be aware that when the chips are down Amex is not going to be there to support the lowly cardholder. Rather, they have the backs of big business who can get away with trampling on the little guy.
Great!I am glad I finally got one, now I just want a better one. They just need to report sooner. But I am glad I am finally in the family.
This is the best reward card period, I have them all but being able to charge any amount at anytime using the Platinum Card beats them all.
Customer service is great no problems with the card so far. The app is really easy to use and pay your statement through. You can set credit limits on extra cardholders.

Just got this card with a 772 Experian and 749 TU. WH said by odds were "fair" so go figure. They gave me a $10,000 CL and so far, I've enjoyed using it.


I have the Rose Gold Amex charge card and Platinum Delta Sky Miles credit card as well. FWIW, I waited til 91st day after receiving platinum card to request 3x credit line increase. It worked. So I'll wait 90 days and then request 30k limit on this card. Thanks to others on this website, I've gained valuable insight. And to think less than 2 years ago my CS was in low 500s.


Pay off any collections, keep utilization below 10% if you can. If you cannot, pay card off as soon as you can so you'll rebound ASAP. Good luck!

content: Great. I love my credit card thank you so much for allowing me to have it. It is amazing. Can’t wait to see what’s in store for the future
After 40 years, this loyal card holder, with NEVER a late payment, is very disappointed with the customer (non)service received and I will be canceling our family's account immediately. Denise N

Ive had one of their cards with a 1000 credit line for 2 years and they refused to give me a credit line increase . My FICO score was lower when I got the card and over the time of two years it has gone way up and they refused to still increase my credit line. I've made many purchases and paid in full always on time. I went to Discover and they gave me a credit line of 10,000 after I closed my American express account.. I fell out of my chair. Don't waste your time with American Express!
Amex is great. Truly a pleasure to be a customer of theirs. I would not hesitate to have another card with their organization. Thanks!

They are fast to report to credit agencies that you have spent money on your card, but could take months to report that you have paid them off. This is a nightmare to those of us who want to improve our credit. Also with a credit score of almost 750 I do believe 23 percent is to high of a intrest rate. I paid off 8,800 in 7 months after I was told they would not lower interest rate
Very seldom use of this card as it was not widely accepted in the retail world. a great card for Business transactions personally I like visa and discover better

I’ve been a member since 2008. And I’ve always been taken care of by there customer service. No matter what it was that I was calling for, they made me feel like I was the only customer that mattered.
Solid card with no AF, useful when other 5% cards aren't on one of the categories listed on the main page.

This is an awesome card! I was approved with just over 6 months of credit history and a 719 credit score. It's a great card for a city person, someone that uses public transportation, takes Uber, eats out....The annual fee is worth every penny!
hilton honor from amex is excellent card I love it huge benefits with this card I really love this card and I recommend to all peoples to have it

Everything about American Express is disgraceful. I signed up for a Cash Magnet card under a promo offer for 0% interest for 15 months, $200 bonus for a minimum spend, and 1.5% cash back on purchases. I was approved for the card, had been using the card to purchase material for a project and then a month in received an interest charge of $150 even though I paid the minimum payment and it was supposed to be 0% interest for 15 months. I also was not receiving any cash back or other bonuses. I called Amex to figure out what was going on and they told me, I wasn't eligible for the promotional offers. When I asked why, they couldn't tell except for someone in the "specialty department" decided they removed those options for me. I had an option between this Cash Magnet card and 3 others from different creditors and ultimately decided on this card because it had the best offer. Only to find out, they removed the sign-up offers from my account without ever notifying me! They wouldn’t put any of this writing of why I did not get the offer bonus after being approved and wouldn’t look up or share any notes or transactions on my account. Complete abuse of power, fraud, and disgraceful business. I ended up paying off the $15k balance to a $0 after they refused to do anything for me and then they charged me an additional $105 of interest chargers AFTER my balance was $0. I will never use Amex again because of this complete fraud and intend on taking additional action to report this.

I keep this card because I fly Delta several times each year. However, with Covid eliminating my time on airplanes, I'm wasting the $99.00 annual fee. You can't blame the card for Covid-19 and once the world of travel experiences the benefits of a vaccine, I'm sure I'll use this card again more frequently. They've tried to add bonus miles and categories to remain relevant but face it -- American Express + Delta = Travel and right now, Travel isn't happening
This is a great card to have with no annual fees to worry about and great rewards when you pay in full, travel or even when you are dining out
They give the oprtunity to create my credit because I dont have any!!!They were the only one that give the oportunity!!!Thank U!!!
Never had better customer service. Always called and notified of strange activity. Quick to replace a card when lost. Never had any problem unresolved!
The interest is way too high, I’d like it to be lower so I can actually pay it off. I’ve been paying it off for 3 years and it’s still maxed out.

I don't have pleasant experience with American express business card. Applied for business blue credit card and its been pending for a month. Provide tons of documentation but they keep asking more. Will not recommend to family or friend.

i don't understand that why they pull my credit first if they have to verify documentation to issue credit card. What the inquiry is all about
Great card...amazing customer service! The chat online is great if you don't want to wait on the phone.I would recommend this card to friends and family.

Beware when Dealing with American Express. American Express can be very misleading and dishonest. Maybe its the card company or the people that they hire to do handle there accounts services. Beware they will tell you one thing and do another. The people that you talk to on the phone are not honest and they do lie do not trust.
Great card , awesome offers!! Amex always gives premier customer service, rewards are top of the line. It’s a charge card which means it must be paid in full every month.
American Express has not taken my name off this account. It's showing as a positive open account and it's affecting my credit terribly.
American express is great.

First let me say I have been a loyal customer of American Express since 2012. I purchased a gift card for a service from a company that went out of business due to the COVID pandemic. My dispute was denied because American Express could not get in touch with the vendor and purchase protection did not cover gift cards. I used American Express because I was under the impression that they backed me and my purchases. The $100 is more important to them than my business. I am highly disappointed and will pay off my balance and shred my card. So beware if you think American Express has your back......because they do not!

I can always count on my American Express customer service representatives to inform me of all of the latest parks related to my card use as well as any rewards that I may have earned with my consistent use of their cards.
One of the best credit cards so far I do really like it thanks American Express for let me have this credit card I really appreciate you guys

I have use Amex Gold Card for almost everything. Have offered a nice perks. I have Chase Sapphire and Freedom with credit lines of $5k. With Amex I really have to mindful not to over spending since it have no preset limit of credit. Great card to keep in your wallet.

Had this card for over 40 years. Their customer service is always knowledgable and responsive. Their security is outstanding - in these days when everyone gets hacked eventually, they have always proactively reached out to make everything right and overnight a new card at no cost to me.

Bad rating only because totally incompetent isn't a choice. Worst company ever to deal with. Just trying to retrieve older statements from an account I closed a couple of years ago after 20 years of using Amex card. A simple task with BofA, Chase and Barclay accounts I have. A stroll through HELL with Amex. It's this kind of idiotic Amex customer service why I gradually started using other credit cards in the first place. I see nothing has changed and and it has only reinforced my decision to drop them completely. Don't understand how they stay in business.

I Have Had American Express Credit card for 3 yrs Never Been missed a payment they dropped my credit line in Half without any warning saying they checked my credit is why they lowered it my score is 703 Not Bad In My Opinion so I'm paying them off which I only owe them 300 Hundred dollars and telling to stick it were the sun don't Shine
Great airline and very accommodating to my family. Lots of trips using miles that are little cost. Clean planes. My family used Delta and is very pleased.
This a great card. Earning potential is as good if not better than the Sapphire Reserve. I use this card as much as I can when I get the chance to.

After having two AMEX cards for 22 years, I’m cancelling. Not worth it. One card is Platinum that I pay $550 per year for supposed perks. Never hardly use it although I used to and earned some points. But now I’m on vacation and they put a spending limit on my card because my history shows no balance. ???? They want me to prepay my estimated expenses then they’d be glad to let me use my money. Not worth their annual fees. Out of touch with what normal customers want.

I like 'em. Travel benefits are good:

Earn 2X miles on Delta Purchases

Earn 2X miles at restaurants

Earn 2X miles at U.S. supermarkets

Earn 1X miles on all other eligible purchases‡

First Checked Bag Free

No Foreign Transaction Fees

20% Back on In-Flight Purchases

Inside line on concert tix: American Express Experiences - someday we'll get to do this again.

Global Assist® Hotline

Car Rental Loss & Damage Insurance

Several other benefits
Love the customer service and the points this card delivers. Also love getting a companion ticket on flights once a year and getting a lot of free upgrades
American Express Blue, was the best credit card I ever used!!! The rewards were excellent! I cannot wait to get this card (again)! Thank you American Express! Joseph Pike..

Amex was offering me 35K points for $4K spend over 6 months. When I got the card, I called to activate and confirm the offer. They told me the bonus offer had been reduced to $4K over 3 months. I immediately filed a complaint and they said it would take 3 weeks. I asked if I could send over the screenshot of my offer and they said no. When I called back to find out the decision, they said the $4K in 3 months stands. The agent offered to reopen the case with my screenshot but it would take 6-8 weeks for a decision. What nonsense. Such a terrible experience.

Awesome customer service. Any problems I had with a overcharged they fix my situation. I’m so thankful to have American Express. I will definitely applied to upgrade my American Express account Thank you

Interest rate is a little on the high side, but, this is a pretty good card. They have good rewards and additional offers from different companies you can add to your card. They also have a feature called Plan It to take large purchases and break them up into manageable payments spread out over 6 to 36 months where you pay a monthly fee vs standard interest rate. I have done this twice and the cost ended up being about 1/2 of my APR.
Always great customer service and the best companion when you’re traveling or if you’re looking to have exclusive access to a variety of cool events.

"American Express increased my August Minimum Payment amount after I made the payment"

In my August 2020 credit card statement, there was $40 minimum payment due. I made the payment 6 days before the due date.

American Express charged me $29 for late payment fee, saying that the minimum payment was $48 and I did not pay the remaining $8 before the due date.

This is a Scam they are running on many customers.

I've been with American Express for 7 years now and had a $33k credit limit. I've never missed a payment, paid late, or given them any reason for concern. Today I tried to make a $5k purchase and my card was declined. I call them to see if it was something I needed authorize and was told that my credit limit has been decreased from $33k to $1,500. Yes, you read that right; they took away $31,500 of credit line. They told me because I don't spend the full limit of my card, they reduced it to what I actually use. The only way to potentially increase my limit again was to send them bank statements, pay stubs, and tax returns. Just because I don't use the full amount regularly doesn't mean I won't need it at some point, but apparently they don't care. I am extremely disappointed with how American Express handled this matter and I will be taking my business elsewhere. It's absolutely astonishing the lack of customer service and loyalty they have to their members.
Great company, will return when my credit improves. American Express has so many offers and benefits, I recommend to anyone. Look forward to AA.
Just wanted this card for the prestige of having a Amex Card. Use it to keep account active. Not a great rewards card but does have some perks.
I love this card. We use it for everything to get miles from groceries to larger purchases. We get a free companion ticket each year as well.

Only points for Hilton, picky with credit limit.

Better options on the market with more perks. Hilton honors good but American Express difficult to deal with.

Hi I gave American Express Blue Cash Everyday card a 5 star because the`re the best. My starting credit limit was $2000,it's now 10k. I`ve been with them since 2018. They have the best customer service.
This Credit card has been closed for 6 years, but TransUnion is showing that it is active. Something is wrong. Please delete this from TransUnion.
Well worth it! currently getting statement credits on our cell and internet monthly cost plus on any small business purchases (these are for a limited time but I'll take it).
I am paying on time and improving my credit score and yet you reduce my credit limit drastically right after I paid off the credit in full with no explanation.
Delta SkyMiles Reserve card gets me easily to platinum status which means economy comfort or first on all flights which is a huge benefit

Very disappointed! I used to consider my Amex credit cards are my number 1 cards. Put aside all other credits and just used Amex. I called costumer service on Sep. 10th because the hotel has money on hold even though I paid the full amount. Costumer representative told me "you have to call them, you stayed at the hotel not us" ?? I was chocked of the way he was talking to me. I called again to speak to a supervisor to file a complaint but the representative said she won't be able to take my call and she will call me next day morning. Next morning no call still, 11 am.
Love american express, great card with great perks , would recommend to friends and family . Get one you won't be disappointed , great benefits.
Great card to rack up sky miles! No annual fee! They offer a lot of great tools and free FICO score! I've had this card for 13 years!

This is a great card for racking up Hiton Honors points quickly. You can earn 5 points on grocery store, gas station, and restaurant purchases, and 7 points when used for stays at Hilton properties. It's my favorite card.

Nothing is more important than customer service, they showed their true colors after the pandemic started which in comparison to other credit companies is absolute s**t. Don’t waste your time with these guys, they have canned decisions made by a f*ing machine, humans in this company lack the empathy to retain their customers.

They provide great customer service and their products are awesome... I appreciate their attention to their new programs like PLAN IT...Their bonus offerings are very timely...Great corporate and consumer support....
Good benefits, good customer service. I like the promotion benefits and their bonus points. I have been using the cards for about a year and enjoy it alot.
this is my longest card, its alway been the handiest when traveling & they have always been there. if you travel you must keep AE at all times.

I like how Amex reports regularly to the credit bureau, not only when you incur debt This is very important to me because I feel when you pay a debt off it shouldn't take long to reflect that information on your credit report.
0% APR on purchases and balance transfers. This card allowed me to pay off my higher interest card and the standard minimum payment will have it paid off when my promotional APR expires.
Pays highest cash reward for super markets. Other rewards are adequate but other cards by more. It allows me the option to purchase at various stores.
Nunca me llego la targeta y llevo praticamente desde que la solicite 2 años o 3 y llame dos veces para cambiar la direccion y recibirla por correo nunca la recibi pesimo servicio

They are basically the MOB with HORRIBLE Customer Service. Do NOT USE THEM, PLEASE "BEWARE"! I paid my balance down for six months so that I could use my card for VRBO and "conveniently" the same day, they lowered my credit limit by $2,000 so that I could not use the money I had saved up for spending power.
Good rate and cash back. Easy approval process. User friendly app. Reward for referrals. $150 cash back. Support for local business when paying with the card.
I love my American Express card. Customer Service was great when there was a problem. It's my card I wouldn't go without. If your wondering if you should apply, That should be a Yes.
Amex is providing the best tool to always be aware of any transaction or apparent information that allow the member to easily proceed with updates

Great point system! Love the rewards! Excellent for traveling. Has travel insurance. Great protection against fraud and companies that try to charge you for things that they shouldn’t. They will fight for your money to be returned.

Amazing benegirs 5x on flights, all perks passed the high annual fee. Uber credit can be use in uber eats for free food ($200 credit), I travel with my bike and i always pay baggage fees, this card gives credits for that $200. plus acres to lounges and status in hotels ... you get more than you pay

The perks of the Platinum Card make it well worth it if you travel often. It is my favorite card. No foreign transactions fees, Uber credits, free TSA pre check, the travel site. Very easy to use your points.

They are really better than most credit card companies. For one thing, they don't just arbitrarily lower your credit limit the way Capital One and Discover do if you haven't used your card in a while.

Their customer service has also been better than the other companies we've dealt with. Many of the other credit card companies customer service reps are pretty apathetic, but we've not seen that with American Express.

It would be nice if they had better rewards to compete with some of the other credit card companies, but we have no complaints other than that.
I have enjoyed having the card have been able to get items that are out of my reach. Purchased a cabinet set for my kitchen that has brought me joy.

HORRIBLE! Hacker got into my Instacart account and even with Instacart on merged call saying charge was fraud and transaction ID’s, times, dates & freaking amounts did not match and were not generated by Instacart this Serve nightmare refused to reverse authorization hold on funds. Do yourself a favor & forget this complete mess. Customer service involved an extremely “snotty” woman talking over me. Vote with your feet, get a prepaid card elsewhere-I sure as hell am!
Great card. Always great customer service and treat me like a king. Great rewards and never have a limit in earning or using points.
Great card and customer service but the Plan It and monthly minimum due is not like credit cards and takes some getting used to...still love ,customer service always ready to help educate a customer.

Best & Most Generous CC Issuer!


AMEX gave me a chance when others wouldn't, customer service (when needed) is the best. Have been a member of the AMEX family for two years as of the date of this review (my 2nd time), wished I had never left the 1st time.


At any rate, AMEX is a great group, or has been to me. Gave me an initial CL of $2,000, discovered a 'secret' that after 61 days, can ask for a 3x CLI (on the web page or phone) & they'll give it with soft pull. I entered $6,000 and was asked my income, pressed Enter & before could blink my eyes, had what was requested.


Another 6 months later, asked to be moved to $7,500, and got it. 6 more months, asked for $8,000 & that's where I hit the wall, was given counter offer of $7,600, of which I took. So I presume the CL is relative to income, with that in mind, AMEX is generous to one who was making a little over $21,000 in retirement benefits (now just over $22,000). Some CC issuers wants to see more income, like $25,000-30,000 minimum.


I'll keep hitting the low button every time I get a raise, $100 is better than $0, all limits combined counts towards my overall utilization, which by chance is $8 out of a combined $12,100 limit.


Due to this, and account aging, discovered today my FICO (Experian) is 791, it's a perk of AMEX to display the monthly updated score. Not all CC issuers & banks does this, although the number is growing. Very few gives a 3x CLI after just 61 days also, using only soft pulls, with the option to ask after that every 6 months, or if there's a major change, such as a high bump in income, to be grated sooner. Then will fall back into every 6 months.


I highly recommend AMEX to anyone, given my experience, I can only presume that those with negative ones have paid late (don't wait until the last minute, pay 3-5 days before due date, 10 days if mailed) and/or have had other issues with their customer experience specialists. They have been great to me in my credit rebuild, didn't have bad credit, just didn't use much fr over 11 years after becoming disabled. As a result, my scores dropped. AMEX opened the door to blow the hinges off of my previous high, around 712 around the year 2005. Member 4 Life!

They are unbelievably incompetent. I have a 737 FICO and yet they turned me down first by saying I was in credit counseling, they could not answer how I would have a 737 if this was true. I then sent in the documentation showing that was a fabrication, they then said I have lates, the only lates I had where on a student loan in 2014, 7 years ago and will be dropping off. Then they said my credit ratios were to high, I sent in proof that all my other cards were paid off, then they said my loan balances were to high so I sent in proof all my car loans and finance loans were $0. Please just admit you have not idea on what you are doing which is why so many places no longer accept AMEX.


In the same time frame all this we happening I got approved by Bank of America for an Allegiant with a $6000 limit and CITI approved me for a platinum with a $15,000 limit. The only reason I wanted the AMEX at all was I was applying for the Hilton Honors to build points. I told my wife we will build the points the fun way by staying at a Hilton using the cards that do not have idiots working for them.
The only thing I hate about the card is that it is rejected for use in so many different places and that becomes a serious issue when I’am traveling to different states

I closed my card and was informed I have $0 owed. A year and a half later I while attempting to purchase my family a home I am informed that my credit just dropped 85 points due to collections filed by AMEX. I called, immediately paid my full balance and they apologized for the mistake and removed 6 months worth of late fee charges and told me they would be able to fix the problem by a method called "Re-aging". I was told this by several employees as I was bounced around the call board. I finally requested both customer service and credit get on the line together to end this ping pong match and was informed "they are unwilling to re-age my account" which would remove my negative mark from their mistake from December 2019 through July 2020. I informed them that I never received a single statement, email, phone call or collection notice. They used the loophole that "no mail was ever returned to us" to get out of re-aging my account, essentially leaving my credit 85 points in the hole and my family with no home after our house sale finalizes. I requested a fax stating that my account was paid off so I could submit a dispute and they eagerly agreed. I called back several days later to discover that there is a note on my account to "not send the statement because my account is in collections" even though I paid it in full, and they actually owe ME a credit back. They have acknowledged that my account is completely paid off several times but that they simply will not provide a statement. I'm currently on hold again, this makes roughly 10 hours in the last 2 weeks by the way, waiting to a supervisor to explain to me why they are unable to do anything at all. Reading through these reviews, it seems I'm not the only person that has experienced this issue. I've never experienced this kind of situation in my life with any company. It's appalling that such a "reputable" company would be so unable to fix a problem they caused and that they went to any loophole possible to avoid actually doing anything to fix their mess. I hope these guys get their act together or someone sues the living hell out of them for ruining somebodies' life.

Great card with amazing reward rates in categories that you’ll definitely use. Groceries and streaming services pay 6%, gas and transportation like subways and Lyft pay 3%. American Express has amazing service as well.
Love my American Express card. Awesome promo , ease of the phone app to monitor spending or pay bills. I would definitely recommend
Awesome card I’d been using it for 15 yrs, great point rewards. I will always stay will American Express, best card so far, you earn points with every dollar you spend.

Amex used to be a prestigious card to carry and they HAD amazing customer service. Today they are just the opposite. They hate their customers, they are hateful on the phone, the website to manage your account online gives you incorrect information making it impossible to manage your account unless you call. What happened Amex - you used to be great. I'm sad to say I'm asking for a divorce!!
I make personal purchases and I get to enjoy getting my rewards / sky miles. I can always look to fly with Delta which is my preferred airline company!
The true nance has been almost zero for over two weeks so I don’t understand why AmRx still has me with a large balance! I hope they reported the true balance much sooner

Then they raised my APR by 50% to an outrageous rate of 19%. At one point I had an 11% rate. There is no one to talk to about this problem. They trapped me into have a very high finance charge. Totally unethical by American Express. Don't be trapped like me. Consumer beware!

Excellent, they back it up with impeccable service. I have been a longtime member and appreciate all those who serve to assist customers.

They are GREAT helpped me build my credit limit to over $100k Hilton Honors $12,500. REWARDS just earned me 2 FREE nights in the Doubletree Resort in Key West, Florida

I had a credit limit of $7500 that was dropped to 1k because of a drop in my credit score (down to 640). I just bought a house! Never a late payment and I’ve never used more than 2k a month. I wanted to cancel immediately. I was charged the annual fee of $95 May 26th, so reasonably I should be reimbursed $79 as of July 14 given I only used a month and a half, but she said the max I could get was $71 because the bill hit in May. How ridiculous. When I called to cancel the card and have my membership fee reimbursed at a prorated rate they said no because it was more than 30 days!! Unbelievable. Punished for purchasing my first home. Thanks for nothing American Express!

I cancelled it and plan on cancelling my gold card. AMEX is not what they used to be.

content: Are you kidding me? What's not to like?!? I got $250 credited to my account after spending $1K in misc. purchases in the first few months, *plus* I'm making 6% reward bucks for grocery and streaming services, and 3% on gas purchases that I would be making anyways... It'll easily outweigh the annual $95 membership fee. Great card. Highly recommended.
department: Blue Cash Preferred® Card from American Express

content: American Express is my Go To card all the time! Why? They have one of the best customer service experiences I’ve ever had and that’s saying a lot from someone like me who has 18 credit cards. ? Every time I call them for ANYTHING they are always willing to help to satisfy my requests. I honestly have never been disappointed in them and I refer anyone I can. On the other hand I handle my accounts responsibly. Never pay late. Never use too much available credit. But I think we all know that when you handle your accounts good you are treated good in return. I have 4 Amex cards and my favorite is the Blue Cash Preferred.
I will never get rid of this card. The rewards and everything is great. Customer service is good too. They handled my few questions easily.

Amazing customer service and amazing card/company ... I canceled one of my cards a few months ago , I had like 8$ worth of points with them.. I never saw them getting that back , American Express reached out to me and told me that they made a mistake not giving my money , and to make up for that they send me a 375$ check to my name , I honestly think that was amazing in their part. Love that they put customers first

They have a $5,000 balance transfer cap that they don't disclose to you at any point in the terms, conditions, and disclosures or in their general information about their credit cards.


I wasted my time getting an American Express credit card for the purpose of taking advantage of their balance transfer bonuses, thinking I could transfer my $8,700 balance from another credit card.


I spoke to their customer service and their balance transfer department to seek an exception. I was told that they have a policy to not increase the balance transfer amount over $5,000 within 60 days of the credit card account opening. Did I mention that balance transfer fees start after 60 days too? What a coincidence.


I was also told that they hardly ever increase the $5,000 cap on balance transfers. This seemingly regular balance transfer cap is still not mentioned in their documents when you apply for the credit card!


American Express could have been more transparent and mentioned this $5,000 balance transfer cap to me before I wasted my time. I am sacrificing a few more minutes of my time writing this review so I can potentially save you from wasting your time too.
Top of the line! Great rewards with amazing intro apr and balance transfer rates. Easy to track spending with a user friendly app. Highly recommended.

Ever since AE has had their customer service reps work from home I've experienced less professionalism in their employee's. I long the days when employee's actually cared about their jobs and being good employees.
Best card and service ever!!! When ever I need questions answered or when I’m concerned about my security they have always taken the time to answer any and all questions.

AMEX originally put me on a 90 day deferral program but 60 days in came back to collect payment and pretended that this offer never was extended. As a business owner that was forced to shut down from a pandemic AMEX decided greed was more important. All i asked for was for them to honor the agreement that they gave me but they refused. Never at any point has AMEX ever made me feel as if they care about me as a customer and are a partner. They only care about getting their money. Awful company to do business with.
Great card we building our credit to buy a home ! So America. express it’s the best way to achieve that ! I don’t know what else I should type
Too expensive for not many benefits AE hard to deal with. They are great when wanting your business but terrible after you sign up.
Good information hope to benefit from this app in the near future i need to be able to take care of business and am having trouble doing so

Don't expect a refund when things go wrong.

I recently bought flights for 4 ($6,400) to UK with Etihad airways. Due to covid-19 Etihad cancelled the flights and offered me a credit note.


I had to take my pre planned leave and it is highly likely i will not be able to use the credit.


Etihad refused a refund so I went to Amex disputes team and they accepted my claim and gave me a refund, which I was over the moon with.

About a week later they reversed their decision which I found when I checked my statement.

Cut a long story short their communication was the worst ever, it took about 6 weeks weeks to try and reverse the credit they originally gave in a cheque which never arrived.

I expected a lot more from Amex but they let me down big down, don;t make the same mistake I did.
Good intro balance transfer and good brand savings offers (StitchFix) in the few months I’ve had it. Haven’t used it for rewards yet
Thank you for helping people understand in detail what areas affect your credit score. Then you make a plan to take the necessary steps to improve your score!

I hope the local police make a better effort to investigate and catch whoever did this.

They offer you the option, should you need it, to pay as you go. Then, when you do need it, despite 100% on time payments for over 30 years, they suspend the benefit.

I've been using an AMEX credit card for 8 years! I've been a raving fan so to speak. I've never missed a month of paying off my balance during that 8 years. Times are tough right now, and I wasn't going to have enough to pay my monthly balance off, and I was therefore going to be charged a significant amount of money in interest. In order to avoid this, I arranged for a balance transfer to another credit card with a lower rate. Unfortunately, due to whatever reason, the balance transfer was going to arrive (most likely) a couple days after my monthly pay off date. I asked AMEX to give me an extension, or a grace period, or whatever, just to give time for the balance transfer to arrive, and THEY WOULD NOT DO ANYTHING. THEY REFUSED TO HELP A LOYAL CUSTOMER OF 8 YEARS. And for that, I cancelled my AMEX card immediately. BEWARE--in a pinch? Don't count on AMEX to care!

Dealing with these people is worse than watching my mother die from ALS. Six weeks ago they locked my account, turned off their website, and turned off their APP on my phone. Six weeks of calling their 800 number has only gotten me “just give it another day or two”.

Easy to use and fast loading phone app.

I haven’t had this credit card for very long and everyone always said that the problem with American Express is that it’s not excepted at a lot of places. so far I haven’t had any issues with that there’s only a handful of restaurants that are like small mom and pop shops that don’t except it but for the most part most places except it and some places even prefer it.

This bank is not helping there customers at all at this COVID 19 time all they care abt is their money ask u to pay ur credit bills knowing fully well hv never owe before now they 2 time deferment which i only use one and I ask for the second one they twisted me, all other reputable banks are helping there customers defer payment automatically without requesting for deferment. Am really disappointed all u are after is the interest charge, but God is still on the throne. We will continue to pay until we finish paying, So help me God.
Higher rates and annual fees, also confusing billing practices. There is no set credit limit. I wouldn't recommend this card for anyone wanting to save money.

American Express is still the best charge card on the market, but the benefits are kind of a wash. It’s more of a little game to try and get your absurd $550 annual fee back. It has become less impressive as of late. The lounges never seem to be open, or are at capacity. There are a lot of perks but you have to be eagle-eyed and basically OCD to earn them. If you fly a lot on one airline, it’s helpful. Or if you want to buy everyone around you drinks on the plane, you can do that at the end of the cycle. Uber, streaming, these little perks do add up, but really you’re paying for the best customer service. I usually end up earning around $400 back a year, so it’s $150 a year for the original status symbol card and the absolute best credit card customer service, from anywhere in the world. It’s justifiable to me but increasingly losing value, especially since we appear to be embracing telework. The perks aren’t that exclusive any longer. Smart company, so I’m hoping they make a big change soon or I will likely cancel.
Great cars and great service. Flexible payment with great benefits. I would recommend this card to anyone seeking a card that is widely accepted and rewarding in the process
Great card, always great customer service, no hassle l especially always professional. Will recommend this card to allmy friends, yhank you

FYI-I was unable to complete the review. DO NOT USE AMEX!!!

Having been a Member since "81, I am heartbroken after a regular auto pay monthly bill was declined to my Golf Club by Amex. I have 3 accounts with them. Green, Gold and Business Platinum, and I have NEVER had a LATE payment in 39 years.

I was told that I asked for Covid-19 relief and that has impacted my credit worthiness and my limits were reduced because of this.

I have regularly had balances on the Gold and Platinum cards of well over $20,000, and never had a declined charge.

The fact of the matter is that I NEVER asked for Covid-relief? I don't even know what that is???

Long and the short of it is that I spent 1 hour and 20 minutes on the phone with them, talked to 2 Reps and a supervisor and they refused to cover the charge for

my club bill. It is obvious that Amex has moved there customer service out of the cou coun

operations out of the country
I have used this card for many satisfied years and will continue to use it even though not as much now, working to pay off in the future
Thank you, I paid full credit card in two weeks ago. Please update as soon. Maybe I put close account few week. I had many year with them. They had go up interest. I do not like that

American Express Clear Everyday Card has tremendously helped me with building my credit score. They gave me an unsecured credit card at a time when most other major credit card companies wouldn't and with a higher credit line than I imagined they would. They took a chance on me when others would not. I made all of my payments on time and always for as much more than the minimum due as I could afford each month and as a result they regularly in creased my credit limit up to its current $2,000 limit. With their trust and help I have watched my credit score climb from bad to good in less than 2 years. Thank you American Express!

Horrible service! Don’t use this shit. I promise u will be sorry. It’s been a month and I haven’t received my money. This is totally a rip-off. Please people, do not use their services. Blue Bird is full of shit .....
Great card love Amex I have had for years they work with you I pay in full I don’t try to go over what I have to get pointscrewards really good to have

BEWARE of American Express Covid 19 RELIEF!!!! Since I deal in International business and everything shut down temoporarily due to quarantine, I was getting some relief with their deferred interest plan. On one of the calls, the agent told me they have a new program of relief that you can enroll in that will cut the interest from 11% to 6%, and waves renewal fees while on plan, so no need to call monthly. I can opt out anytime. I specifically asked multiple times if this affects anything else benefits, and most importantly credit line. They said NO. So I agreed. The very next day they cut all credit lines to basically $100 over my balances. Including taking away by credit on my business card which I was paying $595 per year. As a consequence, all my autopays got cancelled and my credit rating went down since it shows i was completely extended. And no open credit for new charges. I immediately called and asked for a supervisor and they told me it takes 7-10 days. It took them less than 24 hours to take everything away. I FEEL I WAS TOTALLY MALICIOUSLY GUIDED AND TAKEN ADVANTAGE OF!!! instead of helping me they completely shut me down. They know exactly what they are doing and their agents know this is an important fact. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED! I have been a loyal customer with 4 Amex cards for almost 20 years.
The card welcomed most everywhere. Plus it is nice to have cards for all family members in case of emergencies. Annual fee is high but the benefits are good.

Always pay on time & more than the minimum. Went from $11,000 down to $7,600 out of the blue. That hurt my credit ratio. Not sure why it went down??вЂЌв™‚пёЏ My car decided to break down 3 times within a span of 2 months last year (2019) and this card helped me keep my vehicle going. I'm assuming in Amex's eyes, I used too much? Just not sure why they knocked off $3,400.
Love this card and all of its PERKS. Would definitely recommend it to my FAMILY and FRIENDS. Started out with a $2,000 credit limit and within 2 years my limit has quadrupled.
They’ve always worked with me it’s always there for me and I enjoy using my American Express, I think I’ve been a member since 1994
It has been an incredible card I do need to replace it as soon as possible I do not know the number I have lost the card but I would love to replace it ASAP thank you
Thank you for your exemplary service. You are always helpful when I need you. And are always kind and professional. I can always count on you.

I absolutely love this card EXCEPT they only report the minimum payment and not my actual monthly payment which falsely makes it appear that I only pay $39 instead of as much as $1300. I pay $250-800 several times a month. My credit line is low-only $1k with an annual salary of $132K. I feel this is deceptive reporting. I have yet to get a credit line increase and have an EXCEPTIONAL payment history on my credit report. I have had this card for nearly 2 years.
This is the best card I carry. I’ve never had a problem with customer service . I’m pretty sure they report monthly to all three credit bureaus
I have the platinum charge card I love all the perks that comes with being a member. Excellent customer service! Only draw back is the high membership fee $550.
If you want to know quality sevice then they are the only company I recommend. Customer service is miles in front of companies like Citibank and. Capital One. Go AMEX!!!

I have had my Blue Bird card for almost 10 years and I have never had a serious issue with them. Never had my account froze or closed. But reading all of the reviews about them doing that to people makes me nervous, so I got myself a real "grown up" bank account to keep most of my money in. That said, I do like this card.


+The things I like most about my Blue Bird card is that I can keep all my money in the set aside account and just put as much money as I want to spend in the main account. I like knowing that if anyone tried to use my card or charge a sneaking "monthly fee", they would get denied for insufficient funds right away.


+Another thing I like about the card is it is kind of like a secret stash. They do not report to the IRS or any other authority that I know of.


-Con... crappy customer service with people who talk so fast in such a strong accent that you can hardly understand them. I got conflicting information from different customer service reps about the same issue. And neither was correct! (The check cashing service somehow put an instant payment that was for more that the check was in my account. I was told by one person not to touch it, it wasn't my money, and that he was going to report it immediately. It was like he was mad at me for some reason. Another rep told me that there was nothing she could see regarding it nor do about it and to try calling the check cashing company. Well long story short, I researched up on it and if they put extra money in your account from a check, that it is their error and once the money is in your account it is yours. They just eat the difference.


-Another con is that I recently got another Blue Bird account (their site says you can have up to five) but it will not allow me to transfer funds from one account to the other because I am the same person. So what?!

I had a Amex credit card for over 12 years in good standing, all of the sudden I check my credit report and see is closed, never received any notification or warning, I called customer service to reinstate , had a horrible phone connection with 2 specialists sounded like they were underwater, both told me that I am not eligible to reinstate the card and loose $300 worth of points...I will never use anything from American Express again
I no longer have this card. Is this account still open? I always loved American Express and would use it while traveling. Can I still get a new card?
Awesome card ,outstanding customer service.alwaysabke to speak to a human when calling.card is accepted worldwide.gat website to make changes as needed
Ok card, no complaints at all, amex has seemed to have gotten a bad name but I don't know why..they are a grand company with good payback

Amex is a little hard to get approved. I got a 1k bue every day, and almost a year and they have denied to raise my credit limit. I dont use it anymore.


Update: After being customer for 2 years they raise my bluecash at 2k and approved me a Hilton Honors for 7k. Conclusion: You have to earn their trust in order to get a higher credit limit. Be patient.
It’s been one of my best credit card ever. I have been using Amex card for past 2 years and my experience with them have been amazing than other credit cards.

Amex doesn't care about their customers. Once covid 19 started, they reduced my credit limit from 16k to 3k affecting my credit score. I have never missed a payment on any card. Just purchased a Home and started to use many credit cards for points. I have paid off my balance with amex and will destroy the 2 cards i have with them plus my business credit card. I don't recommend this company at all. Probably their computer system predicted that i was going to lose my job and personal business and did that for safety. They just gained one less customer.
I’ve had the card for a few months. If used responsibly the card is great have had no issues at all. I make sure I pay it in full like the rest of my cards.
Well they are ok not a big deal of a card I actually have it to my grandson to start him out I myself really didn’t use it much he’s in college so I gave it to him he’s always responsible

The worst experience I’ve ever had with a credit card. They just dropped my credit limit by over $18k without warning and with no explanation other than “payment history and credit score.” My payment history is 100% current - never been late, ever, and my credit score is near 700. They refused to give me an exact reason and the only way to restore my balance is to pay $3,000. I’ve been a customer for almost 4 years and this is how they treat me. Every other company in the world is trying to help people in the midst of a global pandemic and Amex is trying to screw its customers over.

I did not know that shit American Express transferred my account to collection agency. I did paid off before due date to collection agency and still after that i got extra interest plus late fee. Collection agency said American Express policy whereas American express said collection agency policy and made me pendulum of talking (20-30 times) for 15-20 hours to manage that. Would like to give less than zero star.
One of my go to cards. Easy to use. Sky Lounge available. Accepted with most retailers and out of the country. Black card next, Wayne?

I applied while booking a Delta flight with the offer that if the card was issued I could pay for the flight with the card. The offer indicated that card information would be provided for the booking of the flight and there was a $200 statement credit with the first statement. I was approved within a few minutes, however all I received in the email from Amex was the last 5 digits of the card number with the disclosures. I called customer service which took a few minutes to get through and ask why I didn’t get the card info needed to complete the booking. The rep was polite but hard to understand so obviously an offshore call center. She didn’t know why I didn’t receive the info the offer said I should get upon approval and kept telling me to “update my email”. As there was only one seat left in the flight so I paid with Discover and cancelled the account. Wasted an hour with this BS late at night. Oddly enough a rep answered after two rings when I stated “cancel my account” and she spoke very good english. So if you want to get right through to a rep tell that damn computer that answers your call “cancel account”.... it was a p!ss poor experience.
department: Delta SkyMiles® Gold American Express Card

content: Legit trash. It’s been 10 days but the gold card is not here. When I applied, it says that it’s expedited for 2-3 days. At this point I’m counting days till this card gets here. What a trash service. Should’ve gone with other airlines.

Won’t leave home without it! Definitely one of the best cards in my wallet with multiple perks! Looking to upgrade to Platinum as soon as possible!

I want to give a ZERO star, but I can not. They stolen money from me after I applied for a credit card to get $250 as a credit, they said to me that there is not any credit amount that I can get. Do NOT apply for skymlles credit card because it is a fake. they lost a customer.

content: Got this to help purchase my new house. They increased my credit limit to 2000 to pay our closing costs. Been paying off at 200 per month which is way over the minimum payment

I wish I could give a below zero review. As a card member since 1986 with an excellent payment history, AMEX decided to cancel my account - JUST BECAUSE- is the answer I got from the agent when I contacted them. Just because AMEX decided to close some ZYNC accounts smack in the middle of the COVID-19 crisis when I most needed the card. I was very young in 1986 when I got the card. I am 65 now, a senior citizen and truly depended not this card and planned to use it to help me get through the COVID-19 crisis. My entire household is at risk and still in ;quarantine due to age and serious pre-existing medical conditions. AMEX gave no valid reason to close my card - JUST a WHIM - JUST BECAUSE they decided to close some ZYNC Accounts???? Really/ Did ou hear the part about me being a customer since 1986? And you are doing this now - of all times? I guess they were not making enough money off ZYNC card customers as we still pay no annual fee and have smaller pre-set spending limits. Thank you Amercian Express for making a devastating challenging time in my life even worse. When other credit card issuers, lenders, banks and more are reaching out in compassion to help their customers, AMEX is taking the polar opposite approach. Shame on you! Will never recommend you to anyone.
SUCKS! Buyer protection sucks! Credit policies suck; phone representatives in India - SUCK! Customer loyalty means nothing. BUYER BEWARE!

Amex is Amex! Although my credit decrease from my initial time with them due to after divorce issues I have no complaint. Amex have been there and backing up their customers during hardship. During Hurricane Maria, earthquakes and now covid 19 pandemic. Kuddos to them!
Best customer service! I’m very happy with my card and all the perks that come with it. I would recommend to family and friends. Thank you Amex

the interest rates a little high but they gave me a very NICE card with a high credit line. I try to keep it paid down but sometimes you need to make larger purchases, and this card lets me do that :) thanks AMEX

I absolutely love this Delta Sky Gold credit card. When I signed up , I received the 40,000 bonus miles after spending 1,000. Which was not a problem because I use this card for everyday use to earn the miles. Here are some of my pros:

Instant available credit after making payment ( I love this because I use this card a lot and pay it instantly so I am constantly receiving miles)

No penalty for going over limit (there was an issue with a payment method I used and it put me way over my limit)

Bonus miles for groceries( this feature increased to 4x during Covid-19 which i very much appreciated)

Alerts are appreciated ( I get alerts for credits, alarming purchase, overages, and more)

Customer service is readily available and has always resolved my issues

The only con I have with this card is the fact that they changed the benefits of the card shortly after i got it. This gold delta card use to have the benefits of sky lounge but took that away. Kinda of a bummer
department: Delta SkyMiles® Gold American Express Card

content: I love my Amex card! Bonus points can be used on Amazon! Customer service is great and I love the app! I definitely recommend American Express!

Do not use this card for credit building! This card will lower it's limit as you make the payments, even if you are paying over the minimum. You will constantly be at a high percentage of credit used which will constantly lower your credit score. I do not recommend using this as you will not be able to get ahead. I wish I would have just kept the balance on my other card as my credit score was going up with making the payments. I took this offer because of the 0% APR for the first year, but it's not worth damaging my credit.

The absolute worst ever. Outrageous fees and zero services. The fees smack of usury. I canceled my other AMEX cc cards after I got robbed using this one. Do not waste your time, once the money is on the card, it is VERY hard to get off without paying fees. We lost 20% (so far)
They change twice sometimes make you pay then pay you back Later I am seriously thinking about closing this account really dont care if my score drops

they have me a very respectful and reasonable amount on my card. I absolutely love having direct access to my fico score. Only thing i wish is that it would update more then once a month due to massive changes sometimes I'm stuck looking at a painful score all month. content:
I wish I could give them negative 1,000,000 stars. This is the second worst credit card experience I have had since I canceled my Citi card like 8 years ago which was a nightmare. This company has even worse service than Citi. Here's my story:


My dad passed about a year ago and I needed to fly home for a while. On my way back, I was checking out Delta flights and there was a promotion, Amex card, buy x dollar amount before y time and you get a $200 statement credit and 60,000 miles. Was easy to hit the minimum with my flight home and a couple of purchases. I paid my first bill without seeing my statement because I couldn't get my card until I got back home. Once I had the card, I was trying to set up my online account but, for whatever reason, the online banking system wouldn't work. I paid my card over the phone again. By the third or fourth statement, I was fed up and called again to get my online account set up. They ask me a bunch of questions about the card and I finally get it straightened out, they set up my online banking. Cool, I see they never gave me my statement credit. I did get the miles.


Fast forward months go by and every time I go to log into my account, it's saying I have the wrong password, wrong card info, whatever and my account is blocked. I call and pay my bill and ask them to unlock my account. They make a one time password for me to get in, this happens 5 or 6 maybe even 8 times, I lost track.


Meanwhile, I call Delta to get my statement credit because Amex claims "it's a Delta promotion, take it up with them." Delta claims, "it's a statement credit, take it up with Amex." This goes on for about 2 months, on the phone for hours each time, before I finally give up and decide I've spent more time trying to get the credit than it's worth.


Fast forward months again and still cannot log into my account. Every time I call them to get it fixed they are extremely rude, ask me for different information every single time, and this last time literally hung up on me when I complained why he's asking me for different information. One time it's this number, the next time it's this security question, the next time it's another number, it's never the same. It's honestly baffling and, as if they're messing with me. Literally, it feels like they're messing with my head. Every time it's a different question that I either answer and it's not right or I don't even know the answer to.


ALL I WANT TO DO IS LOG IN AND PAY MY BILL. I honest to god at this point think they're trying to prevent me from being able to pay it easily so I wrack up late fees. I can't come to any other conclusion as to why a company would make it this freaking hard to pay a damned bill.


I cannot WAIT to pay off my balance and close this card out and never have an American Express card again. This is a SLIMY SLIMY company with HORRIFIC customer service. Stay away for your own good.

They are just a good company,Very convenient customer service is very good and I have been dealing with them for years,Their app is very convenient it’s pretty easy to use I do most of my business on my iPhone using the app I highly recommend AMERICAN EXPRESS
Been with them 25+ years. Lots of good options to fit your needs. The miles are a nice perk and make sure to utilize them at the right stores.
The card is there for me when I need it. I’m grateful that I haven’t had to use the card very much. I have 3 American Express cards.
They closed my account without notice due to non use. 20 year card holder! Good riddance goodbye adios bye bye pppffffttt cash is king!

I had my card since 2017 activated it but never used it. I kept it because I considered activating a sub account for my teenage daughter. Something I could put money on for her to spend. Well now I don't know. Had my stimulus check deposited on the card and then I transferred it to my bank account and it's still not there. When I call I continue to get different answers on when my money will be in my bank account. I've reached out to the IRS and they said if it's not there this week they will look into investigating. Disappointing.

The cash back rewards is very nice. They have special offers that you have to opt-in to get, so keep an eye on your email and give it a scan when you see it. You can just sign up for all of them if you want. There's no "penalty" for not using them.

Card was to expensive for the benefits offered. Did not make it easy to cancel it. Please check all your cards frequently and the yearly fees. Several offer more for no annual fee like the Blue for Biz Plus

Will not waive membership fees during Covid 19 no use for the card they have no flexibility in going the extra mile. We currently cannot fly or use cruise ships stay in hotels for safety reasons not worth it to pay over 500 dollars for things you cannot use they do not care how much you spent in the past or how good a customer you are .
Always pay in full I do not owe any money on this card and they still show a balance . I need this fixed ASAP to avoid my score from going more down

I have been trying to get ahold of American Express customer service line for 3 days now and at every hour of the day they say they cannot take my call due to high volume. This is ridiculous. If I knew it would be this difficult to reach them I never would have gotten the card. They just send my rent back as NSF and I have plenty funds to cover it. Now I owe an extra fee and I need to know why they sent the payment as NSF to my landlord. This is ridiculous.

This review it for the Amex platinum fine hotels collection . My girlfriend and I recently decided to book out trip to Vegas. We found a great room at the Cosmopolitan in July. I always do my research when it comes to finding the best deal. Amex fine hotels program was hundreds of dollars more for the 3 days we planned on staying how could this be?! Because they offer small benefits like a spa credit? I reached out to American Express who told me they would not match price.We will be canceling our trip and booking directly with the hotels website. Why do I continue to pay a 500$ annual fee... I will cancel this card soon.

So they say that they are committed to help their customers, yet they don't mind closing people's accounts without any notice in a crisis like COVID-19! Terrible company! This company does not care about its customers at all! Do not ever open up an account with them! People are unemployed due to Covid-19 and they are currently relying on using their credit cards to buy food and pay for stuff. How is this company going to justify closing these customers' accounts without any notice???!!!!! I will make sure that this is heard in every platform and will encourage my family and friends to close their accounts with American Express. This company does not deserve any business!! Instead of helping customers in this crisis, they find it ok to close people's accounts!!
The best credit card I ever had. Excellent service and fast response when I need something. The app is very good. I have the Delta Reserve card which provides a lot of benefits.

Was charged $9.95 for tolls over 50 miles from my house while my car was in repair for two days! I don’t drive more then 5 miles away in the rent a car from Budget! When I got the Bill I went to Budget as soon I got the Bill guess what Budget was Closed because of the Virus! Call Budget Corporate and American Express and they say I had to call the Toll agency to dispute the charge!! Nothing resolved! Disgusting it’s all about Geed! The repair shop was 1 mile from my house and Budget is a half mile! In two days maybe put 30 miles or so on the car certainly didn’t go through tolls I will have negative reports about Budget and America Express to a lot Of sources!
I have not used American Express since my divorce 1997. Who is this on my report? I am sure my ex husband has been using it? Do I need to get an attorney?
Ok customer service. Would be nice if they increased my line of credit without asking AND some of their support staff are not helpful...

How Far Have The Mighty Fallen, they have joined the rat race of charging as much as possible giving the least amount. Their customer service that made them a premium card has deteriorated to a point that they are not worth anything they charge.
Great card, awesome perks! Always have rewards to use on concert tickets and a lot of other things. Plus I love the way it looks. Makes me happy!

I was a member with AMEX for 6 years and thought they were a great company. That all changed when all 7 of my cards were closed, most of them business cards for different business that I own. Last month I made all my payments in full as I do every month for all 7 cards and in error I forgot to update one of my business cards banking info. I made the payment but the payment was declined because of my error on not updating the banking info. I received an emailing letting me know there was an issue with my payment and it dawned on me that I forgot to update the new payment info. As I logged in to update the payment info, I noticed that my account had been closed. I thought that this must have been some type of error, so I called to make sure. As I was on hold, I started getting email after email about all my cards being closed! Once I got someone on the phone they told me that all the account were closed because of this one payment issue. Now keep in mind, that all the other payments were just fine for the other cards. The rep told me that I would need to pay off any remaining balance due and they could reinstate the cards, so I updated the payment info and paid the balance just as I planned on doing. After making the payment the rep told me that I would be charged a "Reinstatement" fee for all the cards that I was requesting to be reinstated WHAT??? pissed off and all, I decided to agree to their scam and pay the fee. AMEX was important to our businesses and I wanted to keep the relationship. After doing that, I was told that a decision would be mailed to me in 7-10 business days. Again, WHAT??? this is crazy! but what could I do? I wait the 7 business days to get letters in the mail saying they were not going to reinstate my accounts!! I had more reasons now on these letters that were sent to me. Some said because of the payment that was returned and others said my credit was not up to par.. The crazy part of that was that I had just applied for 2 new cards two weeks prior and was approved for them, so if my credit was an issue and a reason for them to close my accounts, why would they have just approved me for new cards?? Despite already having an individual savings account and adding my wife to my Amex Platinum Card, we were unable to open a joint account with AMEX savings, likely due to my wife's recent name change, or less likely AMEX thought her to be some kind of international super villain the likes of Carmen Sandiego, either way we received a letter in the mail asking for more documentation. I called, and the representative told me the only way they could proceed was if we waited 7-10 business days after mailing them more documentation. I brought up concerns that she doesn't have a utility bill in her name, and the representative offered mailing a bank statement with both our names & the address... so I did. Two weeks later, I get another letter asking for more documentation, I call again and am told same thing, send another bank statement... two weeks later call again, am told it can't be a statement, has to be a letter signed by a bank officer (btw needing to retain the services of my local bank kinda defeats the argument for online banking in general). This representative was actually helpful, in reaching out to the banking division (while I'm on hold... despite numerous requests I was never actually allowed to speak to the team making the decisions) and then coming back on the line that a marriage certificate or drivers license would be accepted, and If I faxed it that day the account might be open by the end of the week. I faxed them both promptly.. then next week nothing, call again and am told they were not accepted and a letter would be mailed. I asked for a supervisor, which was unavailable so I would be called within 2 business days. It's day 3, I have yet to receive a call.


Resolution: My wife and I opened up a Marcus by Goldman Sachs online savings account... she just had to answer some additional verification questions over the phone with the representative. Their online platform is much better, and even allows wire transfers & instant account linking to our local bank. I am in the process of closing my personal account I already held with AMEX online bank.
