content:
My experience with American Express Delta Skymiles Platinum Card.


I hardly ever write reviews. I’ve really enjoyed my time with American Express over the past 4 years, however, after the most recent conversations I have had with American Express representatives and realizing how they treat their customers, they have really left a bad taste in my mouth. I want this to be an informational posting to inform those who are planning to sign up for the American Express Delta Skymiles Platinum card so you will have no surprises like there were for us. My wife and I were excited about the promotion they were offering by signing up and receiving 80,000 Skymiles after spending $3,000 in the first 3 months and receiving a “free complimentary flight”. We wanted to have her mom as our companion since she hasn’t been on a vacation in several years. I already had a card, so I had my wife sign up. Although the benefits looked great on the front end, if you are thinking of signing up, make sure you do your research and dig into the terms and conditions of American Express as well as Delta. Their policies are in conjunction with each other and some terms not stated on American Express will be restrictions with Delta. This made it very difficult when trying to understand exactly what to expect. The annual renewal fee of $250 must be paid in advance for the year meaning, once you sign up for the card, American Express will immediately withdrawal from your account $250. The complimentary companion flight will not be awarded to you until after you have had the card an entire year. When I spoke with a manager on the phone, I asked if the companion flight will be awarded before the next $250 renewal fee would be taken out, he responded with “they are usually both at the same time”. If you plan to sign up, don’t expect to be awarded the “free” companion flight before paying two $250 annual renewal fees.

Frustrating Customer Service Experience

After calling 4 different American Express reps and receiving multiple contradicting statements from when the complimentary flight would be issued to Delta, one rep said the $250 annual charge had never been taken out of our account since the year had not passed. I called back to confirm that it had and the other rep said we would receive the companion flight by May 7th at the latest. The 3rd rep said sometime this month and then came back and said it wouldn’t be until March of next year. I asked to speak with a supervisor, and she put me on hold for 45min and right after she gave me an update saying she was getting the manager on the phone, the music stopped, and the call dropped. I called back the following day and the 4th rep said she would have to create a case and the supervisor would give me a call back in the next 24 hrs. I waited and after receiving no call for 2 days, I called back and the 5th rep was finally able to get me on the phone with a manager. The manager took no time ask about my experience but went straight into why I was wrong for not reading the fine print.

I’m big on owning up to faults, I could have done more research to see that the $250 was due up front and that the companion flight was back dated a year, however, because these details are not clearly communicated and it can be very time consuming to keep track of it all (especially when speaking with multiple reps that are giving different information), I wanted to create this post. I just wanted to inform others so that they don’t make the same mistake I did and can save time when making the decision.

My documents in no way were altered. I sent my SSN Card, passport and drivers license, all of which were valid and unaltered. I went to the passport office of Atlanta and the SSN office where my documents were issued and all of my documents were verified. I also recently traveled out of there country with my passport without any issues. 

I feel that they assumed I was fraud because I am African American- they thought I wouldn't send my documents proving my identity and once they received them they targeted me treating me like a criminal saying that I stole someones credit. This is horrible and if this issue isn't resolved I am willing to file a lawsuit against American Express for profiling me and denying services to me due to my nationality. 

Originally they threatened to close my account if I didn't send the documents in 24 hours. I told them I was traveling out of the country for my birthday and anniversary. I requested to speak with a manger and also sent an email to their corporate office and still got the same answer. 

I believe that American Express closed my accounts after they saw that I was African American because there is no way to come to the conclusion that my documents were altered in any way. 

I'd like both of my accounts reopened and I'd like to be compensated for the inconvenience. I aim willing to contact the media and go further if needed. I am not going to allow this type of behavior from any company. There are Lawes in place for a reason.

content: I used to love Amex Serve, for years, but it's turned really awful of late. Among the other issues I've had, I recently had a fraudulent charge on my account. It will take weeks, all in all, to get it resolved, and who knows if they'll even issue me a refund after all that. I've spent hours on the phone trying to sort this out. I was unable to upload my declaration of fraud and had to spend hours again on that. My new card won't arrive for 7-10 days (although if it really arrives when they say it will, I will be shocked.) They take up to 45 days - 45 days!!! - to analyze my fraud claim. Meanwhile, I'm just plain old out the money, and I will probably never see it again. This comes after a situation where they lost my direct deposit for 3 days, so now I won't use that service. All in all, just very disappointed with the recent customer service, and I have 100% lost faith in the security of my account, so even when I eventually do get the new card, after this is resolved I will be closing my account.

American Express has proven to me what ive always suspected from them. That is their double standard approach towards their own customer base. On one hand they have the Amex platinum and Amex gold Card customers and on the opposing end they service the lower echelon clientele with a prepaid product interestingly called Serve. This is a prepaid debit card/checking account mostly used by non credit worthy customers who have yet to establish a good enough credit rating or have somehow soiled their credit rating with late payment history and/or complete defaults on their loans. Whatever the case, regardless of intent or circumstance the results are usually quite negative, and the consequence is the inability to obtain credit cards and loans, as well as insurance policies and in some cases jobs; positions may not be offered or withheld from otherwise qualified deserving candidates. Sadly these same people may have been able in many instances to correct their credit woes if they could establish gainful employment. Its a catch 22 and the more misfortunes in ones life the greater the barriers to rebuilding ones life will become.

Amex platinum card holders, typically have much more money and disposable income then a Serve card holder may have. Yet the Serve card has hidden fees for almost any occasion. Try to check your account balance using an atm machine not on the money pass network lately? Well if you do then a fee will be assesed for that privilege. Did you attempt to withdraw an amount greater than your $750 daily limit allows? Try it with serve and you'll be penalized for the attempt. Regardless of network a charge will be assessed for merely attempting. It appears on your account as an overlimit attempt fee of .75 cents. Ever try to contact customer service which they claim is 24 hours. There are no options to reach a live operator at serve unless you are calling to advise them of a lost or stolen card. This is prosperous. There is noone else to speak to regarding anything other then reports of lost or stolen cards. I suggest you speak to those guys regarding anything and everything because theres just no other choice. Also, lastly i would like to point out the fact that some merchants refuse the serve card because it has no chip function. Considering that Amex cards are accepted in fewer places than the traditional Visa or Mastercards this only adds insult to injury. American Express clearly expresses a bias toward the higher more capable of absorbing miscellaneous fees class of people and a double standard of service and support in their daily course of business.

Do not believe any benefit they say they offer- they are constantly changing them and redlining thing, redefining all the hoops you must jump through to ensure the most benefit for them. Love the card benefits. The ability to spend the points on different sites such as Amazon. Best Buy and other various sites to earn points while spending is great.

Love the cash back rewards on groceries and gas. It’s very practical to use since these are normal everyday purchases for most people. Plus AMEX has amazing customer service, I’ve never had any issues with them.

Great card with all the credits that you get with this card 100 dollar clear credit 100 dollar away travel credit the first year you open the card 3 point per dollar on all travel and ride share and 3 points per dollar on restaurants and 1 point per dollar on everything else you can’t go wrong plus this charge card you get a pay over time feature and AmEx will let you know how much you are approved for with the pay over time if you go over your pay over time limit you will have to pay that amount you go over when your bill is due

Warning: Be careful with AmEx's offer of 60,000 Delta miles after spending $3000. I spent the required $3000, but was denied the miles. The AmEx agents said I was deemed as ineligible for the offer when I applied. I was like, why did you still issue me the card then? Any other credit card company would reject the application in that kind of situation. AmEx is just so sneaky and borderline unethical.

Scammed me out of MQMs and horrible customer service on Delta Reserve Card, they aggressively sold me card and assured me MQMs would not hit for at least 5 weeks but they applied the next week. I already had hit milestone with segments but MQMs were applied so I lost out on introductory MQMs and nobody will help me. Now I’m a status level lower with Delta as a result.

Love the app, the company so far. Great inro APR for now. Hoping to get my normal interest rate lowered so I can continue to use the card without fear of a 26% interest rate when my credit score is 700.

AMEX periodically evaluates your spending and payment habits in order for them to consider credit limit increase(s). This card also comes with a competitive APR for those times you may want to carry over a balance.
We don’t use this card a lot. However, they are easy to use and protect us well. I feel very protected having this card. We couldn’t rate them higher.

Don’t ever get a credit card from them. They’re the worst customer service, worst everything! They’ll never take your side on anything even with mountains of evidence against who you’re disputing. While the other company has no evidence! They are a horrible company!!!!!!!

I don't doubt all these bad reviews because no prepaid card is without some issues but my experience has been great. I pay a 1.00 monthly fee (which is why I am reluctant to close my account because if I want to open it again, the fee will have gone up I think) I've had this card for a long time and get my paychecks on it. The only downsides for me have been the out-of-network atm fee totals 5.50 with their fee and the atm's fee and several places I regularly go don't take american express. I love the reserve account feature which I can move money back and forth as much as I want unlike with my bank account where I can only do it 6 times a month. I really like the app and I get balance alerts every day and can text BAL to get my balance at any time. However if you want a comparable card with no fees, switch to american express bluebird. It is essentially the same except no monthly fee and the reserve account is called a "setaside" account. The only reason I'm switching from bluebird (to Chime) is because again, many places I go don't take amex like goodwill and costco. Look up chime, it's Visa, no fees, free savings, app etc. But this serve card has served me well up until now. Plus you can't get cash back at the register with serve or bluebird either.
AMEX is no longer "The Card" to carry. In Europe it was refused more than accepted. Only major hotels and restaurants would take the card.
This is a great 'get your foot in the door' with American Express. The rewards could be better, but this is the free version of the card.

This card is horrible. i am getting rid of it this week. bluebird holds your money when you make certain purchases for up t o a full week. a ripoff... At times they held almost 200 dollars for days at a time until they decide to release it but its my money. if i could give them a zero rating i would

Not happy. I was a very good customer. Always paid my bill. Never late. On any of my accounts. They lowered my available credit while I was out of town, using the card. No notifications no heads up. Nothing!! I canceled immediately.

I have had one American Express card for over 1 1/2?years and a second card for about 15 months. Instead of them giving me an increase in credit they offered a second card. So I have 2 cards with a limit if $1K on each. I use both cards faithfully and get the balances a zero to avoid paying interest. However they continue to refuse giving me and increase. Go with Capital 1, because every year I get a credit increases of at least $3K.
This was a good card for us to do a 0% transfer fee balance on at the time of opening, but since then is only used for very small purchases and gets paid off every month
Would like to get more places to use the card for rewards. I dont shop at most of the places they offer. All on all I enjoy the card.

The website and app are great. The points are applied quickly and the customer services are outstanding. I have the gold card which provides discounts and benefits for all kinds of shopping and dining.
American Express is one of my better credit cards and that includes its helpful customer service available 24/7 and always very friendly.
Great card for groceries and gasoline. Had a good sign up bonus too. So far, I really have enjoyed having this card in my wallet.
Easy deals, always looking to improve the experience. Always available to fix and listen to any issues. Problem solver and leaves you at ease

Worst card company ever, I called and reported my temp card lost on 2/1 they send me two cards either linked to my account with my money on it. The tell me no one issued a replacement for a card on the 1st (I also called on the 2nd to see if they had away to access fund during the wait, he confirmed it was shipped). This is after a week wait, they have 0 ways to access money without a card. Now its a total of 14 to 20 days for a card. They tell me I have to pay 20 bucks if I want it any faster. Like Im the one who messed up. They take no responsibility for the mistake they make?

I have been a loyal AmEx customer for multiple decades, but no more. American Express was always know to provide good service to its cardholders. Now, however, it is staffed by customer "service" representatives (the title is a bad joke) who are incompetent, badly trained or both, who waste one's time on the phone and then lie to get the card holder off the phone. MC and Visa provide much better service, so who needs American Express?
I am very happy with American Express I love their customer service anybody should get a card good benefits I will continue using them

On December 2019 I rented a car using my Amex. The snow chains on board were broken so I had to buy a new pair because I was in the mountain, it was snowing and it was too dangerous to proceed without.

On December 27th I called AMEX to dispute the amount of $ 181.65 that I had to spend for the new snow chains, because they were supposed to be provided by Europcar, the rental car. I was assured on the phone that the amount would have been suspended and that they would have opened a dispute.

Today on February 7th I see that the amount was not suspended, Europcar received the entire payment and nobody on the phone or via email was able to provide me with an explanation. I was only told to wait 4 more weeks, regardless the fact that it has been already over a month.

None of the operator I spoke with knew anything about the dispute, they could only see it open on my account but had no idea of what happened. I had to repeat the same story 3 times.

I find it unacceptable, if this is the level of service that Amex can provide, I rather use any other less expensive credit card so I canceled my account.

Very disappointed, on the phone they sounded very supportive when I opened the dispute but then I realized they did nothing to help.

My #2 credit card. Love this card and use it strategically to maximize my cash back when making purchases. No issues whatsoever in my 7-8yr history with this card, and even provide me a great promo apr’s now and again, and I took full advantage buying an engagement ring on the card this past time.

This is the worst card to get . I’m trying to get money back from fraud charges on my account. The charges are over thousands of dollars. Been fighting with them since July of 2019.Was told this morning after Submitting multiple police reports and FTC reports that they will not be refunded me my money back in my case has been closed.

American Express rock's ....Loyal customer for over twenty years and the BEST customer service . I highly recommend anyone looking to improve their credit history and receive the most reward benefits possible to apply for a card ? from AMX
Limit too low for serious use as it triggers the over 30% use ratio thus negatively affecting the FICO score. Am waiting on reconsideration.

Amazing company to do business with. Customer Service is one of the best, seldomly do I ever wait on hold to speak with a representative. The app is an amazing tool they make available to manage your account is easy to use and navigate through

This is a Rewards Straight Forward Delta Gold AMEX. Card;Points are rewarded at 2 points per $1 spend; can convert to Cash Back though Using for Delta Miles is a much better redemption value; Customer service is excellent....Overall, a little “stingy” with lines of credit
you've always taken such good care of me, card and now loans! I think I've been with American Express since my divorce and your the best mate I have!
One of my preferred go to cards. It is worth the annual fee if you buy 100.00 worth of groceries a week. And a hack for this card is any purchases made in the gas station counts towards your 3%

If I could give a negative score I would ! I used the bill payment for the first time to try and pay my car payment as I am out of town. At first it said it would be paid on 31st which I paid on the 27th, then it changed to it was delivered on the 27th but to give my financial institution a few days to post payment, then it turned into 5-7 business days then it was oh well if it doesn’t go through by the 7th business day you will be refunded immediately. I asked several times to speak to supervisor and was denied by an “ Agent Hart” She told me they have no way of tracking the payment .... said nobody gets a copy of signed check that had been deposited or cashed .... so I asked “ you guys just do things all Willy Nilly and hope for the best over there ?!” She sat silent for several moments before saying “ okay, seems like we have everything taken care of.” I proceeded to ask “ How? My car payment hasn’t been made and you can’t tell me where my money has gone. How is that taken care of?” Again, silence . I call today after she told me my money would be returned immediately if not received by financial institution today and now I’m being told I can either A. Stop payment or B. Receive notice as to where this payment is(mind you this is after “ Agent Hart” told me nobody has access to that information). So, I tell her I want both honestly because I want to know where the money went if I don’t have it and the financial institution in which my loan is at doesn’t have it and I also want my money back! I need it so I can pay my damn loan since it is now late and the financial institution in which I have my loan reports monthly and this effecting my credit ! She proceeds to tell me “ ok, the stop payment with take 10 business days...” I stopped her right there and said “ no I want money TODAY! Either I get this money or the bank gets my money for my car payment! I said I asked for a supervisor yesterday and never got one. Today I speak to one and she tells me that it could now only take 2 business days as long as nobody has cashed the check ... that’s right she said that .... how would they know when she again just told me that nobody has access to that information?! So now I get to wait for my money to HOPEFULLY land back in my account somewhere between 2-10 business days MAYBE... oh yeah because she also said in 10 business days I may only receive notice as to what the concluded from their investigation.... taking my money to an ACTUAL bank!! I have had this card for years and this is the first time I’ve tried to use bill pay, this has caused me to choose to just cut my card up and have my funds deposited elsewhere !!
Best card to own. I wish I had gotten this card many years ago! I am blessed to have. You will not regret owning this card. I promise you.

Despite having good credit and a high credit limit. The balance transfer limit is $5,000, which is not stated in their card agreement condition and terms. The disclosure state "up to eligibility and credit limit" is false. The requested limit was well under 75% of credit limit. Save yourself the hassle, avoid this card if you would like a proper balance transfer card.
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content:
Very nice customer service.

Easy to use.

Amex card is so friendly.

Many helpful options to pay bill.

In one word Amex is "Excellent"
Very good experience. It was worth looking into and completing the application. Thanks for allowing me the opportunity to review this card.

Sense the pandemic we were using this card to get our 1.5% versus co Branded hotel and airline cards

Was easy sense we already had this card
Great card with great benefits and offers and also provide random offers. $0 annual fee and friendly User mobile, only wish payments didn't take so long to reflect.
Great offer great card even greater when you pay off balance monthly or keep low balance am ex customer service is great and knowledgeable

I made a payment through this card and it still hasnt cleared wtf is the problem? I call them and cant understand a damn word theyer saying. So im like whatever ok. It takes 7 business days to clear wtf is that? To dispute it takes 10 days to get my money back on my account. This card is a rip off do not purchase this card. These people are pathetic. This card is hell!
The customer service provided is excellent. They are fast, professional and courteous. Agents there take their time explaining every aspect of my card.
Payments are usually process. Once in a while payments are not applied to the account. When the payment is not applied to my American Express. I must have my bank start the investigation.

Excellent cards for help with financial assistance and saving lots of savings with merchants deals and advices on every possible transactions to save money and practice on saving money to gat debt free!

This amex card has a $95.00 a year fee but the fact you get 6% cash back on groceries and 3%back on gas more than makes up for it..Ibuse this card just for those two reasons alone. Not to mention I also get amex benifits on top of that..if you can look past the annual fee this card is worth it all day long...

amex emailed me a bonus offer in June of 2019 to open an American Express Magnet Card and receive a $250 statement credit after I spent $1,000 or more in purchases with the new Card within the first 3 months of Card Membership and that I would receive the cash back in the form of a statement credit. So I immediately opened the card and met the requirements yet I never received the statement credit. Today, 01.28.20, I followed up amex and I've been informed that amex did not provide me with the bonus offer because I have been awarded too many bonus offers and therefore not eligible. This statement is completely ridiculous because amex had emailed me with the bonus offer and it is very deceptive marketing for amex to make an offer then later say that I'm not eligible. I was not provided any notice about ineligibility during the application process. amex acted dishonestly with deceptive marketing tactics and should be held to account.

I applied for the Amex everyday card and they said that i applied for the Blue Everyday card. I wanted the 0% Apr and 0% balance transfer fee. I was charged a 3% balance transfer fee and i told them to convert me to the AMEX everyday and they wouldnt! They told me to spend more money so i could be a 175 bonus. What the f....Amex really isn't professional and doesn't care if you're happy. They just want all of your money without correcting of caring about the customer's happiness. Now I have a 150$ charge I'll never get back? Amex robbed me and they will do anything to rob you too. Stick with Discover, guys!

Awful, absolutely awful! Tried to pay cc on father's behalf because he’s in the hospital, and I couldn’t do it by going online, calling automated teller, OR by customer service. Was able to finally get through to a human, and they wouldn’t take a debit card payment. Here I am, WANTING to pay them, and I now have to send them a money order. I’m paying off his balance and hopefully he won’t be needing this cc In the future.
Good card for travelers who collect points. However, unsure I always get the Platinum services I expect when contacting AMEX for help with reservations, etc.

I love this card. Worth every penny. Points system is rewarding - pun intended. Very rewarding. While there is an annual fee, I find the fee well worth the price. Plus, Amex customer service is outstanding.

I bought the prepaid card put $220 on it tried to pay a bill didn’t work called them they put my card on hold can’t access my funds total bullshit Do not recommend now my accounts going to be past due and they don’t even try to help

Much lower initial credit limit than anticipated with a score above 750. APR is not the best either considering score and debt to income ratio is excellent based on financial calculators from four different sources. Overall there are better cards available with lower APR and better rewards with multiple categories. Personally given my credit rating I would not have applied for the card if I had known the limit would be $2,000 it's absurd!

American express after using your card after 3 months I do consider this is the worst experience I ever had with a credit card company. This platinum card is false advertise with no set spending limit when actually it is. I have had decline transaction several times because they said I went over my spending limit. Even though they have been paid on time they stop me from making even small 60 purchases. Latest news never link your bank account with them fraud was committed on my account because they wanted a payment sooner than the due date. Basically they charge my bank account I had on file with them to receive my money beofre it was actually due. When I called an say hey I didn't submit that payment they said it was nothing they could do about it. Once a payment is made you cant not even on they're end. They tried to say I made the payment but why would I make a payment just to cancel it. They are crooks trust me!
The best overall card and card service I’ve ever had. They truly are the platinum standard. Incredible and fast service, not to mention 5x points on travel as well as rotating rewards each quarter.

I’ve been a member since 2015, American Express was a great experience. Till they decided to close my account because of a rejected payment from my checking account. I’m truly baffled because the payment rejection was not my fault. I was a victim of fraud with my bank, I even faxed documentation to American Express. It’s been about a month now still not willing to work with me to re open my account. I had 4 American Express accounts, all the agents I spoke to were very unprofessional because I was told to do many things in order for my account to be reinstated. When I finish all the task that we’re suppose to be done they basically told me have a nice day nothing we can do to help you. They do not recall anyone telling me they would give me a guarantee reinstatement as long as I paid aloft the balance

Like the app and the account management features, especially the option to plan large purchases.


Card benefits were great when I joined but have been downgraded recently
A great card to carry on travel, they will not blocked your card when you are out of town.if your looking for a card to have in your wallet this is the one.

if you travel a lot, American Express Membership Rewards points provide an exceptional value on travel purchase redemption through the American Express Travel website. There’s also some decent value to events and experiences through the website as well. If you don’t regularly travel or go to events, Membership Rewards points are not nearly as valuable for redemption.
The lounge access is not as advertised. Delta lounges charge for beer. Customer service knows little about the card's terms&conditions. I feel like I know their jobs better than they know their jobs.
They keep increasing/decreasing my credit line thus causing impact to my credit score...WHY? Agent at AX could not explain. Horrible service.
This is my preferred card. The travel benefits are awesome. I use almost all of them. My favorites are the reimburse airline incidental expenses and the uber credits.
Purchase protection plus points! Now that we will dine and travel more it just made good sense. More stays at Hilton Hotels in our future!
Very good card definitely one of the best . I see drasticimprovements in credit scores and I am saving lot of money in cash back and reqRDS

Always helpful. User friendly site. Stopped using gold business AMEX in '02. Reapplied 15 yrs later after i had some financial probs & they welcomed me back and wondered where I'd been. Showed me as member since '99, and started me off with $12,500 credit line. They worked with me when my business was failing, and treated me like an old friend over a decade later. Cant say enough about them. My Go-To card.

I was a loyal customer with AmEx for almost 20 years. When I finally asked them to review a charge on my card -- a ticket for a flight that insurance wouldn't reimburse, even though a family member died -- AmEx completely dismissed my complaint. For me, it became clear that they care about nothing other than the bottom line -- and so, I will not be using AmEx ever again. I expected more from a company so well-respected, but I guess they do not care much for their customers.

Great Credit card from Amex.

I have had this card for about a year now and I was starting out with a 5k limit when I got it.

I now have a 20k limit on the card.

I was actually offered a 30k limit but declined that.

Anyway back to the card.

I absolutely love it and the customer service is great and they really seem to care.

So if you're thinking about getting this card then go for it.

As with all credit cards, you should pay them off every month.

If I could have picked my own card from them I would have sold myself short. They delivered a lesson that was more valuable than the actual purchasing power of the card: read the fine print, and don’t forget to look at the long game once in awhile.... While living in the moment. I hope to keep good working relationship with them in the future.

Specifically American Express delta platinum skymiles. They told me they will upgrade my gold card to a platinum instead the agent cancel one and open another one so even reaching my goal of expending they don’t want to give me the gift I should receive for giving my goal. Phone service was awful. Lying to me at first telling me it was a feta problem. It took me couple of call between delta and Amex to realize it was an Amex problem. Still 2 months after I have my issue not solved and it can take another 2 months. If you are not fully convinced I recommend you to go for a cash back credit card with other company. Because if you travel abroad a lot of places don’t accept Amex
Superb customer service. Great card to add to anyones wallet. AMEX is know accepted everywhere and grest fraud protection insurance.

One of the best cards for traveling and staying at different hotels. The amount of deals that come with it are unparalleled. I highly recommend this card to anyone that is able to waive the membership fee.
I’ve always had good luck with Amex. I’ve been a long time customer and can always count on American Express if I have a charge that I need to dispute.
A customer service agent canceled my card and shipped a replacement card without my request or authorization. This created a delay that ended up costing me over a thousand dollars.
I have always payed them on time and I take advantage of and enjoy the bennifits. I have had zero issues with this card where it is accepted. The only downfall is some places do not take AMX.
I have used American Express for over 30 years and never had a problem. Even when my identity was stolen, they worked with me to ensure that I did not pay false charges.

Courteous customer service excellent follow thru

Submit and handle issues expediently will go the extra mile for problem solving and given results

Hi everyone. Happy New Year, 2021. This is an update of my previous review way back in early 2020. I have an awesome journey with AMEX Everyday. I was referred by my friend and instantly approved for $6000. I also got $150 welcome bonus points with 15 months 0% APR. You can also get another 20% bonus cashback if you purchase more than 20 items in a month. So far, I am having a good experience with this card. You can also enjoy the welcome bonus using this http://refer.amex.us/NIRUPPV40F?XLINK=MYCP
department: The Amex EveryDay® Credit Card from American Express

content: Im closing my account as soon as my store purchase refund clears. They are holding my refund for 7 days. Mind you they allowed The New York Post to withdraw $35 from.my account with no problem. Which I never signed up for the newspaper. Also, processed a "Send Check" payment to my landlord thru their bill pay service. Landlord never received the check. And you will NEVER get an American representative when you call customer service.
Is a Great American Express credit card in all place and store you can count with for travel and pay , is the new way to go anywere any places

This card has done nothing but good for me I enjoy using my American Express and when I pay it off I get a thank you note from the fine people at American Express I will always give them a good review because they have not done anything bad to me or for me and for that I say Happy New Year and thank you for letting me have your card

Helpful customer service, especially when my card is stolen and a bunch of charges show up that I didn't make. Even when my card was stolen and used 5 minutes less later, I got a text alerting me and I was able to report my card stolen immediately.
They don it give automatic increases and when you ask for one no late payments in the past and good credit score I got 3 silly reasons

Ordered two cards. Received the secondary card solo on 12/24. I called about the primary, and was told it should have arrived at the same time but shipping happens and it may be later. 6 days later my primary card arrives. Had fraudulent charges by the time my card landed in my mailbox. So how do you think someone could have intercepted my card, activated it, and used it by the time I get an unmolested envelope? Impossible. Happened at American Express. Will never use them nor recommend them. Zero stars is the real deserved rating.

I had a account with American Express Serve that was closed and I forgot about

I was sent a direct deposit on November 19, 2019 . American Express Serve still have yet to send thr money back to the sender it is know December 29, 2019 sad that this company choices to keep the money and not follow proper protocol.
Great for those that travel a lot. The VIP lounges are great and available most airports. The AMEX travel website is good for most countries and cities.

UPDATE: American Express just increased my limit by $1500!!! Automatically. (I didn’t request it) In fact they more than doubled my limit. I now love this card as much or more than my Chase card! :)


I love my American Express card. They gave me a card when my credit was considered good/new. They have great perks, special rates at specific stores and special interest rates at times for large purchases. I can also use my points to pay at Amazon which is super convenient. The only thing my other cards have done that AmEx hasn’t is increase my limit. I have not request this but two of my other CC’s have increased my limit automatically. One of them twice! My credit rating has gone up to excellent. I will probably request an increase next time I want to make a large purchase.

I use Credit Karma, Credit Sesame, Wallethub, Experian, and Nerd Wallet. Scores were about 775TU,778 Ex, and 780Eq. (Approximately) They had me with very good approval odds for AmExBCP.

Applied and qualified instantly. Pretty low limit (4300) because age of credit very young.

Great customer service and very pleased with the card. They raised my limit after 6 months.

In the first 10 days of opening this account, I had fraudulent charges before receiving the card, then they sent a replacement card, then it was delayed a week due to a mistake on their end. I tried asking them to make it right but they didn’t seem to care. Hopefully my experience will improve once I actually get to use the card.
department: Blue Cash Preferred® Card from American Express

content: This has been a great card for my family. The no annual fee and introduction of 0% intrest. Great customer service any time I have called

Great card and customer service but not a lot of benefits and high interest. Also can’t use rewards to credit account or do other things like other rewards cards. It also requires a 95 fee so it’s not a ideal card if you have good credit you want to get the most.

I have carried the AMEX Platinum for a while. I learned the annual fee would be raised to $250 on Jan. 30, 2020. My annual renewal is Jan. 5 but I was told by the agent they bill towards the end of the month so I would be subject to the $250 renewal rate. However, I was billed on Jan. 22, 2019 so this seems really strange and a scam to get the $250 versus $195. I also inquired about downgrading to the Gold card because I have had ongoing issues with using the companion ticket due to "unavailability" and I learned that the companion ticket that I already paid for and was a result of the 2019 membership would be impacted because I didn't use it before my renewal date (apparently in the fine print) --- but I already purchased a ticket will be using it before the expiration date on the voucher!! Watch out people -- lots of fine print and scams.
Good card. Opportunities to save interest on larger purchases. No complaints. 1.5% back on all purchases. App is very easy to use. Have never had to call customer service.

American Express is one of the best card company's that you can feel confident about working with and not for.Put this card in your wallet or purse and gain assurance that youve gone to a whole nother level.of coarse it would be nice to get a higher increase so I could really spread the news.

THEY CANNOT BE TRUSTED WITH YOUR MONEY.

I've never used my card outside the U.S., yet they authorized multiple charges for food delivery in India. Calling to get it corrected was an hour nightmare of bad customer service (Indian call center....ironic, ehh?). I had to fight to get them to even consider reversing the charges.


But it gets better!


Five days later my account, through this now CANCELLED card, is charged 6 more times for food delivery service in India. On a cancelled card! Had to make same nightmare phone call, waiting interminably on hold, and this still isn't completely resolved. The people who run Amex are too stupid to successfully pick their noses.


If you value your hard earned money, DON'T TRUST AMERICAN EXPRESS.
I like my AMX card. It allows me the credit that I need to run my business and it is accepted everywhere that I need it to be! I use it everyday!

I'm a recent purchaser of American Express gift card I would like to share with others American Express customers I was lied to and told that I would be refunded my $100 buy customer service representative and waited in the mail for 2 weeks to find out that I was lied to to get off the phone I asked the supervisor she said contact the police, that's too late if u didn't lie to your customers 2 weeks ago I could have made effort to report it to the bank or something , terrible customer service I'm just warming others avoid this company and I own a business what kind of company doesn't offer reviews on their website.
Very good card, for everyday purchases and paying bills, I us it for everything, great customer service and no yearly fee, best card.
Horrible company to deal with. I would not reccomend using them for a credit card provider. Visa and Master Card are so much better and easier to work with.

Totally Fraud financial service , No info gather or given from or to customers will be incorrect . If you want to correct those details by calling them , they will transfer one agent to another agent without resolving it.
Marriot bonvoy. Good card for travel to marriot properties flexible perks during pandemic are an added advantage when travel is much less likely

I think this is a great card if you’re a frequent Delta flyer. I love the priority boarding and free checked bags. I also got in on it during a fantastic sign up bonus promotion, and have gotten multiple trips out of the miles. Just make sure you’re actually getting the value for the annual fee. You’re better off getting a general travel card if you don’t fly Delta enough to make this card worthwhile.
This is a great card for people who travel. Five points per dollar for airline travel. Comes with Priority Plus airline lounge access and elite status for Marriott and Hilton.
The more I look into the benefits and upcoming changes I find this card to be less attractive than others. I will probably not renew it.

I like American Express more for the offers they have for purchase and purchase protection on any purchases. They have helped a lot with unusual charges so I can keep my account without fraudsters taking over. It is a great card that offers low interest to no interest on purchases and a good app to work with too. I can save money at the same time and then pay my card back in full with cash back bonuses and discounts at restaurant meetings. They also have a small plan to pay program if I ever purchase and need to make plans to pay installments.
Awesome card has many perks and rewards. Application is so easy to navigate. This could be one of my best cards, and they started me with a $30,000 limit not bad.
Very good card to have especially if you are in the military. The perks are excellent, you earn 60,000 miles when you spend 5000 the first three months.

I was skeptical about applying for this card ... after applying for it when WalletHub told me that my Approval Odds were VERY GOOD/Excellent. Last year this time of year I was denied only because my credit history was fairly new with only having a Discover Chrome Card which was opened 5 months prior and a Capital One 8 months prior even though my credit scrore was good ... Fast Forward a year later and I have established credit history by not missing any payments in in turn have added yet another Wells Fargo Visa card. So after using the Amex PreQualify tool for several weeks i was approved for a Variety of Amex's but was nervous to apply for the card. My Experian Score is a 770 up over 110 points from April 2018 and since Amex Hard Pulls from Experian .. I though why not ... Submitted that application and was instantly approved for a Gold Delta Amex with a starting credit limit of $6000. Merry Christmas to me ... :)
department: Delta SkyMiles® Gold American Express Card

content: Good card to use for travel points. Always changing credit limit up and down. Available credit has jumped 1000 dollars from day to day

I already had an American Express gold card and decided to sign up for the platinum card since I got the targeted link for the 75,000 bonus points. After meeting the minimum spend requirements and not receiving the bonus points I reached out to American Express to find out why I hadn’t received them. They told me because I had the same product before I wasn’t eligible for the bonus (I hadn’t had the card in years). This was not made clear when signing up for the card and I feel it should have been. I would not have signed up for the card if I knew I wasn’t eligible for the bonus points.
I have never had such negative interactions. Their card is NOT worth it. Get CapitalOne (top quality App, Service, and Rewards!) DO NOT GET AMEX. They're terrible.

my spouse did a pre-approval as we were trying to use the low balance transfer rate to get some of our debt in one place to be easier to pay everymonth. however we never finished the application. we got an email stating it was about to expire. so knowing what expire means in any language we left it be. however according to the staff we have been in contact with expire means to just proceed as the company wishes. So thank you you snakes for ripping me off of Christmas money i had saved for my kids Christmas because you don't understand a simple bloody definition of what expire means. well here is the actual definition for your future reference. Expire: (of a document, authorization, or agreement) cease to be valid, typically after a fixed period of time.


again i hope you sleep well at night ruining a families Christmas!!!!!

My Name Is Sheldon Lemco I have been a good customer of their card for more than thirty years, I have never been late or had a single problem with their card. I always paid either the Min due or above the entire time I have had the card. American Express never once increased my credit limit and now they lowered it by almost half. This is how they treat their customers that have been good customers for thirty years. I want the public to know and understand what powerful Credit card companies do to to good customers. I want you to be careful , because they might do the same to you.
Ok card, benefits average, credit limit low, app is good, overall service ok. Good for point collection for trips with delta, I am yet to see if the annual fee is worth while
Excellent Card, Great company. Company always monitors your spending and any outside interference excellent American Express can be used more places nowadays than ever before
Many vendors where I live no longer accept this card due to the rates on their side. They recently improved their rewards system which is much better. decent card that I use as a backup.
Do not apply to American Express I have 687 700 credit score and got denied if you value your credit like I do .I repeat do not apply just another inquiry on your credit GOOD LUCK
Great everyday card with superior customer service. They tripled my already great LOC, without my even asking! Another Great feature is there is No hard pull on add'l AE cards Ex: Gold Card.

They are the WORST for my refund I had to wait 5 business days so I was stuck with no money thanksgiving and it was nothing they could do about it, next vudu charged my card because my son had the tv remote and he accidentally bought a movie well I called Amex trying to get my 21.39 they told me I would have to file a dispute and order a new card to get just $21.39!!!! I took it upon myself and called vudu and they refunded me my money without all the hassle. This is my last time dealing with them !! They are ABSOLUTELY THE WORST !!!!!!
Excellent for travel expenses and rewards. Typically, never have any issues with American Express. Awards and customer service is top notch.
I have had the card for over 20 years. I am retired and do not use as. much but it is nice to have. The service has been great and I pay the bill on time.
Started with $2,000 limit, to date it’s now $1,000. Reduced with 72 months on time pay history. I’m not sure why the limit was reduced and why there has been no increase but no problem.

beware of american express. Customer service is horrible. I added a personal card at one point and they gave me a card with the same last 4 digits as my business american express. It caused all kinds of trouble which they refused to correct.
Love the perks of the card, especially the free luggage and companion ticket. It saved us a lot of money when attempting to fly to Naples. I love this card
My only issue with AMEX is if you don't use it they close the account. The card is widely accepted and the rewards are reasonably fair.
They took away my credit limit for no reason I have no missed payments and had nothing bad to say about it until now. I will continue to spread the word on how bad amex is.

729 score. Instant approval and with 8000 limit which was a bit lower than i had expected but i am grateful to have gotten approved..im actually speaking, or writing this into existence. Tonight my hard work and research will finally pay off and just in time for christmas.
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: It's been one of the best cards I've had so far! Thank you American Express :-) and for the automatic credit limit increase!!! Apply now

Amex Serve is absolutely the worst incompetent division of American Express, they are in it to just make money. Whatever you do, DO NOT waste your hard earned money with this service. There are plenty of ways you could use similar more reputable services, this is Amex's predatory way of taking advantage of people who need a service like this.
Not a good choice if you add a member to you account do not add any members to your account. They are showing balances on both accounts credit account if one is buying
excellent for Travel with Delta Airlines, and with new rewards coming in early 2020 it should be an even more card for those who have the card
Very security aware. Easy online or over the phone customer service. Ideal for purchasing groceries or fuel for a car. Love to pay phone or check credit balance.

I set up an automatic payment that was greater than my minimum. After I paid off the balance, the account closed automatically. Funny though that the payments didn't cancel automatically and they charged me another payment after it was closed. When I called the lady on the phone was very rude and told me I should check my bank account before calling because it said there was already a credit on my account. A few days later and nothing in my bank account so I call again and apparently they send checks for refunds after the billing cycle close, which the rude lady before didn't tell me at all. So no I have to wait 3 weeks to get my money back that I needed to pay bills. I will never use American Express for anything else ever again.

DO NOT GET THIS CARD. dishonest 3rd world country employees. They steal & SELL your card info!! i had $896.00 charge from saudia airlines....i do not even have a passport!! now, AMEX claims they cant refund me. they steal from honest people!!
Cash back and rewards programs are good. Customer service was good on resolving issues. Rewards program credit is handy paying the account off at a faster rate. Cash back is handy in emergencies!

This has been a great card for the rewards back 365 days a year, no quarterly changes. No annual fee. I got my bonus $150 immediately from spending upfront on the card. They even offered me 1.99% apr now that my promotional rate ended for the next few months! Excellent customer service too!
Great benefits - elite level granted for most hotels, credits for autopay of monthly bills. One drawback is many places do not accept Amex
This card offers great savings. It’s one of my most used cards in my wallet. I would recommend other people to apply for this card
Great for points. Using it for hotel rooms, which makes me stay for free during vacations. Every purchase adds points, and as a Diamond member the benefits are great.

There is no score lower than what could be found under a rock in the farthest depths of hell to rate the experience I had today with Amex Serve!! I've barely use the card in many months except to load money on it as an extra savings place for special occasions. Today, I went to buy groceries for our Thanksgiving dinner, and checked the card balance before I started out. My account had been closed!!! I received a message when I logged into my account with a customer service number. I was absolutely livid!!! I called the number and some woman answered the line whose English sucked plus 10!! She explained to me that I hadn't met their company's security requirements!! What damn security requirements??? She placed me on hold for damn near 30 minutes to talk with the tech department. I've had that card for a couple of years, and I've never experienced such a thing. Furthermore, how dare they close my account without any notification?!?! Where the hell is my money??!! I work too damn hard to save money and have it taken from me like this. I haven't done a damn thing but place money on the card!! I haven't used it to purchase a freaking thing in months. We use it to save money for special occasions. That pathetic heifer of a customer service rep verified my home mailing address and email, and told me that a check for the amount of money I had on the card had been sent to me on 11/23/19. I actually asked the good Lord to please save my life because I was so angry, I though I was going to have a coronary!! My money better be in my mailbox with a quickness!! Amex Serve damn near ruined our Thanksgiving!! Thanks a lot you corrupt, maggots!! May the jaws of hell snatch your hearts out!! My family will go on with it's Thanksgiving, be blessed and enjoy the season in spite of you minions from hell. You may have snatched my joy temporally, but you will never make believe there are not still good people out there. In your case, God must have blinked!!!! CONSUMERS, STAY AWAY FROM THIS CARD!! DO NOT GET THIS CARD!!!! STAY AWAY FROM AMEX SERVE PERIOD!!!
This card allows me the flexibility to make larger purchases at any time during the monthly payment cycle and to make payments conveniently synced with my business
Excelent card for everyday household expenses. I recommend it for a small family that is looking for a good cash back rate in supermarkets and gas stations

STAY AWAY FROM THIS CREDIT CARD!!! They will promise you so many things and will not keep their word. You will deal with headaches and a lot of back and forth with representatives changing their story every time. I recommend Discover, better customer service and they will give you what they promise.
department: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express

content: Thank you for your time and excellent attention and very good service all the time excellent service and customer loyalty for you all customers
American Express has been great to me. When I recently went through job transition they worked with me to keep it from impacting my credit score

I love American Express . They may be one of the few institutions left that still knows what it means to value its customers. Plus, Amex always keeps me safe against fraud and has amazing benefits to boot.
Reward Points on all. Great customer service. Got it with a 682 Experian score. Great for restaurants, supermarkets and travel. Annual fee 250.

I have been a customer since 2012; I thinks Amex calls us members, well, I have been the member of a marriage for some time and I truly don't get it impression that they get the meaning of it, its being loyal. Over the last few years my accounts are at any given time blocked for charging privileges because of credit review of my personal credit having 4 or 8 Reviews per year, its what happens when you are a growing business, they of all people should know that; no matter what one needs from amex, they do a credit check, so what's the problem? I always pay my bill.
American Express is always taking care of me anytime I’ve needed they offer great rates great terms or shall I say low interest rates I will do business with him many times in the future
if you like being lied to by overseas call centers and denied basic customer service provided by almost any other card out there, then this may be the card for you!
Great card with a lot of benefits. Make sure to pay balance in full before statement close. If you don’t don’t pay in full it can really effect your credit score.

Opened card on 10/17. Card arrived a few days later. I first used the card on 10/28. They then sent a bill with a die date of Nov 22 and a closing date of 10/28. So I didn't even get 30 days with the card before the cycle closed. Clever!
department: The Blue Business® Plus Credit Card from American Express

content: If you eat and do groceries you won't find a better option... And that includes ordering in. Cars easily pays for itself, though I wish there was more versatility and rollover with the airline credit.

Amex is a great company with very reasonable lending practices especially on balance transfers I believe they allow you 18 months introductory rate. They will work with you to keep you on top of your account and make their top products available promptly if you are good with the Everyday and Blue accounts.
This was a wonderful loan. I moved and needed a bit of security while settling in. It was easy to apply for and there are no penalties for repaying early.
I like this card, I use it for traveling only, as well as associated travel expenses. Using this card is fun and easy and it saves me a lot of money when i travel with bags.

Never ever again. Having American Express isn't a privilege or prestigious, its a pain. My card was closed at 10pm at night via phone call from American Express due to a charge that they stated they dont allow. Instead of them giving me a warning, they closed the account and my credit score within a week plunged from 720 to 449. It has taken well over a year to bring my score back to good standing and I'll never risk my score and myself again. The customer service and their team's response was both rude and dismissive. I should've listened to others when they said American Express is not a card for me.
Great card with lots of benefits! Great AMEX customer service.. They are always nice and treat you like a valued customer.. my credit card has a $8k limit..

I have been a member for several years. Everything was good until I was asked if I wanted pay over time privilege. I paid less than statement balance one month afer then paid full balances and was charged interest and penalties for no reason. I paid full balance again and was I charged interest and penalties again. This has gone on for several months. I called to cancel card and got transferred around and hung up on after holding. Today I called again and asked for my statement balance and was told its several thousand less than listed on statement. I asked them to send me an email in writing so I can pay this amount but they said they have to mail it and it takesb7 days. My balance is due in 3. They cannot email. I find this beyond ridiculous and will be reporting them to credit protection services and better business bureau. Fyi this is difficult to write von this page with my phone excuse typos it's not allowing corrections.

Recently found out they are an absolute nightmare to deal with if on refunds from fraudulent merchants, sure they will gladly suspend the charge but when they do investigation, however, is very pro-merchant all the way. They provide very limited access to consumer to protect themselves and they are not forthcoming with any information they receive from the merchant.

Their online current charges screen is an absolute hassle to try to reconcile.

I like this card over all but what I am disappointed about is when you have a question and call in and talk with someone, they will answer your question and if you are transferred to another person, you will get a totally different answer.


Plus, when you pay this card off in full it takes branch credit pool holders like wallet hub, sesame, karma, and others up to three months before it ever shows a zero balance. That's so disappointing.


So, whenever you call in, here is just an example. You may ask, what is my available credit? Then ask another person 60 seconds later and ask the same question. Then listen to how the answer changes immediately and differently. This applies to the non-preset card limit card and others. Plus, when using this card out in public you really don't know if you will be rejected or not. It's always a guessing game.


Personally, I have charged thousands on this card and always pay it off immediately to save money. But when I use it, I make sure I have a backup card because with this card you really never know when it will be rejected or accepted. It is like walking on thin ice with this card. I don't like gambling when it comes to credit.


Again, whenever I use this card, I pay it off immediately, it takes up to three months for the bureaus to show a zero balance. This just isn't right. But if you call the bureaus, they will say it's the creditors' fault for reporting it slow. If you call the creditor, then they say it's the bureaus fault. no one takes accountable for this.

I'm so happy with Amex on this credit card, once you have an account with them, there's not hard pulls on your credit score when you apply for a credit line increase. My credit line when I open this account was 2K, 2 years later I got 20K. Highly recommend

I’m very happy with this card I’ve never had any issues. What i think is unfair about the way that wallet hub rates my credit. This card is paid in full monthly because it is required and I use it for all of my purchases because of the points that I receive. Wallet hub penalizes me for takin advantage of that.
great card rewards are great and customer service is great i would highly recommend this card i use it on every purchase i make and use the

Grows quickly however Amex seems to have a problem mailing me my card. I had to have them overnight me a replacement card after they said it was delivered. If it was indeed delivered, it certainly wasn't in my hands. Both of my amex cards have had this same issue. Unsurprisingly, I always seem to get their promotional mailers offering me new cards. I've had the same issue on both of my cards. Rewards take quite some time to post and despite the name, don't ever expect to get an actual American on the line when calling customer service. Use for groceries only and cash out when you hit 25 bucks. The contactless RFID chip also broke in a few months but I'm not about to go through the hassle requesting another card considering their deficiencies in sending me the previous ones. For no annual fee it's sufficient but it's not something anyone should be pining for.
Wasn't the best experience Ive had with a credit card provider...Id love to try again but I doubt they'll ley me ever again it really sucks.
Amex is the best. Easy to use and easy to work with personnel. I have had this card for some time now and have nothing to complain about
If you get in a tight spot and use your credit but don’t miss a payment they will reduce your credit limit. AE sucks, US bank is the way to go.
5x on airlines and prepaid hotel. I have an 9 card setup, and it is mostly used for benefits and not purchasing (airport lounges and hotel upgrades).
There was a requirement to spend $1k in order to receive the cashback/rewards points. After that was spent I noticed the credit within 2 business days. Great service, great card! A+
You have to really pay attention to your purchases and build up points in order to make the annual fee worth it. If you do, it does pay off.
Great! I don’t know what I’m supposed to write. I have been on the site 60 seconds. But yes great. Thank you. It has been a great experience so far

American Express Blue Cash Everyday is one of the best card for a Student. They have promotional offer of $150 after you spend $1000 in three months (which should be easy to meet). Besides that, they do have cash back offer on purchases like 3% on US Supermarkets, 2% on gas, and 1% on all other purchases. I have been using this card for a year now.

One great thing about Amex is they give you higher credit limit if you have a decent credit score.

If you are interested in this card you can apply through this link below.

http://refer.amex.us/SUNILDef0Z?XLINK=MYCP
Great credit card-to have and when using it it make me feel that I have achieved something in life and with my credit. American Express was thanks for all that you do.

I have had the card for years. Recently i returned some items to walmart and the refund was returned to my card......they held the refund for 7 days......their policy. Nothing can be done about it. I have never had this happen with visa or mastercard. Prepaid or regular account. Obviously american express serve doesnt value their customers. I cannot trust this card and have removed my direct deposits. I wont use this service again.
I was able to obtain this card for a decent Welcome promotional of $150. So I got it. It only gets 1.5% interest but has a credit limit of $5000.
Great customer service good introductory offer at 0% for 18 months good rewards program I would recommend this card to someone with good credit

Stay away. The monthly fee/ service charge is ridiculous. Be prepared to pay it as soon as you purchase the card. If you purchase the card for a bill make sure to add an additional $6.95 to your card for the same day service charge fee or be prepared for your card to be declined and your bill unpaid. If I could give it zero starts I would. I’ve purchased a lot of gift cards over the past few years, this is the only one that I regret buying and to think I was considering getting my paycheck loaded to this card, not after reading you can’t withdrawal your own money from the account.
I’m really happy with the privileges of this Platinum card. There are endless perks for both prestige and financial wellness. No other card got your back like Amex Platinum.
Best card I've ever had and the best customer service ever don't leave home without it and if ya have any credit cards this is definitely one that you should have in ur possession
poor company with outsourced callcenters. they will never help you. its all about them and not you. intetest is too high and too many scams
It’s a good card and worth considering. Like any credit card you need to understand the benefits and time large purchases to take full advantage of the offered perks.

This is my favorite card... I find myself loosing my wallet and can easily turn my card off till I find it through the app. The customer service is the best!.. Illegal purchases are removed quickly and without incident. Credits increases regularly. “I DON’T leave home without it!” Lol

I was happy with my American Express card

until I tried to pay it off. I spoke to a representative by phone to pay off my balance and cancel my card. The next day I received not one but three emails in a row telling me I needed to pay my past due account. Seriously? Now I have to go through the hassle of calling them again and making sure they updated the information on my now paid off card.

Stay away from this card! I've been a customer since 2010 and can honestly say this card is a total rip off. Read all of the fine print first to find all of the ways they will screw you over! Their customer service consists of the rudest people at the Indian call centers. They want outrageous "membership fees" for their rip off credit cards. Pray you never have unexpected financial problems because their heartless customer service will only be rude and snarky about it. Oh, and if you pay late one month because of unexpected issues, they will forfeit your earned points, but don't worry you can get your points back IF YOU PAY MONEY TO REINSTATE THEM! AND DO YOU KNOW HOW MUCH MONEY IT TAKES TO EQUAL POINTS TO BEGIN WITH! Total joke of a card. I have multiple credit cards with tremendous customer service and rewards. I've never experienced such a horrible system with any other credit card company. I will never utilize this credit card again and wish I had never signed up for it in the first place!

Platinum card.... Lounges..... All things travel...... 200.00 airline credit.... Free TSA membership....... Concierge.... 185.00 annual Uber credits.... 30.00 per month paypal credit (temporary).....So much more....
I love amex. Gets most of the my spend...but the Citi Premier is in my wallet and imo better.. nice card I got it for the sign up bonus
So far so good. Good starting credit limit. Great 0% APR for 15 months. Decent cashback. Not used everywhere but still a good card to have. As they say, "Never leave home without it".
I love American express credit card this Credit Car make me feel so good and customer service is the best and I want to get more American credit card
Excellent customer service. Accepted everywhere. No need to worry about credit limit. I would highly recommend this card. It’s rewards make it well worth it.

Wish I never opened an AMEX for a balance transfer


- deceptive balance transfer promo offer

- minimum payment increases as balance paid down

- "missed payment" by $4 due to change in minimum payment ...which led to NO notice, $28 late fee, $0.11 interest, 1 balance paid in full and 1 less future AMEX user. (Discover has been quite accommodating - excellent BT offer and decreasing min payment.)
Great card and even better service! Great benefits for cardholders. Pay your full balance each month and see your credit line do double.
Best card I have ever had for my needs period! Has revolving specials on rayban, Ralph Lauren, and ofcourse restaurants... For business lunches absolutely great...!
Alright AMEX... Great customer service!!! Very easy application process, had the cash deposited in about 2 days. For 20k easy payment of $670 per month.

This card offers amazing benefits and great customer service. The annual fee is very reasonable and for travel you get 3x points and for restaurants you get 4x which is huge. Platinum has a high annual fee and you don't get more points with the exception of 5x the miles for travel and centurion club access.

Having the worst customer service experience EVER and I just received the card YESTERDAY! In the airport, when I applied for my card, I was promised benefits that correspond to a Platinum Card but only received a "gold card". When I called Sky Miles Club personnel (Philip and his manager, Tessa) to complain about being misled, I was told that all I had to do was call AMEX and they would automatically "upgrade" me to a Platinum card (which is $250/yr charge vs $99). So when I called AMEX to make this "upgrade" happen, I was told by Leah and her manager, Charmaine, that I could NOT automatically be upgraded to a Platinum card until a year has passed. (Um, hello, I am offering to pay you $150 more, I have excellent credit, and I make plenty of money to qualify). THEN they had the nerve to suggest I get TWO cards, a Gold AND a Platinum card (two separate accounts) and stated that I could qualify for a DIFFERENT Platinum card right away. So they are trying to manipulate me into having TWO credit cards- DIFFERENT accounts!! If this isn't deliberate, fraudulent customer service, I do not know what is. All because I wanted to simply have access to the Sky Club, as I travel with Delta all the time. Correction: I USED to travel with Delta all the time. Sorry Delta, you took two hours from my morning...for nothing...I have no desire to give you business any longer.
department: Delta SkyMiles® Gold American Express Card

content:
Be very Careful of this company

They do not give you the rewards you sign up for and then explain it’s a loophole or misunderstanding. And then when you call customer service it’s a run around and very rude, and They don’t call you back! Wish I had never signed up for this card. I will be canceling soon but even that don’t appear to be easy. I would very much stay away from American Express. Just not worth it

It takes 7 days for a merchant refund to be processed, this isn’t normal! I use my debit or credit card and refunds are processed immediately. Don’t use this card if there is a possibility you may return your purchase for a refund. I wish the US government would regulate this process and make them issue refunds promptly.

Best credit card I have - hard inquiry dropped off within one year. Started off with $5000 limit now it’s $18 k. Credit score was 720 when I opened it now it’s 813 1 year later. Excellent customer service. Love the plan it feature for large purchases.

AMEX has been the best card in my wallet for a long time. The card always works when you need it. The rewards program is great. Customer service and security are fast, reliable, and kind. The biggest challenge with this card is it lacks the international range of VISA, but overall it is excellent.
Cash-back rewards can take a while to accrue, but it is good as a charge card. Acceptance has continually increased at stores. Plus, it's fun to know you have an AMEX in your wallet.
Never had a personal loan till this one it's been great experience. If in the future ever need one again this is where i will go for it
Doesn’t report on your credit every month, they wait to post until about two weeks after they have pulled. Card is unrewarding and Amex doesn’t care about its customers.

Be careful of this company. They will just cancel your account with no notice and when you call them about it they will just tell you that you haven't been using the card and you are eligible for reinstatement but they will do a hard pull on your account. Yes, a hard pull to reactivate a card YOU ALREADY HAD FOR YEARS!!!! No warning, just cancel, affect your credit history and card utilization and if you want it reinstated you have to have a hard pull. UNREAL!

I have never experienced any customer service line that has such rude and helpless Representatives I have called and spent over two and a half hours today trying to ask a simple question of where to send email back regarding fraudulent charges that were on my account I called yesterday regarding the fraudulent charges that I noticed yesterday the representative got into my account no problem now today I have called seven times spent almost three hours of my time with this they are telling me they need to verify my account in order to answer the stupid question so I keep giving them the information and they keep telling me they cannot verify my account which they did to did just yesterday and that I need to call back when I have the correct information so I said who am I supposed to ask if it is my account and you won't tell me which information you were claiming is incorrect I spoke to supervisors three Representatives the supervisors honestly when worse than the representatives are more impatient and more rude then the last person I spoke to finally gave me another number for the customer account protection line because I was asking who I can call to file a complaint the guy that answered literally less hopeful than anyone else I spoke to and after 3 hours of wasting your time with this and make sure little angry and I was saying to him how it's f****** ridiculous not cursing or saying one wrong thing to him but cursing out of frustration about the situation he told me sorry if you continue to use profanity I am going to hang up on you I said I'm not cursing at you I'm cursing out of frustration I said there should be no reason you should be telling a customer they can't say what they want to say out of anger I said if I was cursing at you I would understand but there's no reason to tell me you're going to hang up on me so I then ask to speak if I was cursing at you I would understand but there's no reason to tell me you're going to hang up on me so I that ass once again if I could speak to somebody higher than a supervisor since they were not helpful he said okay he put me on hold and I was on hold for 45 minutes before I hung off I literally got nowhere in 3 hours of my time and talkin to 10 different people from the company I'm absolutely Furious and will not be using this account again I highly recommend not to get an account from them being that it sounds like most of the representatives are from India or some other country I can barely speak English

I applied for a credit card, get approved and get told that it'll be here before I know it. 2 weeks later still haven't gotten it. I finally call them as ask what's up, turns out it was sent to a different address, they update said address and it'll be here within 2 days. 3 days later it gets here, works fine then when I use it at Walmart it gets declined. Turns out they didn't send me all the documents needed for me to fully use the thing, so now I have 15 days to fill out the paperwork which they have yet to email, otherwise my account is subject to cancellation. 5/5 would get a card from them again. Oh, I also can't use it until those documents gets sent back to them and approved again. Great.

I have had this card for about 6 years now and in the beginning it was great! Of course there are stores/companies who wouldn't accept Amex, but that wasn't much of an issue. Customer service was helpful and they did all they could to help. I don't know what has happened in the past couple of years, but this is not a good card to have anymore. Lately, every time I have to receive a refund, the mechant will release the funds (and it will show, in green, the funds are back in the account on the app) but Amex will hold them for upwards of 7 days! When you call to get an explanation, they lie and will tell you 2/3 different dates depending on which rep answers the phone. Just today I had a rep tell me that maybe I called and "rushed" amazon to send my refund and that's why it came faster & when I told him "no, I never even had to call amazon" he just repeated the same lie, blaming the banks for holding the funds. Then insisted that he didn't have a manager or dept head that I could talk to. I will be cancelling this card AS SOON as they refund my money. It's not worth the headache or inconvenience, just get a visa.
